title: It Got Everywhere...
text: Okay, first of all there is no way even for an adult to make a 3d statue with this stuff.  It collapses.  You can make big fluffy lines, but nothing worth making.  I did this with a 3 year old, an 11 year old, and a 13 year old, and none of us made anything except a blob.  But the worst part is that 12 hours later the paintings weren't dry yet and the 3 year old smeared them on my couch!  And then it wouldn't come off...  So you're welcome to use these to make blobs that take forever to dry, but make sure that you put them way up high until they are dry!!!!!

title: fun early rc
text:
Most remote control cars are made for older kids, so this is a nice version for the toddler set. It was very easy to use. My kids really enjoyed it. It was nice that they could play with something similar to the toys their older siblings have.

Quality was good. It worked just fine. It is nice and colorful. I like that it isn't too big. It is a good size for them. Also, it was good for both a boy and a girl. I think this would make a nice gift as well. I would recommend it.

title: Fun for kids
text: My kids liked this set. They enjoyed pretending to go fishing. We don't go fishing for real so this was fun. Then they pretended to fish for others things, like each other! The quality was good - it has held up well against my kids rough handling. They have had fun with it. It is good for both a boy and a girl, which is nice. I would recommend it.

title: Nice doll
text:
It is nice that the doll came with a carrier. My daughter liked to take her along to places.

This is a very adorable doll. My daughters really enjoy dolls, and they liked her a lot. I like that she comes with different accessories. It makes her more fun to play with. This is a good sized doll. It isn't too big or too small so she can carry it along and it doesn't seem overwhelming.

I am pleased with the quality of the doll. My kids had no problems with her. She held up well to their handling.

This would also make a very nice gift. My girls like getting dolls the best of all.

She is reasonably soft. She looks just like the picture. I think the price was fair. I would recommend it.

title: Keeps kids busy
text:
My kids really like these. I have five kids ranging in age from 1 to 12, and all of them have played with it. They use it for so many different creative games, from building forts and towers to climbing on to more.

I am pleased with the quality. All of my kids have used it a lot and it has held up very well under the handling. It seems thick and well made. I don't see any problem with durability.

The only thing I would be aware of is that it is very big. It does take up a lot of room so make sure you are aware of the dimensions. And remember the kids will take it apart and it will seem way bigger than it is when it is all put together.

But it is still worth it because the kids like it so much. I would recommend it.

title: Children love this unicorn
text:
My kids love this unicorn. They love the sequins on the back. When you move your hand over the sequins, you flip them so they can change colors. It is a really neat effect and the kids love it. It is a little heavy for a doll, but the kids don't seem to notice or care. Other than that, it is very soft.

They really love the look of the unicorn. It feels well made. They have used it a lot and it has held up just fine. I am very pleased with it and would recommend it.

title: Great activity kit
text: What kid doesn't love stickers, but most of the time, they use them and then they are done. This is a great kit because the stickers are truly reusable. They are very easy to use over and come on and off without a problem. There are many of them and different scenes. This simple thing can really keep the kids occupied. It is great for the car or for vacation or for when you are going somewhere and don't have a lot of room but want to keep the kids occupied. I am very happy with it. The quality is good, and the scenes are very cute. The kids enjoy them. The colors are vibrant as well.

title: Great glue
text: This is the classic glue I've been using since I was a kid (a very long time ago). It really is great and it is useful for kids. It is great for so many craft projects. I've always been happy with the quality of Elmer's glue. You can also use it to make slime. My son did this and had a blast. This is nice because it is washable. A wonderful and useful product for adults and kids.

title: So cute
text: This is very, very cute. It is a tiny little narwhal. My kids just really like it. It is pretty small so make sure you are aware of the dimensions, but my kids didn't seem to mind. They liked the way the sequins sparkled. It is also pretty heavy for such a little thing. But it is very cute and my kids enjoyed it. Quality seems good. I would recommend it.

title: Nice doctor's kit
text: This is a very nice doctor's kit. My kids love to play doctor. It has a lot of different parts to it, so they can play a lot. It can also help with anxiety when they go to the dr. This kit seemed well made. It has the most common items they would see at the dr's office. It is good for both a boy or a girl. This also makes a good gift. It is nice to do pretend play instead of staring at screens. I would recommend it.

title: Nice, sturdy set
text: This is a nice sturdy kitchen set. My girls love playing in their kitchen, so this was nice. It had a setting for four. Sometimes in the kitchen sets you get a lot of random things, but it was nice to have this set. It feels well made. I like that it is BPA free. The colors are nice. I would recommend it.

title: Very cute playset
text: This is a very cute playset. I have four daughters and multiple play kitchens, so this fit in great. It had a lot of little pieces to it, and my daughters spent a while "cooking" with it. The quality was fine. We haven't had any problems. It has some unusual things compared to other cookware sets, which was nice. The colors are pretty. It is great for pretend play. I would recommend it.

title: The Pieces Fall Off Easily
text: Baby can put the pieces on, but then she tries to hold it up and show me and they fall off...  Should have designed them to push in a little firmer.  Also it is a bit annoying that the colors don't line up, she wants to put each animal on a matching color gear and only half of them have that available.  But it's a cute idea and a cheap toy so I give it 3 stars.

title: Not The Most Durable Of Dollhouses, But It's A Classic
text: My daughter's favorite (and biggest) dollhouse is a wooden one that cost $150 from Costco many years ago.  But these Barbie ones are close seconds.  This is my third Barbie Dreamhouse.  The first two eventually broke and were thrown out, but they are still loved and I keep getting them again.  And over the years, they have been updated a bit, so this one is nicer than my first or second were.

title: My 9-Year-Old Boy Loves It
text: What can I say, this is a giant sword...  I don't like the whole toy sword or toy gun thing, but this one doesn't look anything like a real one and I finally gave in.  He puts it in the back of his shirt (which isn't an easy fit) and walks around with it.  This might be a Halloween costume...

title: They Work Great For Young Gymnists
text: These blocks are softer than the ones in a real gym, but not by much.  They are soft enough not to hurt when thrown, which is a plus.  And the kids can used them for gym practice, or to build forts, or whatever.  The only problem is storage, you have to dedicate a lot of space even if you stack them neatly (and reality is more like a big pile that keeps falling because the kids were too lazy to stack them).  We're still working on that part  :)

title: Not Easy To Set Up, But Man Is This Cool...
text:
Halloween costume of the century! Now, I'm the guy who sets most things up without looking at the instructions, and I needed the instructions and about 20 minutes just to ADJUST THIS THING TO MY SON'S HEAD! I do not recommend sharing it among siblings, that has caused so many readjustments (now they are down to about 5 minutes each with practice, but it's still a pain)! And it's heavy, so it can't be worn for hours.

Having said all that, WOW!! The mouth opens as they talk, the lights are cool, the look is amazing! I want one in my size!

title: My 9-Year-Old Boy Loves It
text: Well who wouldn't...  It's a dinosaur that chases a jeep!  I mean that's really all you need to know, GET IT NOW!

title: My 1 and 3 year olds love this toy!
text: They just spent 2 hours jumping and dancing with it...  And I'm never getting that tune out of my head.  Should I have taken off a star for that?

title: Great for my 9 year old son
text: Okay, I wouldn't have gotten this if I'd known how big it is...  But my son really loves it, so we're keeping it...  I just wish it wasn't always buying my arm!

title: Legos are awesome!
text: My 9 year old boy loves this set.  And I love putting Legos together with him (even if I don't play Minecraft personally).

title: A good toy for my 9 year old boy
text: My son loves this set.  Batman takes on the Joker in style!

title: Lots of fun
text:
My two little kids really enjoyed these puppets. Something as simple as puppets are really fun to play with. They enjoyed them for a quite a while.

I am pleased with the quality of these puppets. They feel well made. They also feel very durable. I think they will last for a while. They are a good size for the kids. They are bright and vibrant and fun. These are nice because they are good for both girls and boys. These would also make a good present. I would recommend them.

title: Very sweet doll
text:
Lovely doll I am very please with this doll. My daughter loves it. It is very cute and looks nice. It just seems a little higher quality than a lot of dolls. The blanket it comes with are cute. I like the features.

It feels well made. It is a good size for her. It looks a lot like a real baby. She has a baby sister, so it is nice for her to have a doll. It is packaged nicely. I think this would also make a nice gift. I would recommend it.

title: Pleased with tutu
text: This is a very sweet ballet outfit for a doll. Several of my daughters are in ballet so it is nice to have a doll that can match them. I am pleased with the quality of the outfit. It seems well made. It has lots of little details. Also, it fit her doll well. I was pleased with it and think it would make a nice gift for a little girl, especially a little ballerina.

title: Great toy!
text: My son just loves this dinosaur. He is 8. It is a great size for him. It is nice to have a small toy that he likes. The dinosaur is very interactive. It is really too small to actually scare anyone, though, and my toddlers haven't had a problem with it. I think it's cute. I think this would be a great gift for a boy. Even my older kids want one. We haven't had any problems with it. It is working as it should without any problems. He is not always the most gentle with things, but still no problems. I would recommend it.

title: It looks cute and the accessories are great too.
text: My toddler loves this baby doll!  It looks cute and the accessories are great too.

title: My baby and toddler both love this. It holds up better than the old ...
text: My baby and toddler both love this.  It holds up better than the old ones with strings.  And the recordings make them laugh!

title: These get damaged too easily, and they don't hold on well so vibrations ...
text: These get damaged too easily, and they don't hold on well so vibrations can make them slip or fall off (like when you open and close the fridge door).

title: My three year old loves this toy. She says ...
text: My three year old loves this toy.  She says "It's time be hero" and presses buttons.  I can tell that she'll get a lot of use out of it in the future because it has functions she isn't old enough for yet too.

title: And the sound is great. Baby loves it
text: Cute toy.  The stick is attached, which is definitely a big plus!  And the sound is great.  Baby loves it!!

title: Kids love to control their own music
text: Kids love to control their own music...  This works well and both my baby and my toddler can use it!

title: Two Stars
text: This is just weird...

title: Five Stars
text: Great "tablet"...  My daughter loves it.

title: Not a good first day
text: The tail keeps falling off, it won't stand up, and the hammers are already lost after being used as weapons.  Not a good first day...

title: The Worst Board Game Idea Ever!!!!!!!
text:
This is a terrible idea. I got this for free and I threw it away! If you can steal money from the middle and not get caught, it's yours! Wait, now I understand politicians! They just grew up on games like this...

Seriously, if you're raising an honest child, this game is counterproductive. I collect Monopoly sets and this one went into the trash after playing one time.

title: Nice pillow
text: This pillow is very soft. It really is fluffy and comfortable. It looks good in a boy's room or would be good for the baseball fan. I liked it a lot. It is a good size. It feels like it is good quality.It seems durable. I am very pleased with it.

title: A Great Set!
text: I love Lego...  I'm not the biggest fan of Ninjago, but my son is and he says this set rocks.  So I let him choose the stars (he wanted a million so I got as close as Amazon would allow me to).

title: Everything Is Awesome!
text: Lego tape?  This is awesome!!  My wife wouldn't let me put it as a border in my bedroom though, so I did my son's room instead.  I got the light switch cover too and then some wall stickers that really made the room!

title: A Good Drone Overall
text: I love drones and I have several.  This one is easy to control and has a great range.  The video isn't quite as good as on my best drone, but in this price range it works great.  The blades fall off easily in a crash, which is a mild annoyance, but again it's not super-expensive.  Overall, it's pretty good.  If this is your first drone, you may do better spending closer to $150 and getting one that hold up better to crashes.

title: It's A Case, It Works, And It Stays Closed
text: Okay, I got this as a freebie and I didn't really need it for what it is.  But in order to review it, I stuck a few of my kids' spinners in there.  It does what it claims.  Now, I think it's silly to buy a case like this for a collection of things that cost 40 cents to make and then sell for between $1 and $25 depending on how flashy they are.  But what I can tell you is that this works well for other things too!  I keep lenses in it (for my optics lab, so I'm talking about the glass from a magnifying glass without a handle and things like that, not camera lenses).  So as a case, it's great regardless of what you use it to carry!

title: Fun toy
text: This is a very cute barn. My little daughter really enjoys it. It is a good size for her to carry around. She is not gentle with toys, but it is staying very nice for her. We had no problems with quality or anything. It feels very sturdy. The animals that come with it are very cute and of course she can use her other animals with it too. I like the size. It isn't too big or too small. One thing that is nice is that it works for both boys and girls. I would recommend it.

title: Very cute
text: My son got very excited about these. He put them on and ran around the house to his four sisters. These were really cute. They are perfect for a little boy. They would go great with a Halloween costume or just for everyday use. He really thought they were great. The girls liked them, too. They were good quality. They held up well to his rough handling. They look just like the picture. They were a good size for him. I would recommend them.

title: Quality toy
text: These are great maracas. I like they they are very easy for the baby to grip. She could easily hold them and use them. It is also nice that they are soft. She will gum on them too. They make a nice soft sound that isn't too overwhelming. No batteries or anything - just nice old fashion rattles. It is nice that it comes as a set. She likes the different textures in them. They are colorful. This would be a nice little gift or something good to put in for a baby shower. The quality is great. They held up without a problem to my baby's rough handling.

title: Fun toy
text:
My kids absolutely love this little food truck. They enjoy pretending to serve up food. It does a lot. They really go back to this toy again and again. It is so colorful. It is just the perfect size for my two toddlers. It does a lot of different things.

We have had many Fisher-Price Laugh & Learn products through the years, and I really like this line. I find the quality is great and the products are fun and educational. They really like the role playing with this. It is a good size - not too big to be overwhelming but a good size for them to play with.

Setup was not too bad and the quality is very good. My toddlers are not exactly gentle but it has held up without a problem. It is so cute with its smiling face. I would recommend it.

title: Sweet doll
text: This is an adorable little doll. It is so cute and sweet. My daughter loves her. It is a good size for her to carry around. It is very soft and just a great size for her. We have many toys from Manhattan Toy and have been happy with them. The quality feels very good and it has held up just fine against my kids' rough handling. My kids love strawberries, so they think this is very cute. I would highly recommend it.

title: Great for teaching kids to clean\
text: This is a very nice broom and sweeper set. I am trying to teach my kids to clean. It is not an easy task and having a toy like this helps. The quality is good. It is pretty and great for a little girl. My daughter likes it a lot. She can actually use it. It can help keep her away from the real thing, which I prefer since it is dirty. It looks just like the picture. It is a good size for her. I would recommend it.

title: Makes a great gift
text:
This is a great set. My toddler daughter really likes it. The music it plays is nice. It is easy for her to grip. She spends a lot of time with them.

I like that this comes with a variety of toys. It would make a great gift. The quality is excellent, as I have found most of Fisher-Price's toys to be. It seems durable, It held up fine to my kids rough handling. I would recommend it.

title: Wonderful toy
text:
This is a wonderful toy. My daughter just loves it. It is really like three toys in one. You get the doll, you get the carrier and then you get an entire vet's kit (which my kids also use as a human dr kit. It really comes with so much. The kids really like playing with it. It is a good size. They can open the case with the front door or the whole thing can open up.

There are many types of dr tools that come with it, including all the basics such as a stethoscope, scissors, blood pressure monitor and more. The quality is fine... it's mostly plastic, but it seemed like it was well made. When I gave it to one kids, two others asked me to buy the same thing for them. I would highly recommend it.

title: Fun toy!
text:
This is a really cute playset. It has a lot of little details to it. I like that it is wood and not plastic like so many toys. The kids just use their imaginations, not batteries, which I think is great. It has a lot of little extras like a little helicopter, a little bell, a truck and so forth.

Everything is well designed and cute. One thing I really like is that it seems to fit a lot in a really small space. With five kids, we have so many toys so it is nice to find something that gives a lot of play value for just a little space.

I took off a star just because it was a little tough (but not horrible) to assemble and also because it is difficult to make the helicopter and people stand. This can be a little frustrating for little ones. But these are minor things and overall the toy is really really cute. I would highly recommend it.

title: Adorable set
text:
My little daughter just loved this set. She loves going after Mommy's purse so it was nice for her to have her own. It has a variety of items, including fake lipstick, a compact with a real mirror, pretend phone, glasses, little change purse that opens and closes and more. She liked taking out each item and putting it back into her purse.

The quality was fine, about what you would expect from a set like this. So far we have had no problems with it.

The set is very cute. It's nice and girly with lots of pink and purples. She loves carrying it around.

This would make a nice gift for a little girl. I was pleased with it and would recommend it.

title: Fun for kids
text: This is a simple game and yet the children just love it. My two year old just sat and played with it for a while. You don't always need a complicated toy to keep the kids occupied; she loves this little surprise game. I was pleased with the quality of this. I would highly recommend it.

title: Highly recommended
text:
This is an adorable toy. First it is so cute. It is a great size for my toddler to hold. Not too huge for her, but nice and substantial. It sings and talks when you press different parts of its body. It is good for both a boy and a girl.

The quality was great. It worked perfectly, and we haven't had any issues with it at all. We have many different toys in the Fisher-Price Laugh & Learn Smart Stages line, and have been very pleased with them. My daughter really likes this toy. I think this would make a fantastic gift.

title: Wonderful doll
text: My son loves this dragon! He is eight and he sleeps with it every night. It looks great. It is big, a great size for him. It seems like a great quality doll. I can tell it will hold up well. It is very soft. He really liked it. He also plays with it with his characters. I have had many products from this company and have been very pleased. I would highly recommend it. It would also make a great gift for a little boy.

title: So adorable
text:
This spy set was absolutely adorable. My kids tried it on right away and loved it. Playing spies is one of their favorite things to do so they loved it. My daughters have tons of costumes (many princesses) but it can be difficult to find something for my son. Both my daughters and son liked this. The set was pretty forgiving... it fit both of them even though they are four years apart (he's 7 and she is 11).

This felt very well made. We have many items from Melissa & Doug and have always been pleased with both the quality and the customer service. I was happy with the quality.

This would make a good Halloween costume as well. My kids loved the accessories that came with it. This would also be a fun gift. I would recommend it.

title: Fun toy for babies
text: This is an adorable little toy. My daughter loves all of the little ribbons on it. She loves to touch all of them. It is soft and a good size for her to play with. It is also a good size for us to take with us when we are going somewhere. I like that it comes with the ring so that we can attach it to the stroller or the car seat. It makes it less likely that we will lose it. It makes a soft rattle sound which she seems to enjoy as well. We have had many different toys from this brand and have always been pleased. The quality was very good and I do not foresee having any problem with it. I think this would make a great gift for an infant. This toy would be good for a boy or a girl. I would highly recommend it.

title: Fantastic baby doll accessory
text: I have five children including three older kids, a toddler and an infant. The older children like to play pretend with their dolls since they see me taking care of my infant daughter. We have a car seat that looks just like this so they enjoy having their own version for their dolls. This is a very nice car seat carrier for dolls. It feels very well-made. The colors are bright and vibrant. It is a good size because it can hold even their larger dolls or they can put several tiny dolls in it. We had no problem with quality. We have many dolls from this brand and have always been happy with their products. It held up fine to my children's rough use. My daughter was walking around with it for quite a while. I think this is a great accessory to go with dolls and would make a great gift for a child who like dolls or who has a new baby sibling.

title: Fun for children to show their magic skills
text: This is a fun little kit that includes a magician's hat, a wand and a bunny. It is very simple for a child to do a pull a rabbit out of a hat trick. There is a hidden compartment in the bottom of the hat so it is very easy for even young children to hide the bunny and make a convincing trick. My child really enjoyed doing this and showing off her magic skills. Of course your child can hide other things in the magic hat. The hat folds flat down which is fun for them to do as a trick and is also good to help store it. It felt like a quality set. There are magic sets that have a lot more tricks but this is a particularly fun one and makes for a nice gift. I am always happy with the quality of this brand. I would recommend it.

title: Great toy microphone
text: My toddler daughter loves this microphone. It plays a lot of different types of sounds and music. She is very picky when it comes to toys and she picks this one up more than the others. We have a lot of Fisher-Price Laugh and Learn toys and I have been very pleased with the quality. I like that this toy encourages her to move around. She likes to dance to it. It is nice and small which makes it very portable. I think this toy will also last longer than a lot of the other toddler toys because an older child would be interested in it too. It is not too loud to be bothersome to the parents. I think this would make a great gift. With five children elementary age and younger we have had many of the toys out there and this one is among my favorites. I would recommend it.

title: Adorable toy
text:
My little toddler daughter loves phones (real especially!) She liked this little bear phone. It is the perfect size for her to clutch in her little hands. She likes the little balls that make it rattle along with all the sounds that come from pushing the buttons. It worked perfectly for us without a problem. The sound isn't too loud or annoying.

It is cute how the bear plays peekaboo. There is a mirror behind it. Kids this age love to look at themselves in the mirror so that is nice. She likes carrying it around and pressing buttons.

It is bright and colorful and would work for a little boy or girl. It is a good toy to bring on the go. It would also make a nice gift. We have tons of VTech products, and I've always been happy with the quality. I would recommend it.

title: Adorable toy
text:
This toy is so adorable. It is so very cute. I have four daughters ranging in age from a baby to an 11 year old and they love it. She is very cute. They love how she moves. She can walk and flap her wings. It is nice that it comes with a character. It can also connect to other Go! Go! Smart Friends characters. Of course you do not need anything else to enjoy this toy.

It lights up. The horn changes color. It's really cute.

It worked perfectly. No quality issues at all. It feels well made, and has been okay to my children's use thus far.

I think this would make a great gift. They love it.

title: This is fun for them to do pretend gardening
text: This was a very cute playset. My kids are interested in gardening but it's hard to get in the garden with them (I have five including two babies). This is fun for them to do pretend gardening. It is colorful and bright. It's plastic but it still feels well made. The flowers come out of the pots so the kids can pretend to plant them. They spent a while playing with them. It's nice to teach them about taking care of things. I would recommend it.

title: Cute design
text: My son likes Paw Patrol and these are very cute plates. They are very bright and vibrant. It looks just like the picture. They are of sufficient thickness to be used. They would work great for a children's birthday party. They looked very nice. We just use them in the house and my children like them a lot better than the plain plates. I like that they are made in the USA. I'm pleased and would recommend them.

title: Beautiful high quality set
text:
This was a beautiful set that was very high quality. These really is a difference between this and a lot of the other things you get that are poorly made. It turned out pretty large. My daughter (along with many other girls) loves horses. She can also play with characters for hours so this was great for play time.

It looked just like the picture. It wasn't too hard to set up. Everything felt very well made. With the quality also comes durability, which I appreciate. It is more money but you get what you pay for. I'd recommend it.

title: Daughter enjoys it
text: My toddler daughter likes this toy. She likes to sit down on it. It can be a little difficult for her to sit on the little stool so you might want to invest in a little sturdier chair. She likes the different colored sheets. She also likes pressing the buttons. It is neat that you can lift the tray to make it more of an easel. I like that it is educational and teaches letters and numbers. She liked the songs. It is cute and works for a boy or a girl. Everything worked just fine with it.

title: As pictured
text: This is a pretty doll. It looks as pictures. No, it is not quite as sparkly/elaborate as some of the holiday dolls in the past, but it is still very pretty. It has the same Barbie quality that I have come to expect. You can use it as display or for your child to play with. My daughter enjoyed playing with her a lot. This is also a good gift for a collector.

title: Amazing kit
text:
This is an amazing LEGO kit. My son loves LEGOS and he loves Minecraft so for him this was the ideal kit. It has so many pieces to it. He can spend hours and hours with it. It is so much larger than any of the other kits he has.

As usual, we are very happy with the LEGO quality. The pieces snap together easily. We have had no problems with breakage or anything. Quality is excellent.

Of course you can use the pieces to make whatever you want once you are done building the pieces. My son is able to follow the instructions. You can display it or a child can then use it in play.

This is an amazing gift for a LEGO fan. I'd highly recommend it.

title: Nice detailed piece
text: This was a highly detailed My Little Pony Guardians of Harmony doll. It was definitely a lot more detailed than the typical My Little Pony pieces. I got this for a child to play with, and it works well for that, but it would also do very nice as a collector's piece to be displayed. It looks just as pictured. It feels nice and well made. It is a quality piece. It would make a good gift for a My Little Pony fan, either a child or adult.

title: Nice wooden toy
text: This is a very nice toy. With all the plastic we have it is nice to have something that is mostly made of wood. It also looks very nice in the house. It is also nice to have a toy that does not have tons of electronics, make a lot of noises or require batteries that will just run out again and again. Even without these things my daughter really enjoyed this toy. Many children can spend tons of time just moving the beads and the little knobs. This was not that big a toy which for me is a plus because we have a lot of big toys that take up a lot of room. You can bring this with you. Still my daughter enjoyed it and spent a while with it. This would be good for a boy or a girl. I think it would make a nice gift as well. It felt very well made and worked just fine. The only assembly was attaching one piece which took just a minute. I would recommend it.

title: Cute little craft
text: This is a cute little craft to make the bunny from the Secret Life of Pets. My children watched the Secret Life of Pets, but I do not think you have to in order to enjoy this toy. It is a pretty simple craft to make. It comes with a small bunny and they attach the "fur" onto it. My daughter enjoyed putting it together and was able to do so herself. The only thing I would say is that it has a hard body so it is not plush like a plush doll. Still she enjoyed making it and then displaying it. I would recommend it.

title: Soft and sweet
text:
This is a very soft and sweet doll. It is a good size, not too big and not too small. My daughter really loved it. It is so cute that it has the rabbit sleeper. She just loved everything about it.

It felt very well made. It felt like a high-quality doll. It looked just like the picture. I think this would be a very nice gift for a little girl that love dolls. I would recommend it.

title: My son just loved it
text:
My son absolutely loved this toy. It is 2 1/2 feet tall and really has quite a presence. He is seven and it definitely seemed perfect for a seven-year-old boy. My son just walked in and told me that it was the best toy in the world. He spent a very long time playing with it. It was extremely easy to put together because he and his older sister did it on their own.

It has a lot of fun features to it. She loves that it has LEDs in his spike. His eyes also light up. It also fires projectiles and ice bombs which he liked a lot. Everything works perfectly with it. He can be a little rough with his toys and this stood up to that just fine. It has a really nice look to it. This is a great gift for any dinosaur loving boy. He was so excited when he got it.

title: Cute Digger
text:
This is a very nice digger for very young children. It is nice that even a very small child can use it. It is very easy for my child to grip because of all of the holes. She can use her little fingers to hold it that way.

It is a nice size for her to play with. She likes putting things into the bucket. It is very colorful and would work for both a boy and a girl. It felt well-made and stood up fine to her rough play. It looked just like the picture. I think this would make a nice gift. She liked to push it around as well. I would recommend it.

title: Nice craft
text:
This is a nice little craft to make a wristlet. It is very easy to do even for a young child because basically it is just coloring. It comes with five markers which is nice because I have found that some of these sets only come with three. My daughter loved the candy and ice cream theme. It is easy to do and it turned out very nice. What is nice is that after the craft your child actually has something that they can use. With many crafts you just come away with a picture or something that is decorative and just takes up space but is not actually useful. It is nice to have something that she can actually use.

I was pleased with the quality of the product. The bag works fine. It is a nice little size where she can carry her crayons or other little items. This would be something nice to throw in a birthday gift basket. I would recommend it.

title: Nice set
text: My son loves to put things together. This is a very nice set with many different features to it. He likes that the legs articulated. It has LEDs that actually work. There are a lot of weapons in it so just make sure that this is okay for you if it is for your child or for a parents if you are giving it as a gift. It comes with two characters which is nice since many sets don't seem to come with any. There are a lot of accessories that come with it. We have a lot of other Mega Blocks so it is nice that you can combine them. The quality was good. The pieces fit together fine. I would recommend it.

title: Great soccer ball
text:
This is a great fun soccer ball. My children really loved all of the bright colors. You really do not see anything like this. It was also very convenient that we were able to easily find it because it was so bright. The other balls got lost far easier. This is also good if your children play in the twilight or as it is getting dark. I have both a son and daughters and they all liked it and liked the colors.

It was a good size ball for my small children. I think it is reasonable for such a nice ball.

The quality was good. They played with it for a while without a problem. It felt well-made and like it would last a long time. It looks just like the picture. I was happy and would recommend it.

title: Great game
text: This is such a fun game. It is great for both children and adults. It is wonderful as a family game but also as a party game. It is amazing how much fun you can have with a simple game. We have played Pictionary for years and this is a fun new version. Each team has a little model to draw on. They can all play at the same time and the first team to guess the answer wins. We just had a blast playing this. I love that the children have to think to play it and use their creativity. It is so much better than them sitting alone in front of a screen playing video games or watching television. This game is great because you can play it for as long as you want. It comes with plenty of clues but you can also easily come up with your own. This is a great twist on a classic game. The quality was fine and allowed us to play without a problem. I think this would make a fantastic gift. I would highly recommend it.

title: Great toy
text:
This is such a creative and adorable toy. You get a Barbie doll that comes with three dresses. One is pink, one is purple, and one is white. Your child can then put them in the spinner and create adorable creations using the paint. I love that it has a lid and the paint cannot spill because it will not spin unless the lid is closed properly.

My daughter just loved this toy. You can wash the dresses and then do it again. It is extremely easy to do. Every time she did it it turned out differently. You may run out of pain but you will always have the doll of course. Once she was happy with the dress she was able to leave it like that. She can then say that she had a dress that she designed.

It works well. We had no problems with it functioning.

I was very happy with the quality of this product. My daughter has many Barbie dolls and they hold up very well to her rough play. They are definitely better than the cheaper dolls. This is a very unique set. I think this would make a very nice gift for a little girl. I was pleased and would recommend it.

title: Adorable product
text:
This is such a creative and adorable toy. You get a Barbie doll that comes with three dresses. One is pink, one is purple, and one is white. Your child can then put them in the spinner and create adorable creations using the paint. I love that it has a lid and the paint cannot spill because it will not spin unless the lid is closed properly.

My daughter just loved this toy. You can wash the dresses and then do it again. It is extremely easy to do. Every time she did it it turned out differently. You may run out of pain but you will always have the doll of course. Once she was happy with the dress she was able to leave it like that. She can then say that she had a dress that she designed.

It works well. We had no problems with it functioning.

I was very happy with the quality of this product. My daughter has many Barbie dolls and they hold up very well to her rough play. They are definitely better than the cheaper dolls. This is a very unique set. I think this would make a very nice gift for a little girl. I was pleased and would recommend it.

title: So cute
text: This is an adorable figure. It is so much nicer than the other pony dolls. You can pose many of its limbs. This is great no matter whether it is a child who is playing with it or whether you are a collector who wants to display it. It is adorable. It looks just like the picture. My daughter loved the chicken cannon. She was able to use it very easily. She thought it was hilarious. The other accessories were cute as well. I was very pleased with the quality of this product. It felt very well-made. It held up to her rough play. She can play with characters for hours and this was a very nice addition to her collection. I would recommend it.

title: Nice ball
text:
My kids love Frozen, as do so many other kids nowadays. They really liked this ball. It is very bright, and the Frozen print looks very good on it.

The ball worked fine. It bounced nicely. It was nice for them to have something that stood out. It is very distinctive. The print is very cute and looks just like the picture. They spent quite a while with it. It's amazing how with all the electronic toys, they can really spend a lot of time with a simple ball. It is fun and so healthy for them to be outside getting physical activity.

I was happy with the quality. It seemed pretty durable and did fine under their use.

title: High quality doll
text:
There is a lot to this little My Little Pony doll. It sure seems like a big step up from your typical My Little Pony dolls. Based on the show, I don't think your kids need to be fans of the show or even the brand in general to enjoy it as long as they like ponies.

The doll is well detailed. Unlike the typical My Little Pony dolls, it has ten points of articulation, which really allow you to pose it as you'd like. This is good not only for children but also for adult collectors who want to display it.

It was easy to display. It felt like a nice quality piece. My daughter played with it for quite a while. She really liked the little accessories that it came with. It was pretty and looked just like the picture. I would recommend it.

title: Adorable puppet book
text:
This soft book/puppet is fantastic. It is just so cute. There is just so much to it. It is nice for my baby to be able to have something that is like a book. Even board books aren't great for her because she'll gnaw on them. This is great because I don't have to worry about that it is completely baby safe.

I love that this can also be used as a puppet. My baby (and older kids) really enjoy puppets, so that is fun. It also has a teether to it as well as a mirror to it, which she loves. It is brightly colored and makes cute sounds. She loves the little animal on it. It has peek a boo windows, squeakers and crinkle pages.

The quality is good. It feels soft and well made.

This would also make a great gift. I would recommend it.

title: So cute
text:
We were happy with this assortment of chalk. The flip flops and balls idea was very cute, and they really liked how it looked. They liked the combo of colors. It made it stand out. There were four nice chunky pieces that will last a long time.

They liked the assortment of colors.

The chalk seemed to be good quality. It worked well.

Chalk is such a great toy. They made hopscotch and pictures and sorts of nice designs. It keeps them busy for so long. It is nice that they are doing something active instead of sitting in front of a video game screen. It is fun and inexpensive, and I would recommend it.

title: Unique set
text:
We were happy with this assortment of chalk. The glow in the dark effect was very cool, and they really liked how it looked. It made it stand out. There were three nice chunky pieces that will last a long time.

They liked the assortment of colors.

The chalk seemed to be good quality. It worked well.

Chalk is such a great toy. They made hopscotch and pictures and sorts of nice designs. It keeps them busy for so long. It is nice that they are doing something active instead of sitting in front of a video game screen. It is fun and inexpensive, and I would recommend it.

title: Cute doll for kids
text:
This doll is for a little girl to play with. For that, it is great. My eight year old daughter is both a fan of dolls and Monster High and she really liked this doll. She loved how it easily transformed to the bat. It has a nice look to it. The quality is fine, although I do wish the top was actual fabric and not just molded in. The quality was fine.

It doesn't come with a strand, and there are concerns a collector might have. Still, for a child, it can provide a lot of hours of play as it has for my daughter. It worked and looked as described. I would recommend her.

title: Pretty and highly detailed
text:
My daughter loves to play with characters. This one really is a big step above your basic My Little Pony characters. It is very detailed and very pretty. It looks just like the picture.

I was pleased with the quality. It felt very well made. My daughter played with it but it can certainly be a display piece. It is colorful. This would be good for fans of the show or girls who just like ponies. I would recommend it.

title: Unique craft
text:
We have a lot of these lockitz kits and this one is adorable. They love that they can use it to hold pics of themselves. They can put other things as well. It is an easy craft and the lockets look really nice. It is very unique. It reminds me of the adult lockets with the same idea.

I was pleased with the quality of the product. My daughters enjoyed it a lot. I would recommend it.

title: Adorable book
text:
I like that this book sends a good message. I like that it is made from 100% recycled paper and printed with soy ink. I also like that it is printed in the USA.

The book is nicely written. It has rhymes and is a charming story about bears who have to overcome an obstacle when their train jumps the tracks. It has a nice lesson, which I think is good for young children to hear.

The pictures are very well done, and are adorable. My children enjoyed this book as a bedtime story. It is an easy read. The book itself felt like it was good quality. We got other books in the series. I would recommend it.

title: I like that this book sends a good message
text:
I like that this book sends a good message. I like that it is made from 100% recycled paper and printed with soy ink. I also like that it is printed in the USA.

The book is nicely written. It has rhymes and is a charming story about dogs needing to join together. It has a nice message about cooperation, which I think is good for young children to hear. They do construction, so my son especially enjoyed this.

The pictures are very well done, and are adorable. My children enjoyed this book as a bedtime story. It is an easy read. The book itself felt like it was good quality. We got other books in the series. I would recommend it.

title: Cute book that sends a good message
text:
I like that this book sends a good message. I like that it is made from 100% recycled paper and printed with soy ink.

The book is nicely written. It has rhymes and is a charming story about a duck delivery service. It has a nice message.

The pictures are very well done, and are adorable. My children enjoyed this book as a bedtime story. It is an easy read. The book itself felt like it was good quality. We got other books in the series. It has some funny parts, which the kids enjoyed. I would recommend it.

title: Cute play set
text:
This is a very cute play set. My daughters really like Monster High. They've watched just about all the movies, and it is very popular with many of their friends as well. They spent quite a while playing with this set.

There is a lot to this set. It is of the science class. It comes with Frankie Stein, one of the most popular characters at Monster High. They can press a button for the frog to hop up and down. The plant "grows." Colors change with hot and cold water. They have a lot of other Monster High dolls and spent a while with this play set.

This would make a nice gift for a Monster High fan. It's much better than just a doll. My kids can spend hours playing with these.

I would recommend it.

title: Lovely craft set
text:
This is a very nice craft set that makes a pretty tiara. It has a base to use for the tiara, beads that sparkle, pom poms in pink, purple, yellow and blue, metallic pipe cleaners in gold, pink, silver, blue and more and more. They can make their own tiara that is very pretty. I really like craft kits that are both fun to make and come out with a pretty nice craft that they can then use.

My daughter enjoyed making the craft a lot. When she was done, she used the tiara to play with. It came out pretty nice. It was not too difficult for her to make on her own. This would be a good craft to do before Halloween or when the child is going to dress up like a princess.

I was pleased with the quality. Everything felt well made. It was fun for her. This would also make a nice gift.

title: Pretty doll
text:
My daughters really like Monster High, and they liked this doll a lot. She is very pretty. The reversible dress is adorable. She looked just like pictured. They liked the little hidden features like the coins under her boots. She is cute and pretty enough that I think that someone who doesn't like Monster High might still like the doll.

The only thing I didn't like is that the top of the dress was molded to the dress. I'm not sure why they did that. The hat was cute.

Overall, the quality was fine. My daughter can spend hours playing with these dolls and this was a nice addition to her collection.

title: Cute little wagon
text: This is an adorable little wagon. It's very tiny, and is goof for my little toddler. She loves putting things in it and wheeling it around. It can tip over, though, if the kids are not careful with it. It feels like a nice quality product. We've had many Radio Flyer products through the years,and find them to be good quality. It was easy to put together. It didn't take any time at all. It wheels well. She likes it and so do I.

title: Nice trike
text:
This is a very nice trike. It didn't take too long to put it together. The instructions were sufficient. It is adorable for a little girl. It seems like very nice quality. It has a nice sleek look and looks more like a real bike than the chunky plastic ones. It is a good size. It feels very sturdy.

My daughter really enjoyed riding it. She has three older siblings but is too young for a bike so this is a nice option for her. She loves her pink bike.

Radio Flyer is a great company and we have had many products from them over the years. I woulf recommend it.

title: Adorable toy
text:
This is an adorable toy. My little toddler daughter just loves it. It lights up and sings. I like that it has an educational aspect to it that teaches counting and more. The songs and sounds are cute. She loves how it dances. It's also a nice gift.

It worked well. It looked just as described. It feels sturdy and has so far held up well to my toddler. I would recommend it.

title: Great kit
text:
This is a great science kit. We love science in my family. This is great because you can see the small items on the screen, which is much easier than having my small kids try to look through a tiny lens. Then you can take pictures that you can show to people. The kids really liked it.

It worked very well. I like that you do not need to download anything onto the phone. You need a smartphone or tablet.

My kids really liked this. I think this would make a great gift because it is something they can really use and learn from and yet they still enjoy it a lot. It's convenient that it comes with a bag so you can bring it with you. It does need batteries, which are not included.

It's nice that it is something that can last for years. We go through so many similar toys, but this is unique. My three older kids of ages 7-11 all liked it. I'd recommend it.

title: Adorable toy
text:
This is an adorable toy. My son loves Cars, as do many other kids. This comes with tons of Lightning McQueen phrases and sounds, over 80 of them. It looks just as pictures, just like the car in the movie. My son loves that it has a flag to control it... that is so much better than a remote control.

It worked very well. We had no problems with its functioning. It felt sturdy and durable. My son loves the different modes, especially Dance mode. He can move in a pretty big area so it would be best if you have this for him.

This would make a great holiday gift too.

title: Great for your little Minion
text: My son loves the Minions so he really liked this little building kit. It is very cute. It was easy for him to do. What is nice is that after you build the Minion you can also use the pieces to make your own creations. He likes that the arm and head move. It was easy for him to do and then he had something to play with when he was done. There are also many other coordinating toys. I was pleased with the quality. Everything fit together as it was supposed to. I'd recommend it.

title: Baby loves it
text:
My little toddler really enjoys this toy. She loves to press the button and watch the balls hop around. It worked well. It is very bright and good for both a boy or a girl.

I also liked that it has some educational value with teaching colors and numbers. I do wish it came with batteries, though. I like the sounds of the different buttons. I also like that you can buy more balls. We have a lot of toys that come with balls and if you lose them it is a real hassle because you cannot get more. It is nice that it is easy to buy more from them.

It worked well. It felt and seemed like a durable, high quality toy. I have no complaints about the functioning of it.

Five stars for fun and educational value.

title: Fun toy
text: This is a fun toy. It comes with two targets and the dart. It's unbelievable how much fun my son had with such a simple game. It worked well and looked nice. It needs a lot of batteries but they came with it, which was nice. You can adjust them to get a good fit. I like things that promote physical activity instead of the kids sitting in front of a screen. You can buy more if you want to play with more players. It felt well made. I'd recommend it.

title: Fun play set
text: I like my kids to have strong role models so I like this set that is made for female superheroes. It has a cool look, and she liked the zip lines. It has the different parts of the school. It didn't take that long to put together. We were pleased with the quality. It was not as huge as some other play sets, which for me is a plus. Now it is not as detailed and complex as some of the other play sets, so it would depend on exactly what you are looking for. It did look like the picture, and was as described. You can buy more of the other dolls to add to it.

title: Fun to build and to play with This toy is ...
text:
Fun to build and to play with This toy is really large - 3 feet tall. It does come in a relatively small storage box though because it is made of so many little pieces. This offers two opportunities for fun - the chance to build it and the chance to play with it.

My son loves to build everything from Legos to K'Nex and more. This was great for him. We built it with him. He really loves spending time to make things and watching this get so big was exciting. Obviously it is a large toy that takes up a good amount of room. You can of course break it down again but then you'd have to build it.

The quality was good. Everything went together just fine. It has its own screwdriver that it comes with. I liked that the box was sturdy because we always end up tearing the flimsy boxes.

Once it was built, he was able to play with it for a while. It has a power forklift as well as a boom arm that can move 360 degrees. It worked fine.

My son just loved it. I think it is a great gift that was fun both in building and playing.

title: Great product that really grows with your child
text:
This was a very good product that really grew with my son. You can use it in one of three ways. Very young kids can just use it as a simple tee to play tee ball. Slightly older kids can have the ball pop up after each other. This is much easier than having the ball thrown at them, but it still gives them a better feeling for real baseball and is more challenging. They really liked that. Finally, they can use it for a ball to be pitched from up to 10 feet away.

This is nice that this product can last so long. It comes with multiple balls. I love toys that get kids to be active. My son (and my daughters) all really enjoyed playing with it. It was very easy to set up and use. It worked just fine. It is made of plastic, but it feels nice and sturdy and durable. We had no quality issues.

I really liked this toy. I think it is also a great gift. I would highly recommend it.

title: Adorable
text:
This doll was absolutely adorable. My daughter loves Minnie as do many kids. It lights up, and she loved that. She lvoed how the bows turn into flowers. Even I was impressed. It really looks nice. It sings and comes with three bows that transform. It also comes with a purse and a wand. It goes over colors.

The quality was good. It is not a supersoft plush doll, though, if that is what you are looking for. It worked perfectly. I would recommend it.

title: Very adorable
text:
This is such a sweet set. We actually have doll from the same company that is similar to the bigger doll. We got it when my daughter was born and it has lasted for many years. This is very sweet.

The dolls are so soft. They are a great size for the little kids. They look just as pictures... so adorable.

It is very durable. The other doll took a lot of abuse and really lasted very well with no problem so I expect the same with this.

I love the concept of a little sister, big sister doll. I actually have 4 daughters so I bought two sets of these (and one big bro doll for my son). The kids really liked having matching dolls. This is a great gift to give when a new baby comes. I would recommend it.

title: Fun but some quirks
text:
This was a fun game overall, but there were some issues. It comes with a variety of educational games. They range in how fun they were, and some could be confusing, but some were a lot of fun.

One of the issues was the response time of the buttons. It could take a while for it to respond. My kids are not the most patient of kids and waiting for the seconds to pass was not great for them. It is not so easy to switch between the games.

It has nine discs but it does not go that far. My kids played with it for a little while but I am not sure how long it will hold their attention. I do like that the discs stored in the wand so they do not get lost.

I think it would just depend on your child as to whether this is a good product for him or her.

title: Lots of fun
text:
My daughter loves playing with characters so this kit that allowed her to make her own characters was great. It was not that difficult to do although I did help her. The one thing I would recommend is to give it plenty of time to dry - you don't want to mess up the creations they made. It has enough to make six pets. You have different options on what to make (dog, owl or cat) and different colors (pink, purple or yellow).

Once they are cast and dry they can decorate them with paints and glitter. My daughter really liked how they turned out. She was very excited to have made her own characters. She then spent a while playing with the characters.

Overall this is a fun craft that has a nice result.

title: Good for both Barbie fans and science fans
text: My daughter loves Barbie. She can play with it for hours. I like this kit because it incorporates science. It has a lot of different pieces that you can put together to form many different models. These can act as a springboard to teach them about different scientific principles. No, it does not have in-depth science experiments like many of the science kits but it does touch on it. She thought it was fun. The quality was good, s Barbie products usually are. I would recommend it.

title: Fun toy for boys or girls
text:
My little one year old loves touching everything, especially things that make noise. This little laptop has over a hundred different sounds and phrases. It covers educational concepts like numbers, opposites, shapes, colors and more. My daughter really likes it.

I like the size of this. It is something we can take in the car or carry with us so that she can play with it on her own. She likes that it folds up and has a handle so she can carry it with her. The little mouse is cute.

This would be great as a gift. One thing that's nice is that it is good for both boys and girls so it can get more use. I like that it will last a few years for her... it will grow with her. Right now she just likes to press the buttons but as she gets older she will absorb some of the concepts.

The quality was good. It worked as described.

title: So cute
text:
This is a very cute toy. My kids love pretending that they are cashiers and ringing people out. They have a lot of other play food that they also use with this. I like that the food is relatively healthy. It makes so many different sounds and phrases and songs and more. It really says a lot; it seems to say a different things every time you push it. They love the pretend credit card. It also lights up.

I like that it is fun and educational. It covers numbers, colors and more. It's nice that it is something my toddler can use but that will still be interesting to her for a few years.

I was pleased with the quality. It worked as described. We had no problems with its functioning.

This is also a nice gift. It is colorful and is one of those gifts that works well for both boys and girls.

I would recommend it.

title: Adorable set with a focus on kindness
text:
I really liked this set as did my kids. My older kids are 10, 8 and 7 and they worked on it. There are eight simple crafts that are pretty easy to make, but which come away with something about kindness. I really liked the idea behind this and thought it was a great lesson.

Many of the crafts are simple and quick. One thing I liked is that it gave ideas that you could make again and again. For instance, I had the other kids make their own little kindness flags. So even when you run out of the material, you can use these ideas for simple and nice crafts.

We love to give little crafts as gifts. I think relatives really appreciate this.

The crafts were varied, cute and creative. It kept them busy for a time. I was happy with the quality of the materials and the instructions. Overall, I am pleased with this kit.

title: Fun for kids
text:
My son really enjoyed this toy. It doesn't just have one thing they can build, but seven different robots. Of course you can also use your imagination to make whatever you want. He thinks it is so cool that it can walk up the wall. It worked pretty decently. Of course you can go into the science of suction and other things as well.

It looked really cool. He really enjoyed putting it together. It had almost 176 pieces. My husband did it with him.

The quality was good. It wasn't too difficult to do if you followed the directions. It worked and looked as described.

This would also make a nice unique gift. I'd recommend it.

title: Sweet teether/rattle/toy
text:
This is a very sweet teether/rattle/toy. It is very soft. It is gender neutral and would work well for a boy or a girl. I like the cloud design, which would work in most nurseries.

The toy is a good size for taking it on the go. The baby can chew on the rings or on the teether. They like to watch the little balls and listen to the rattles. It attaches easily to the stroller, carrier, or anything else that you can attach a clip to. It keeps her busy when she is sitting in the stroller.

I am pleased with the quality. I have a variety of items from Skip Hop and have been pleased with them. I'd recommend this.

title: Great kit with lots of wonderful tricks
text:
I love magic kits for kids. I think this one had so many nice tricks in it. I have five kids, ranging from 10 down and they were able to easily do many of these tricks. They are actually quite impressive for a kit like this.

This kit came with 150 tricks. They range in difficulty, but many are easy even for small kids to perform. My kids can literally spend hours working on these tricks. They also love to put on magic shows for the family.

This is a great gift for someone. I think it is a good value for how much they get out of it. Unlike many other types of craft or science kits, this can be used again and again.

I was happy with the quality of the pieces.

I also think this could be a good investment for a parent to do at a young child's birthday party. You can save yourself a lot of the money of hiring a magician. I would highly recommend this.

title: This toy can be fun for little ones
text:
This toy can be fun for little ones. My one year old daughter loves playing with balls, so it is fun when one pops up. If your child likes to chase and retrieve balls, then she will like this. It worked okay.

There were a few downsides. It was a little large.... more than I thought it would be. I think they could've made it smaller and achieved the same effect. Also, it requires three C batteries. Very few toys need that many... that is a lot and expensive and some people won't just have them lying around the house like the smaller batteries. I think some other toys do a little more, especially ones that are this big.

The toy is cute. It would work for a boy or a girl I think, although a boy might like the green dinosaur idea a little better. Overall, I think it's going to depend on your child as to how much they play with this.

title: Great for Pokemon fans
text: This is great for Pokemon fans. I have a seven year old son who just loves it. He really liked this belt to hold his Pokeballs. He just loved putting it on and walking around with it. The quality was good. He had fun with it and really liked it. I would recommend it for a Pokemon fan.

title: Great toy
text:
My son loves this toy. He likes the Blaze television show but I don't think you have to in order to enjoy this toy.

The toy looks really cool... just like the picture. He loves that you can wear the remote control on your wrist and not just hold it. It reminds him of the show.

The toy can move and also makes sounds. It sounds just like the show.

It worked well. We had no problem with functioning. I also think this is a great gift. I would recommend it.

title: Awesome kit
text:
My son waa very excited about this kit. What is there for him not to love about a robo-jaws thay actually chomps? It has over 100 pieces but he was able to put it together pretty easily. He enjoyed doing that.

It turned out very good. It worked well. He liked how it actually moved.

What is nice is that you can use the pieces to make something else. He loved being creative. The pieces are of high quality. I like that they are made in the US.

This would make a great gift for someone. I'd highly recommend it.

title: Nice craft
text: This is a very nice craft. My daughter really wanted to make herself a stuffed animal. This is a nice version because it is fairly easy even for a relatively young child. Then unlike other crafts she gets something she can really use. She loves how it turned out. It wasn't that difficult for her to do once I showed her. It is soft. It is a nice size. This would also make a nice gift. The pieces seemed well made. We have many Alex toys and have generally been happy. I would recommend this.

title: High quality play set
text:
We have several Schleich play sets and you can tell the difference between these and the other, cheaper play sets. They are just so much more detailed. There is so much to them. The quality is just excellent.

This is a very nice set. It is a good size - make sure you read the exact dimensions so you know exactly what you are getting. A horse stable is a fantastic toy for a little girl because so many kids are into horses and ponies - I know my daughter loves them. She spent a long time playing with this set. It does take a little while to set up, but once it was set up it felt nice and sturdy. It's made of plastic, but it feels very sturdy and well made.

This would make a great gift. She uses her other characters and horses with this set. I can see it will get years of use and would recommend it.

title: Such a fun remote control toy
text:
My son loves dinosaurs and construction vehicles so this toy is just perfect for him. It has a lot of different modes so your child can play with it in different ways. They can use it like a regular rc toy that goes forward, backward and dances. You can also use the remote so he follows you around. My son particularly loves this mode. He can also look to find his friend Revvit.

It worked very well. We had no problem with its function. It feels well made. It also makes a while bunch of sounds and phrases.

This is from the series Dinotrux but we do not watch the show. I do not think you have to watch the show at all to enjoy the toy. Of course if you do, that will make it all the better. It looks very cool regardless of whether you like the series.

This makes an awesome gift. It is a great toy.

title: Great kids camera
text:
This is a very nice kids camera. My kids always want to take pictures, but I worry about them with our nice camera since they are all elementary age or younger. This is great because it has a more rugged design and padding to make it less likely to get destroyed. So far they've done fine with it.

It is a nice shape. It isn't huge but easy for them to hold. It is colorful and bright. We have the blue, which I think would work for a boy or a girl and the pink would be more for a girl I'd say.

It's nice that it has a zoom. No it's not huge at 4x, but a lot of kids cameras don't so that's nice. I love that it is digital so they can take as many pictures as they want. It has stopped them from using up the space in my phone camera.

There are some added features that are really cute. There are little photo effects and collage templates. It even has some games. There's a video and voice recorder. The quality is okay for these things, but they don't care. They just love to have a real camera and have fun. It is very user friendly. You can just use a micro SD card. It does need 4AA batteries... I wish it were rechargeable instead, but it's okay.

I also think this is a great gift. I would highly recommend it.

title: Sweet doll
text: This is a very sweet doll. It is extremely colorful. My daughter loves unicorns (as do many little girls) so it is good for her. You can mix and match parts if you like or leave it as is. It is a good size. It feels very well made. It is nice and soft and comes with a lot of accessories. It might be difficult for some kids to undo and do the buttons, but I'm okay with this because I'd rather them not accidentally come off. It is good for their fine motor skills, as well. This would make a nice unusual gift. The only consideration is to make sure your child keeps all the pieces together because you do not want her to lose a leg or something.

title: Fun and versatile
text:
This is a very nice toy that can be used as a walker, a ride on or just as a toy the baby can play with while sitting down. It is nice to have a toy that can do all these things because it makes it last a lot longer and eliminates the need to have separate versions of these.

This toy is great. Our toddler girl really enjoyed it. We've always used walkers for when the kids are learning to walk - we find it really helps them. There is a lot to this toy with the steering wheel and all the buttons, songs, phrases, and more. A lot of them area learning phrases and teach letters and other sorts of concepts.

It worked well. It was easy to use and everything worked as it should have. With five kids we've been through a lot of toys and we have had a lot of VTech toys. They are of good quality and do a lot.

This toy really got a lot of use. It is something they can use for months, not just years. I would recommend it.

title: Fun set
text:
My daughters really enjoy watching gymnastics on television, so they were very excited about this set. It is very cute. It comes with the grown up Barbie and a little toddler who can go on the balance beam. It's adorable how they can make the baby flip and land on the mat. They just love it.

I am pleased with the quality, as I typically am with Barbie dolls. We have many sets and they hold up well to a lot of use. The dolls look very cute in the outfits. There are other gymnastics sets that you can get to include with it. My daughters can spend hours with Barbie dolls so we tend to get a lot of use out of them. I would recommend this set.

title: Nice baby doll
text:
This is a very sweet baby doll. She comes with a lovely little dress and headband. What is nice about this doll is that while many of these are made for ages three and up, this one is good for younger children. It is a good size for little kids... not too big and not too small. It is lightweight compared to many dolls, which makes it a lot easier for my 15 month old to hold while she is walking around. The body is soft. My daughter really likes her.

She feels very well made. She gets a lot of use and we have no problem at all. It has a sweet baby powder scent. This is just a nice doll that looks just as described.

title: Kids love it
text: My kids love this Dory. They keep walking around with it pretending they are in the movie. They love how she says all these different things. She sounds just like she does in the movie. There are over 50 sounds, which is nice.It looks just like the picture. It feels sturdy and well made. I am pleased with it.

title: A lot of fun
text: This is great for the kids. It is very easy to use. My daughters have dark blonde hair, and the colors came out pretty nice.They like to have different colors, but they are young, so I wouldn't have them actually dye their hair.This is a great option. It's great for Halloween. It came out easily in the shower. I've seen hair chalks before but never one like this where you can use a series of colors. This is really cute and fun. I would recommend it.

title: Kids love Shrinky Dinks
text:
I loved Shrinky Dinks as a kid and now my kids love it too. They really enjoy coloring in the pieces and watching as they shrunk in the oven to become little characters. They are easy to do, but of course require adult supervision for the oven.

This is a great set. It comes with the characters from the Secret Life of Pets. My kids watched and enjoyed that movie, but I think even if your child did not, he or she could still enjoy this set, especially if they like animals. It comes with the colored pencils and everything you need to do it (except of course the heat source).

It is creative that it also came with a the ability to build this little set for the animals. Once they are done with the Shrinky Dinks they set up the set and spent quite a while playing with the characters.They really had so much fun with it. My kids can play with characters forever. The quality was fine, and they enjoyed it.I would recommend this.

title: Fun for my daughter
text:
My daughters love the Barbie dolls as well as the movies. This is a very nice doll that matches the movie. I don't think your daughter needs to like the movie in order to enjoy the toy.

This is a futuristic looking Barbie with a silver holographic vest. Of course there's lots of pink. The accessories look futuristic and cute. It is the same quality I have come to expect from Barbie dolls - very good. My kids can play with them for hours and they stay pretty good. She loves to play space adventures with this one.

They love the pooch that flies. It does require 4 batteries, which aren't too hard to put in, although you do need a screwdriver (which in our house with lots of little kids is good. Depending on how old your child is, they may or may not need help getting the dog going. They really enjoyed making him fly.

Overall, another great toy. I like to sometimes give these to the kids right after they watch the movie as a special surprise. I would recommend it.

title: Does so much
text:
We have four kids with one on the way, so this was great for my daughter. She just loved that it actually crawled like her baby sister. It really does a lot. She drinks and wets and and also talks. She says more than thirty different things.

My daughter really loved her. She thought it was so fun. It came with lots of accessories. She is also a very pretty doll. Some of these lifelike dolls to me look a little strange but I think this one looked very nice. The hair is cute. We had no problem with it functioning. Like the other Baby Alive dolls, it is mostly hard so it's not going to be a super cuddly doll, but it wouldn't be able to crawl and do all the other stuff if it was. They really liked her. I would recommend it.

title: Great for science lovers
text:
We really like science in my family, so I really liked this kit. Whereas many kits have just a handful of activities, this one has over a hundred. They range over a wide area of science and range in difficulty as well. It covers chemistry, geology, biology and many other things. It comes with tons of supplies such as test tubes, powders for the different experiments and more.

The experiments were great. The kids really enjoyed them. I loved how educational they are. I think this is a great gift because it is educational and fun. With everything in there, you can spend hours working on it. We did it together as a family. I liked that after each experiment we can have a family discussion on that aspect of science to teach them even more.

This could also be good for a preschool or elementary school classroom.

I was happy with the quality. The experiments worked well. The kids really loved it when one worked. I would recommend this.

title: Adorable doll
text:
This is a very cute doll. It is a nice size for my eight year old daughter, not too big and not too small. She just loves how it giggles. My daughter has a baby sister and is getting another baby sister so she is happy to have her own.

I was pleased with the quality. It felt nice and durable. It felt soft, which she liked. It's nice that you can take off the sleeper because she has a whole bunch of baby clothing that she likes to put on her dolls. The eyes open and close and the baby powder scent is nice.

She loves the carrier. It reminds her of the one we have for our baby and makes it easy for her to take her baby on the go. I like very much that it is machine washable. My daughter likes it, and we are happy.

title: So sweet
text:
My eight year old daughter just loves dolls. She can play with them for hours. This was a very adorable doll.

She was very happy about a doll that she could take with her into the bathtub. She loved the dolls adorable pink kitty hoodie bathrobe, which is removable. The doll really is cute. I like that you can machine wash it so it can get clean. This is especially important if you take it into the pool. I like that it is made to dry quickly.

The doll had a sweet look. It's eyes open and close. It was a good size for kids of many ages, not too big but big enough for her to enjoy. It also came with a cute washcloth so she could "clean" her doll when she got cleaned.

She really enjoyed the doll. I would recommend it.

title: Kids love it
text:
My kids really love this 3d printer pen. I think it's a good deal. They get such a kick out of it and come away with something they can keep. It comes with a project booklet or they can come up with their own creations. It worked pretty well. They are all different ages, from ten down, but they were able to get the knack of it.
