They were excited about their creations. Of course an adult could do a good job. I think this would make an awesome gift. It comes with some plastic to get you started, and obviously you can buy more although that can add up a little. It is nice that it is wireless. It charged with a USB cable, which is easy.

We were very happy with this product.

title: Cute craft project
text: This is a cute craft project. It is very simple to do. Kids just  attach the little pieces of fabric to the Styrofoam mold. Because it is Styrofoam, it is not a soft doll like you would get in the store so don't expect that. But it is easy to do and then they get a cute little dog. It's hard to get perfect, but my daughter was happy with how it turned out. She loves little puppies and dogs, so this was perfect for her. We've seen The Secret Life of Pets, but I don't think you would've have to in order to enjoy this. It kept her busy for a while and once I got her started she was able to do it on her own. I would recommend it.

title: Nice beginning art kit
text: This is a nice beginning art kit. There are six crafts that are easy for little kids to do . It's a nice rainy day activity. I have five kids so it is nonstop go in this house. This kept them busy for a while and came out with cute little crafts in the end. We have many many Alex toys and the quality is fine. I like that this is a toy that lets them express their creativity. I also like that it has something that they can keep for when they are older. I would recommend it.

title: Fun set
text: My daughter is a big fan of Barbie Dolls, and she loves this set. It is so cute that it comes with a dog that can swim and a puppy that can go on its back. She loves to fill the pool. We do it in the bathtub to minimize mess. The doll is very cute. Everything is up to the typical Barbie quality, which I find to be very good. We have a lot of Barbie dolls and sets and this one is great. She spent quite a while playing with the dolls and the dog. She liked to pretend that they went off the diving board. It is just as described. I would recommend it.

title: Fun for tape-lovers
text: If your kids are like mine they love tape. They can go through an amazing amount of it very quickly. This tape town was cute. It comes with lot of tape and cardboard. They spent quite a while putting it all together. They thought it was a lot of fun. It comes with a lot of cut-outs for them to make their "town" They spent quite a while and really enjoyed using their creativity to make it. Once they were done, they played with their characters on it. Also, just so you know, there is some confusion in the description... this is for the tape town. The price is reasonable for the amount of fun. Quality was also fine. I would recommend it.

title: Fun and good for fine motor skills
text: My son really enjoyed this toy. It has a bunch of different vehicles that they can then string together. He loved putting them together and I think it is really good to help with kids' fine motor skills. Once they are together (or even when they apart) the kids can then play with them for a while. It got a lot of use. They are colorful and vibrant. I would recommend them.

title: Fun craft
text:
We did this first at a children's museum so it was nice to see a home version of it. It is a fun craft in which you use the marbles to make your artwork. My daughter really enjoyed doing it to create her pieces.

It has everything you need to get started, including paper, brushes, paint, marbles, spoons and more. It was pretty easy to do. It created unique art that looked really nice. It seems to be a reasonable deal for a nice craft. My kids spent a while on it. I would recommend it.

title: Nice storage option
text: I have a daughter who considers herself an artist. She produces one piece of art after the next. This is a very nice place for her to store her work. We simply don't have enough refrigerator/wall space to store it all. This is a nice option. What is nice is that it is large enough to accommodate rather large pieces of art. There are 9 pockets so she can separate work. The quality is fine for the price. I would recommend it.

title: Great kit
text:
This kit is a lot of fun. My seven year old son was very excited about it. You can set up four different races. They LOVE the loops. There is not a tremendous amount of straight track to this, so you might want to consider adding this with a different kit. It comes with only one car; it would've been nice if they'd added a second.

The booster is really cool, and really ups it. They got the cars to go really fast, which my kids just loved. It didn't take too long to set it up. My husband did it with my son. Depending on how old your child is they may need help. My older girls enjoyed it as well.

It does require D batteries.

I was very pleased with the quality. Everything stayed together very nicely. I was very happy, and so was my son.

title: Lots of rainbow
text:
This is a very pretty little dollhouse. It really is so colorful with all the beautiful designs. My daughter already has the mermaid and the set with the little rainbow dolls so this is perfect for her. Of course your daughter can use any of her Barbie dolls with it.

I am happy with the quality. Assembly wasn't too bad. It has a lot of rooms and features, including a bed, bath, eating area and more.

It is a relatively small dollhouse compared to the Townhouse and some other ones. If you are looking for something that they will enjoy that takes up less space, this is good. There are other options if you want something gigantic.

Of course my daughter loved it. My daughter can spend just hours and hours playing with her dollhouses. She just loved the rainbow one. It also looked very pretty in her room. I would recommend it.

title: Cute seat, doesn't fit every table
text:
This is a very cute seat for baby dolls. My daughter just loves dolls and she really liked being able to attach this to the table and have her dolls sit next to her to eat.

Note that this does not attach to every table. It fits on my smaller kitchen table but not on my dining room table. So it will depend on what type of table you have. It can be a little wobbly in, but it's okay. It doesn't hurt the table at all. For us, it works fine.

She really enjoyed it. It is not too big and will fit many of her dolls. I would recommend it.

title: Nice to see a toy that doesn't involve fighting or weapons
text:
I have a seven year old boy who likes to play with these sorts of play sets. Unfortunately it seems like every play set you get nowadays involves weapons and fighting. Even if they are still the good guys, it is still about violence, even for young kids. I like this toy because it is only about peace and helping people. Still, it is action based and keeps him happy.

This is a nice Rescue Bots set. I don't think you need to like or even know the Rescue Bots to enjoy it - I think kids can just enjoy it as a firehouse play set. It has lots of nice features to it - a rescue motorcycle and launcher, a pop-up command center and a projectile launcher (not a weapon, but to put out fires). Kids can play on both sides.

I was happy with the quality. It seemed very nice. My son spent a while playing with it. My girls always love to play with their dolls and characters so it is nice for my son to have something that allows him to join in. I think this would be a good gift. It comes with a figure, which is nice because it seems like so many sets nowadays come with none. WE were very happy with it.

title: Great toy teaches a variety of concepts
text:
This is a very nice toy. I have five young kids and they enjoy it a lot. It is nice because it has three modes of play so that it works for kids of different ages and levels. One of them focuses on letters and words, another with rhymes and then there are also some games.

There are a variety of concepts taught, from learning to identify letters and first words to rhyming and phonics. The turtle idea was very cute. My daughter really enjoyed this toy and spent a while with it. It was both educational and fun, which I really like. It is a good size for them to hold.

It worked just fine. We had no problems with it. This would make a nice gift for someone. The older kids have tablets but we are afraid to give them to the little ones because of how delicate they are. This is a nice learning toy. I would recommend it.

title: Adorable and sweet
text: This is a very adorable toy. It is very soft. The baby got a big smile when she saw it. It is such as adorable design that would be good for a boy or a girl. It has a nice neutral design that would work in many different types of nurseries. I love the little cloud and it was so soft. When you pull the middle thing it vibrates back - the baby thought this was wonderful. It has a hoop to attach it to your stroller or wherever you want. This would make a nice baby shower gift. There are a lot of coordinating pieces you can get if you wish that look nice with it. I was happy with the quality of the piece - it felt very well made.

title: Nice dolls
text:
My kids (ages 1 through 10) love Peppa Pig. They have watched the show quite a bit (at one point there was oinking all day in my house). This is a nice set of two dolls of the main characters. They look really nice and are soft. They are a good size - big enough for the kids to play with but not too huge.

They made cute sounds and phrases when you push on the tummies. The sounds come out cute and sound like they do on the show. My kids really like this feature. They also wiggle, which my kids really enjoy. My kids liked them a lot.

One of the dolls had batteries, but you have to put in the other one.

I would recommend them.

title: Great tool to teach how to tie shoes
text:
This is a good tool to teach a child how to tie his or her shoes. It comes with four "shoes" and laces on them. They are cute.

The shoes are very soft, so I would make sure you don't have a young child biting them. My son liked me to tie the shoe around his feet; he thought that was very funny. I'm not sure how much fun or enjoyment we would get out of this once the child can tie his or her shoes, however. This is a good learning tool, but it might have a limited life. Overall, it is good for what it is meant to do.

title: My son really enjoyed this
text:
With over 300 pieces, this provides quite a bit of enjoyment for my son. The building blocks are well made and went together well. We have a variety of these Mega Blocks sets, including several other Ninja Turtle sets. It is nice that you can connect this with the other Ninja Turtle sets. We have been very happy with them.

The Ninja Turtles is great for my son. He loves them, even though I haven't yet shown him the latest movie. Because of the popularity of the movies, many kids are very into them. This would make a great gift for a boy.

My son was able to do this on his own. He just loves doing them. I also think these sorts of toys are good for his fine motor skills.

This layer looks really nice. There is a lot to it, and it is on multiple levels. Obviously your child can use his imagination to build whatever he wants. It has a lot of cute features like a zip line, swing rope and a action block in the floor.

There's a lot of different pieces that come with this set, and you can then use those to build what you want. I was happy with the quality. I would recommend these.

title: My little daughter would love a real pet
text:
My little daughter would love a real pet, but we have five kids and I have allergies so it's not happening any time soon. A doll can't substitute for a real pet, of course, but this is really as close as you are going to get. We have had several of these FurReal pets and they really are the closest thing you can get.

It is very cute. It looks just like the picture. It is a good size.

It really just seems so lifelike.She makes cute expressions. She can move and makes very realistic meows. Her fur is very soft although because of all the mechanisms to make her move she is not really plush. She is hard underneath.

My daughter just loves her. She will play with her for a long time. I would definitely recommend it as a gift.

title: Cute and easy craft kit
text:
This is a very nice craft kit. It is cure and very easy for kids to do. There is not a lot of mess like with some other crafts. We have a bunch of kits from the same company and have been pleased with the quality.

This was very easy so even young kids can do it on their own. This would also be good for a party. The stickers are bright and colorful. This kept my kids busy for a while and they enjoyed it.

title: Beautiful set
text:
This is a very fine set for children. My daughter loves to play with characters and can literally spend hours at it. She also likes horses as many young girls do. This is a lovely set. It feels so much nicer than the inexpensive sets we usually get. Everything is very nicely detailed.

There is so much to this set. They can set up an entire horse show with all the fencing. It comes with multiple horses and riders as well as shrubs, an entrance arch, show jumps and more. It kept my daughter entertained for quite a while. She really enjoyed it and could use it to play with her other characters as well.

It does not take that long to put together and the instructions make it easy. Of course she can then customize it as she likes.

I would recommend this set.

title: Great craft for kids
text:
We have many of the different Lil Lockitz kits. This one is very nice because it is so big and includes many different pieces to make 19 lockets. It is great for a party, or in my case, a house with four daughters. With all these pieces there are so many combinations the kids can do to make themselves the lockets. They can make many different items, including bracelets, necklaces, key chains and more. There are many different backgrounds, charms, etc. from which to choose.

It was easy for the kids to do. This is a nice craft in that it is both fun to do and gives them something in the end that they can actually use. So many crafts result in a "decorative" piece that really doesn't do anything. This is nice because they can then wear their jewelry.

I was happy with the quality. The kids really liked the project and it was good for their creativity. I would recommend it.

title: Cute doll
text: This is a very cute doll. Its dress lights up, which my daughter really likes. Evie is one of the main characters of Descendants. My kids love the movie and are looking forward to the next one. I also like that this doll comes with so many accessories such as the arm cuffs, the shoes and the hair accessory. I think the quality is very good. She spent quite a long time playing with it with her other dolls and characters. It looks just as described. This would make a nice gift for a girl who is a fan of the movie, as many kids are. I would recommend it.

title: Great for Descendants fans
text:
My kids love Descendants, and they love Mal, the main character. This is a very nice character to go along with their games. My one daughter can spend hours playing with dolls so this one is great.

This doll has a lot to it. The big thing that differentiates it is that its dress lights up. It looks very pretty, and she really likes it. It also comes with multiple accessories - hair accessories, multiple bracelets, arm cuffs and more.

I am pleased with the quality of the doll. She feels well made and took some rough play.

This would make a great gift for a Descendants fan. I would recommend it.

title: Lots of fun
text:
This is a very unique toy. My toddler really enjoys it. She tends to enjoy things that are more like real life things and not as much like toys. This so so cute because it has so many songs and phrases in it. I like that it has three different modes so your child can use it in different ways and it can be more age-appropriate as they grow. The pieces that come out are very cute.

I was happy with the quality of the item. We actually have a lot of the products from the Fisher-Price Laugh & Learn line (the home, the chair, etc.) I really find that they are a step above many of the other toys as far as how much they do.

It worked fine. It was easy to use and we had no quality or safety issues.

I also think this would make a nice gift. I would recommend it.

title: Promotes creativity and ingenuity
text:
This is a very nice kit. It has many different parts that can be used to make one or several flying machines. There are many things such as little rockets, paper, straws, a propeller and more. Your child can be creative to create something themselves.

The reason I didn't give it five stars is because I think it was a little too self-guided. I wish they had given more step by step instructions for building more things so that the kids would at least have the option of using them. Obviously, they could always decide to build something themselves, but I would have liked the option of a machine that actually glided or flew a little. This would be especially good for the younger kids. Without the instructions, your child might put something together that looks great but it still might not fly.

Still, I loved all the parts it came with and I think it is reasonably priced. I think my kids got enjoyment out of it, and I liked them using their minds. I would recommend it.

title: A lot of fun
text: This is fun for the kids to do. They can design and build robots. Now the thing is that these are non-motorized robots. It's very important for people to be aware of this because a lot of people will automatically assume they are automated. They can make several different robots at once, but not a ton. I do love how it comes in a very sturdy plastic box that is very easy to reuse. Many of these kits come in cardboard boxes that get immediately destroyed so this is a plus. It comes with different parts and the kids can use their imaginations. Depending on your child's age they may need help. The story book is a fun addition, and my child enjoyed it. The pieces are plastic. I would recommend this kit.

title: Good for innovation and creativity
text:
This is a nice kit. The kids liked the idea of being able to create their own robot. It has many different parts so they can really be creative to design the robot as they like. They had a lot of fun doing it, and it is very reasonable for a craft kit that makes a robot. For that alone, I would recommend it.

There are a few things that could've been better, but again, I wouldn't really expect it at this price. Cardboard was used for some things. Also, the robot didn't really do a lot. The parts worked okay but they were not super sturdy. But again, for what you pay it is very reasonable and nice.

My kids really enjoyed it. I also think this is very good for getting kids interested in engineering and robotics. For that alone, I like it. Also, I think this would be a very unique gift. I would recommend it.

title: Fun craft kit
text: This is a unique craft kit for kids. It comes with different components to makes bridges. Most of them are cardboard. Though the cardboard was thick it would have been nice if they were made of something a little sturdier. They were able to make different types of bridges and use their creativity to construct them. Your child's age and skill will determine how sturdy they end up being and whether they can actually play with them with their characters or whether they more become display pieces. They did enjoy it. The booklet was all right; it could have been a little more descriptive. It did keep them busy for a little while and was a relatively inexpensive kit. Overall, it was cute, and would make a nice gift.

title: Fun kit
text:
We have a variety of kits from this company, and we have been pleased with them so far. This Super Shoes one is a lot of fun. It has different parts to it. For instance, they can decorate a mini shoe. It also has different things to allow the kids to decorate their own shoes. They can make their shoes look like Superhero shoes and more. It is easy to do and fun for the kids.

I like that this is both a fun craft and produces something the kids can actually use. So many of the craft kits produce just a decorative item that isn't really useful. With this, the kids can attach the crafts to their shoes and enjoy them beyond just making the craft.

I was pleased with the quality of the kit. Everything seemed well made. It has been that way with the other kits I have received from the company. The kids liked it and were able to do it with minimal help. I also think these sorts of things make great gifts. I would recommend it.

title: Great for girls
text:
My daughter loves to play with characters. She especially loves little girl characters. This is just perfect for her. She loved all of the little dolls in this set. They are very bright and colorful and make a rainbow. We have many Barbie dolls and the quality is definitely far better than cheaper versions of the dolls. My daughter just screamed with excitement when she saw the dolls. They all have little tiaras or bows in their hair. The dresses are varied and pretty.

This makes a really nice gift. It just looks very pretty. My daughter was so excited. We have five kids so it's great for a family with lots of kids. I would highly recommend it.

title: Awesome dolls
text:
My daughter loves to play with Barbie dolls... she plays with them for literally hours. This is a great set with a doll and a horse that actually dances. We have many sets but I think this is the first one that dances on its own. She loves this feature. It is very cute and kept her occupied for quite a while. She really likes it and includes it in many of her games. I also think it would make a fantastic gift.

The doll and the horse are very cute. She plays with it both with and without it dancing. Like the many other Barbie dolls we have I am very pleased with quality. It worked just fine. It runs on batteries, so do not forget these. You have to add them. You can brush the hair of both the doll and Barbie, which my daughter liked.

She was happy and so was I.

title: Got a wow from my son
text:
My young son just loves this. It is a combo of two of the things he loves the most - the Ninja Turtles and building blocks. There are over 400 pieces in the set, so it took him a while to do. I like that it kept him busy. He really enjoys putting together these things and can follow the instructions himself even though he is young. I like these because I feel they are good for his fine motor skills. It also helps him learn how to correctly follow instructions and keep on track with one things.

This is neat that it comes with LED lights and sounds. Most of our building sets do not have features like that. My son really loves that. It has many other small details and features as well, such as forklift arms, a sewer cap launcher and a net launcher. All of them worked okay.

He really enjoyed playing with the truck once it was made. He has other Ninja Turtle sets so this went perfectly with them.

I was happy with the quality of the product. The pieces fit together fine and felt well made. My son has a variety of sets form Mega Blocks and we are typically happy.

He really enjoyed this. I also think it would make a great gift. I would recommend it.

title: Great toy for Ninja Turtle lovers
text:
This toy is great for my son. He loves Ninja Turtles, and he loves building sets so it is just great. What is nice about it is that he can change things to build it as it likes it. It comes with four characters which is very impressive. I find that so many of these sets come with none or just one so it was really nice that it came with four so he could really play with it. His two older sisters played with it with him.

There are so many features and so much to this toy. It has LED lights. It has a wall that revolves and a zip line from a crane. There is a sewer cap launcher. It's also nice that you can combine it with other Mega Blocks sets. We also have the Mega Blocks Ninja Turtles truck.

There are a lot of pieces to it, which is great. It really kept my son busy for a long time. He was able to do it himself, which is very nice. The pieces fit together well and felt like they were good quality.

He loved it. It would make a nice gift.

title: They turned out great I really liked this craft kit
text:
They turned out great I really liked this craft kit. It is very easy for young children to do. I like that they individually wrap each puppet in its own bag with the bag and the stickers. This helped keep it together and let them end up how they looked. It was easy for the kids to do. It didn't take a long time and was a pretty quick and easy craft. It is mess free because it is stickers. It also comes with a big glue stick. We had plenty of glue left for after.

The puppets really turned out great. They looked very nice with all the pieces.

What's great about this kit is that once it is done the kids have something they can really play with. So many of the craft kits just leave kids with a decorate item but there really is nothing to do with it. With this, they now have fun puppets to use with puppet shows.

The pieces felt like quality pieces. This would also be a nice craft to buy for a party. I would highly recommend it.

title: Wows my son
text:
I have a seven year old son and this toy is perfect for him. First of all, it looks really cool. Green is his favorite color and he really fell in love with this cool looking RC vehicle with all the claws. What this RC toy can do really is impressive. Whereas many of his other RC toys get stopped by the smallest obstacle, this can really scale some impressive obstacles. We use is mainly inside but it is also great outside to go over rough terrain. He likes to make it a little obstacle course and watch as it roams over things.

I like that it comes with rechargeable batteries and a charger. We go through so many batteries on things like these that the costs really add up. Plus we don't end up changing them half the time. Charging it is far easier - and cheaper.

He loves the tail on it. He says it is very cool.

I think this would make a great holiday or birthday gift.

I was happy with the quality. It looks and works as described. We didn't have any issues with the function of the product.

We were very pleased and would recommend this (and so would my son). Also, my two older girls and toddler girl liked it too.

title: Amazing product for Monster High fans
text:
My children (ages 10, 8 and 7) love Monster High. I think they've seen all of the movies, many of the multiple times. Their friends love them, too, and we've been to more than one Monster High-themed birthday party. This is an amazing toy for kids who like these characters.

It really is large an impressive. It is so big that they can play with multiple dolls at once. There is so much to it - many different features and details that my kids really enjoy. For instance, you can clip the doll so that it hangs upside down in the vampire room. There are many of the different scenes from the movies. My middle daughter can play with her characters all day long, and she really loves this doll house.

I would say this is best as a gift for someone who is a fan of the movie and shows. It is not your typical sweet dollhouse because Monster High is of course about monsters. It comes with 14 clips, which is nice.

Assembly wasn't too bad, and I am happy with the quality.

It does fold down (to an extent) and we store the dolls in it when we do. If your kids love Monster High and dolls, they will love this set.

title: Fun set
text: My eight year old daughter loves to play with characters. She thinks this set is great. She loves the little beauty salon set up. She has tons of Barbie dolls so they took turns getting their hair done. It's a good size - not too big, but she spent quite a while playing with it. We are always happy with the quality of Barbie dolls compared to similar dolls. I like the little accessories and features that it comes with. They get so detailed with these. This would make a great gift for a kid who likes Barbie, too. She likes pretending to wash her Barbie's hair and then makes them into little braids and other hairstyles. Great set.

title: Son loves it
text:
My seven year old son loves Batman and big figures so this was great for him. He has several similar items and he just loves to play with the.This one is cute because it is pretty large for him - over a foot tall. Also, it's chest opens up and there is a two inch Batmobile that can launch out. It comes with the figure, which is good since so many of these large sets seem to come with no figures nowadays. Of course you can buy more figures and there is even room to store them in the legs of this product.

The quality was fine. Of course it is mainly plastic, but it felt sturdy. It lights up and makes sounds but he enjoys it even without those.

For fun, I give it five stars. He spent quite a while playing with it. I also think it would be a great gift and would recommend it.

title: Great science kit for young kids
text:
This is a great science kit for young kids. We love science in our family, and it is important for me to instill this in my kids from a young age. This is a great kit to get started. It comes with child-friendly equipment for a variety of experiments. It is for very young kids - preschoolers and kindergartners - but my older children did it and enjoyed it too. It's a great way to introduce them to science. I love that it comes in a sturdy bucket. Usually these sorts of things come in boxes that seem to get ruined so quickly. The bucket really keeps everything nice. You can then reuse some of the equipment for other experiments such as the hand magnifier. I was very happy with the quality. You do need a few things that aren't included but most of them are things you will probably have anyways like milk and vinegar.

My child really enjoyed this. I also think this would make a great gift. I'd highly recommend it.

title: Educational and fun
text: We have had many versions of this through the years, and this one is great. It has magnets the children can put into the slot to hear information such as numbers and more. My toddler daughter loved putting the pieces in and out of there. Also, whereas so many toys get put away this is nice that we can just keep it in the fridge for her to explore. It's not too big, although there are a good amount of magnets. It works great - no quality problems at all - and is easy for the young ones to learn. For a younger child you would do it with them and the older kids can do it themselves. They love the cute little puppy on it. It is not too loud of obtrusive like some of the other toys. We are very pleased with it.

title: Adorable toy
text:
This is an adorable toy. The baby just loves it. She is just over 1. It is very cute. She loves all the buttons and sounds that they make. She's a bit young to learn numbers but I like this feature and think it will be great once she gets a little older. It was easy for her to use and worked very well. I like very much that there are two volume settings so that it doesn't have to be as loud. It worked very well. There were no quality issues. The sounds it makes are cute and not annoying. She seems to really enjoy it. It's cute that it can sit up as well.

This would be good for both boys and girls. I think this would make a very good gift for a toddler or a young child. We have many LeapFrog products and we are usually happy with the quality. I would recommend it.

title: Fun kit
text:
My son opened up this kit as soon as he got it and started making it. It is a very nice superhero mask kit. Whereas so many of the superhero masks are made of paper, this one is made of felt. It definitely made a difference in how it came out and I'm sure how long it will last. It really turned out very nice. Of course they can use their imagination to make it as they like. The quality is very nice. The glitter glue makes it look very nice. It also comes with felt shapes and sheets.

Once my son was done, he spent quite a while playing with it. IT's not cheap, but it's something that he can keep and use. I would recommend it.

title: Fun with his cars
text:
My son has a huge collection of matchbox cars as I'm sure many kids do. He really likes this Matchbox Elite Rescue Squid Marine Boat. It fits a lot of his little cars. He likes the arm that grams the squid. It is neat that it can be used on water or outside. He will play with it in the bath.

It feels pretty well made. We had no problems with quality. The helicopter isn't fancy but it squirts water as does the squid. Again, this is fun for the bath (or the pool). He uses the ramp for his cars.

It is a good size, which he likes. It is unique and fun to use in different ways. I also think this could be a good gift. I would recommend it.

title: Another great Laugh & Learn product
text:
We have a wide variety of Laugh & Learn products and have really been happy with them. I love how interactive this is. I think the babies find it fun and I find it educational for her. I love that it is a globe. I can even use it to help teach my older kids about the world. It has different animal buttons and and teaches about colors, continents, animals and more. They can spin the globe. There are also songs and other sounds.

My one year old daughter really enjoyed it. She liked to spin it and push the buttons. she liked the sounds it makes.

It worked very well. We had no problems as far as quality. It was a nice product.

title: Daughters love it
text: I have three daughters (and another on the way) so this was right up our alley. It is such a nice playset. It is large and has different rooms in it. My daughters really enjoy Ever After High, but I think even girls who aren't big fans on the show would enjoy it. What is neat is that you can flip the wall to change it between a castle and a high school. They really like this feature. They like the bridge a lot too. Many of the dollhouses only fit very small characters so this is nice that it fits the larger dolls. It also does fold a bit, which is nice. Many of these don't fold at all, so that is nice. The furniture it comes with is nice too. We were pleased with the quality.

title: So much to it
text:
We have a wide variety of Lead Frog toys, and this one is great. It has different modes. It can be more educational by teaching numbers or play music. There are more than fifty sounds on it.

My kids really spent a long time on this. I think this is nice because it is a toy that can last a while unlike other toys that the kids grow out of quicker. I have four kids and even the older ones enjoyed playing with the toddler on it. She loved jumping around to the music. I thought it was also helpful with coordination and cause and effect.

It worked very well and as advertised. We didn't have any quality issues or anything.

This really is a lot of fun. There is a game where they have to follow the instructions on it. This was fun for the kids. They can also just play as they like.

It is a good size. It really seems nice. This could also be good for a party with very young children.

title: Fun for the kiddies
text:
This is a very fun toy that can be used for kids to sit on, ride on or just play with. My daughter just turned one and enjoys it. You can push the nose and it lights up and plays music. She really enjoyed that a lot. It also has number buttons for its mane. These light up and have some educational value as far as numbers and colors.

She likes the balls. You can put the balls in the lion's mouth and then they come out the bottom. It makes sounds when this happens which she likes. She likes to scoot and ride on it.

We are happy with this little ride on toy. The balls add a cute element to it. It worked just fine without a problem. It's mostly plastic, but I am happy with the quality. I would recommend it.

title: Unique toy
text:
My daughter loved this toy. A flying carpet toy is so much fun. She doesn't have anything like it and I've never seen anything like it. It's great for kids who enjoy the show but even if you don't, it's still very nice. It comes with the two dolls, Shimmer and Shine, and their magic carpet. It's not too big, but a good size. It's large enough for them to play with but not too large to take up too much room. It doesn't actually fly, of course, so make sure your kids realize that before they see it and get excited that it does.

The quality is pretty good. It says many different phrases from the show, which my daughter liked. It worked very well.

The dolls are very cute and look just right. I would recommend this toy.

title: Enjoyable kit
text:
This is a very fun locket making kit. It is like the adult version I have myself. My kids really enjoyed making their own little lockets. It was pretty easy to do. They had different cut outs that they can use to make their own lockets. Of course when they are done they have something to wear. It makes three of them.

It didn't take too long to do this craft, so it is good if you want something for a relatively small amount of time. I wouldn't put anything in there that is very valuable or that they wouldn't be upset losing if it accidentally opened.

These come in different types. This one is the rock star kit, which is great for kids. My daughter wants to be a rock star (as do many kids) so this worked well for her. Of course you can mix and match with the different kits from the same brand. I think this would also make a good gift as well.

title: Fun kit
text:
This is a very fun locket making kit. It is like the adult version I have myself. My kids really enjoyed making their own little lockets. It was pretty easy to do. They had different cut outs that they can use to make their own lockets. Of course when they are done they have something to wear. It makes six of them.

It didn't take too long to do this craft, so it is good if you want something for a relatively small amount of time. I wouldn't put anything in there that is very valuable or that they wouldn't be upset losing if it accidentally opened.

These come in different types. This one is the sweets kit, which is great for kids. My daughter (like most) loves sweets and thinks this was a fun subject. Of course you can mix and match with the different kits from the same brand. I think this would also make a good gift as well.

title: Fun for kids
text:
This is a very fun locket making kit. It is like the adult version I have myself. My kids really enjoyed making their own little lockets. It was pretty easy to do. They had different cut outs that they can use to make their own lockets. Of course when they are done they have something to wear. It makes six of them.

It didn't take too long to do this craft, so it is good if you want something for a relatively small amount of time. I wouldn't put anything in there that is very valuable or that they wouldn't be upset losing if it accidentally opened.

These come in different types. This one is the pets kit, which is great for kids who like animals. I think this would also make a good gift as well.

title: Daughter loves this
text:
There is so much more to this than I first thought. My daughter, who is eight, and my son, who is 6, have already spent hours with this kit. They really love it.

It has a big portfolio, which they can use to store their work. My artistic daughter generates a lot of artwork so this is really great. Also, it comes with a whole lot of papers to make collages with as well as tissue papers, embellishments, little crayons stickers and more. The crafts are very easy and would be good for very young kids, but even my kids who are a little older are enjoying them. everything feels very well made and works well.

The paper is sticky at the top, making it very easy for the kids to create collages.

They really enjoyed this kit. I would give it more stars if I could.

title: Great kit
text:
This is a very unique kit. You'll find a million chemistry and physics kits but this is really different in that it deals with nanotechnology . This is a great kit for someone who is very interested in science. It is so much easier for the kids to learn about these subjects when they can do hands-on activities as compared to just reading about it in a book, especially a subject as complicated as nanotechnology.

My daughter really liked these experiments. We did them with her because nanotechnology is a complicated subject. It is very important in science, though, and this is a great introduction into it.

There are over 40 experiments in this. It comes with a large manual to explain it all. We have had other kits from this company and have always been very pleased. It also comes with something to keep track of the progress which the kids like. She really enjoyed doing the experiments. This is also good to get a child interested in science.

I would recommend this kit.

title: Fun for little one
text:
We have both thus and the original one snd both are gt reat. She started to play with it even while it was in the box. It lights up very brightly and plays music. She has a lot of fun with it and her three older siblings like playing with it with her too.

I was happy with the quality. It was easy to use and worked well. No problems at all. It had batteries which was nice. She loved it. I would recommend it.

title: Kids love Thomas
text:
Thomas is a favorite character of many children. This is a great toy for them. It is a nice remote control toy that is good even for very young kids. Many of the remote control toys would be fun for little kids but they have trouble with the remotes. This one is specifically made so that little kids won't find it too difficult to move.

The remote lets the kids move the toy train forward and backward. It also can play music and make sound effects, which the kids really enjoy. There are different songs, which are fun as are the lights. It is a bit loud, but all of these things are, and after five kids, I am just used to dealing with it.

My daughter really enjoyed this toy and she is not even that into Thomas. I know so many kids who are huge fans, and that would make this an even better gift. It worked just find without a problem. It is mostly plastic, but it feels sturdy. I would recommend it.

title: Love this toy
text:
I (and my daughter loved this toy). It really is so cute. It displays numbers on the wall in different colors,a acting like a little flashlight. It also has a setting to project a starscape and play music for ten or twenty minutes. It is not too big, just perfect for little babies. It is colorful and has cute little puppies on it's side. It is great for a little boy or girl.

This would be a great flashlight for your little one to go to bed with. It puts such cute pictures on the wall. It was a little hassle to get out of the box, but then it worked fine right away. It is easy to use. It has big buttons that are easy for the little one to push. I also like that it is educational in that it teaches planets counting and colors. It wasn't too loud or difficult to listen to like some of the other kids' toys we have.

This is very reasonable. I think it would make a nice gift and would recommend it.

title: My son loves it
text: We have a whole collection of Kid Galaxy trucks, and my son likes this one a lot. He thinks it is very cool. It really seems strong and able to move over rougher terrain than your average rc vehicle. He loves the claws on the wheels. It seems very rugged. It worked fine without problem. I think this would make a good gift as well. He got very excited about it and played with it for a while. No complaints. I would recommend it.

title: What a sweet project
text: My girls loves these flower crowns. They come out so sweet. You can adjust the crowns, which is good since my girls are different sizes and ages. They were not that difficult for them to put together. They were a fun craft. This would be good to get for someone before they are going to a Renaissance Fair or something like that. It would also be a nice craft to do at a princess party. My girls then enjoyed wearing them and showing off to others what they made. They really turned out very pretty and very nice. I think this would be good for a fairly wide range of ages compared to other crafts. I would recommend it.

title: Kids love the clubhouse
text:
We have four kids (and one on the way) and all of them is in or has gone through a stage in which they loved Mickey Mouse Clubhouse. The show is so cute for kids. Even if you kids don't watch the actual show, this is such a popular character. The clubhouse is a great toy to play with.

This is a cute version of the clubhouse because it has the car, hot hair balloon and slide. We used to have a plain one that they liked; this is even so much better because of these things. My kids love to play with characters so they really enjoy that. They spent quite a while playing with it. It is easy and inexpensive to find little characters to go along with this.

It is made of plastic, but still feels sturdy. It is a good size. My kids spent quite a while with it. I also think it would be a good toy for a Disney fan. It did not take too long to put together, and it was not difficult. I would recommend it.

title: Fun for the kids
text:
This toy was a lot of fun for my kids. I love that you can convert it into two different set-ups... very tall if the kids want something big or a short, flatter set up. No matter which way it is set up, they love to make the cars go down the ramps. It comes with two cars; you can buy more on your own.

We were pleased with the quality. It is mostly plastic, of course, but it feels sturdy. We have had tons of Little People products through the years with our four kids, and have always found them well made.

Putting it together is a little hassle; there are lots of screws. It wasn't really hard, just had a lot of steps. It's definitely something an adult needs to do. Of course it is large.

There are no talking parts and no batteries but that is fine. The kids still seem to enjoy it just as much. I would recommend it.

title: Cute puzzle
text: This is a cute puzzle. I like that it doubles as a puzzle and as characters that the kids can play with. They are wood, which is nice when so many of the toys the kids have today are made of plastic. Of course they are very sturdy. One thing is I wish that they made the pieces large enough so that they would be appropriate for two year olds. I think a toy like this would be good for the younger children but it is for kids 3 and up, which I am assuming is because of the small size. Most of the pieces are actually big so I just wish they made them all big. Also, there is no good way to store them. They fit all in the box, but then come out. Overall, good for a child who likes puzzles and animals.

title: Good container
text: This is a good container to store Play-Doh items. It comes with some molds, cookie cutters and other supplies. It is a good place to store a  collection of Play-Doh. Unlike many other sets it does not actually come with any Play-Doh. This was surprising and disappointing to me. If giving it as a gift, I would buy a set of Play-Doh to include with it unless you know the child has a lot of his own. It is good to have somewhere to store the Play-Doh, however. You can create some cute things with the molds. It is made of plastic, but seems well made. Play-Doh itself is a wonderful activity that can keep kids busy for hours so I definitely would recommend it overall. This is a good storage solution.

title: Fun for kids
text:
My preschooler has a letter a week at school so this is fun to go along with that. It has a letter per page with different little activities such as drawing a picture with the letter. It has tons of stickers, which my preschooler loves.

It is bright and colorful and good for both boys and girls. Quality is fine. It is a good way to go over the letters of the alphabet. We are happy with the Alex products, of which we have many. It is something nice you can keep to remember this sweet time. I'd recommend it for yourself or as a gift.

title: So many crafts you can do
text: This is a good product. There are so many supplies in there for kids to do crafts. There are all different types for all different sorts of crafts. The kids can use their imaginations to do what they want.  It is great for summertime or for a party. They can really do all different things with it. I am pleased with the quality. We have a lot of different things from Alex and have been pretty happy with them. It is convenient that it comes in a jar that you can seal. When things come in boxes, they always get ripped so this is much better. My only complaint is that a large part of the middle is taken up by tissue paper. If course they can use that for a lot of different crafts, but I wish that it wasn't so much of it. Overall, though, I am happy and would recommend it.

title: Fun and quick paced game
text: My kids really had fun with this game. They had to do the challenge on the cards to get the balls in a certain order. The big catch is they couldn't use their hands. They thought this was so much fun. It could be a little frustrating at the beginning if your child gets easily frustrated but more than that it is just fun. Also, it does get easier as they play. They had so much fun doing it. Everything feels well made. The tubes are made of plastic and not glass, but they felt pretty durable. We haven't had any breakage or anything. It is a decent twenty minutes or so of play time which is a good amount to keep my kids' attention but not drag on to long. It is fun and different and they really enjoyed it. I could also see this being good for parties although only 4 can play at a time so you would have to get more games, take turns or make teams. In any case, I would recommend it.

title: Cute monkey that teaches a lot
text: This is a very cute monkey that teaches a lot of different dressing techniques to little kids. It has buttons on it, a hook and loop, a zipper and many more things. They can take off the shirt and overalls. It is a fun way to teach your child to dress himself or herself. Obviously they can enjoy using it as a doll as well. Young kids like things they can fasten and unfasten. It kept my child entertained for a while. It is a good size - not too big and not too small. It felt very well made. It is good for both a boy and a girl. I would recommend it.

title: Fun for your little one
text:
This is a very cute toy. We have a 12 month old daughter, and she enjoys this toy. It is not too big, which for us is good because we have a lot of toys. It still does a lot. It goes over a lot of topics such as colors, shapes and the ABCs. It is a little shape sorter, too. It is colorful and pretty. She likes to take things in and out of it. It sounds nice. I like that it has three levels of play that you can change to your child's preference and age. She really liked it. It also it useful for older children as a garden caddy when they are doing "pretend play."

The only thing that I wished is that it came with batteries. I find that most smaller toys do, so this was a little bit of a hassle. Otherwise, I was very pleased with it. It worked just fine. We have a lot of the Laugh & Learn Toys (the home, the chair and more) and we have always been happy with this series. It is nice to have a small toy that she can easily carry around with her. Even if you don't want to listen to it, she can still play with it. I would recommend it.

title: Great toy
text:
This is a very fun toy. My six year old son was extremely excited when he got it. It looks very impressive and has a lot of features. He loves that you can use a remote to drive it forward and backward. It lights up and fires the projectiles. You can even fire the missiles by the remote control, which is different than the other toys we own. He really liked that. There are also sounds and music, which all worked fine.

Everything worked fine right out of the box, except the remote, which did need batteries. For the price, I wish they came with it, but most of these things don't. It was very easy for him to use. It is big enough to be impressive to him but not gigantic. My boy got very excited about it. He does not watch the Power Rangers, but he still loved it. Fans of Power Rangers will probably like it even more.

title: Cute crayons
text: These are cute crayons. They fit on the children's fingers. They like that they have different animals on them. My daughter liked that. They come in 24 different colors. It is cute for kids who might be a little young to know how to hold crayons the right way. Of course you still have to be careful if your child is two and still putting things in his or her mouth. My kids love to dray. My older kids also enjoyed these. It's nice that you can stack them because that did make them smaller to store. They wrote fine.

title: Playing school is so much fun
text: For how much my kids complain about going to school, they actually love to play it. This is a very fun kit that comes with a lot of different parts for them to play school. They set up the display board and it has a lot of little concepts they can use. My kids love to take turns being the teacher. What's cool is that the older ones can actually teach the younger ones some things about school. It has things to teach about letters, numbers and more. They really can spend a while playing this game. I like how it all folds up so it doesn't really take up that much room. It's also a great way to get a kid ready for school. I would highly recommend it.

title: So creative
text:
We love games and we love crafts and this is a great marriage of the two. It comes with a lot of different parts you would find in a game and then they can make their own. It has literally hundreds of pieces so the kids can really be creative. I gave it to my three children to do. They had so much fun putting it together. We are looking for things to do during the summer and this is great.

Of course once they are done they can play the game. It was really fun for them to play a game that they had invented.

I was happy with the quality. They had no trouble using it and putting it together. I also think this is a really unique and fun gift. Iw ould recommend it.

title: Nice craft set
text: I love craft sets like these because it keeps the kids busy for a while in a way that doesn't involve television. I think this is reasonable for sixteen projects. My children love being crafty. I like that it came with things like glue. It is very colorful and was good for both a boy and a girl. I have four kids of different ages and they were able to do most of the projects themselves. It is great for the summer. It is also fun for a party or to give as a gift. We have had many many kits from Alex and have been happy with them. I like that it has the frames because that makes it fun. There is a pretty good assortment in here of different projects. Some of them they can then use such as the puppet and little characters. I would recommend this.

title: Fun for Blaze fans
text: My kids enjoy Blaze. This is a very fun kit. We helped him put it together but it wasn't too difficult. I was happy with the quality. My son and daughters spent a while playing with the track. It wasn't too big and we just took it apart when we were done with it.  It worked pretty well... as described.  It kept them busy for a while.

title: Fun and easy craft
text: This isis a fun and easy art kit. It's very simple... the kids just use the wood stick to scratch the designs they want. It is no mess which is great. You can easily take it with you in a car or anywhere... it's very portable just like a book. The kids enjoyed it. My son liked it a lot.

title: Fun ship My son has ships already but I couldn't ...
text: Fun ship My son has ships already but I couldn't resist getting this when I saw that half the ship was a shark mouth. That is such a fun idea and my son just loves it. This was a birthday present for his seventh birthday. We have a lot of toys from Fisher-Price Imaginext, and like the others I feel that this is high quality. It has a lot of details to it. My son has three sisters (he's about to have four) and they love to play with characters. This is nice to let him join in with his own thing. He spent a while playing with it. It feels well made. I would recommend it.

title: Keeps baby busy
text:
I have a baby who just turned one and this is great for her. It has so much on it that it keeps her busy for a while. It is colorful and cute and great for boys or girls. There are so many songs and phrases and just so much to do on it. I really like that you can have it on the ground or put it standing on the legs. Even though she can stand and walk, we something leave it on the ground of her playpen to give her something to do.

It worked well. We had no problems with it. It is not as big as some of the other baby toys, which is nice. I also really like the educational aspect of it. It teachers colors, numbers, shapes and more. I also like the part that it tells them to do something like flap their arms.

I think this is also a great gift for someone. It might make a nice baby shower gift where everyone is getting stuff for a newborn and this will last way longer. Also, whereas many baby toys only last a few months, this can be used for a few years. I like that it has different stages for different ages. I would recommend it.

title: Great science kit aimed at girls
text: I think it's important for girls to have substantive toys rather than just make up kits and fashion dolls. This is a great chemistry kit aimed at girls. Science is such a great field, and many girls don't think of it as a "girly" thing. This is a great kit to get them interested in it. The experiments were cool and fun for her to do. We did it together. Of course my son was able to join in with no problem. I also think this is great as a gift for a little girl because it is unique and educational and fun. Everything worked just fine. They can learn a lot of different things as you can use the experiments as a springboard to teach them more. I would recommend it.

title: Fun for kids
text: My four kids love Angry Birds, especially my six year old son. This is a lot of fun for them. I really like that it is a toy without batteries, because we have so many toys with batteries that we just don't use when they run out. It can be a little frustrating to get it all set up. The kids really love it, though. I let them set it up, which made it easier on me and gave them something to do. They changed it to be different ways. They spent a while playing with it. I would recommend it.

title: Nice character
text: My eight year old daughter can spend forever playing with her characters. It's her favorite thing to do. She liked this little horse to add to her collection. It is definitely higher quality than a lot of her pieces. It has much more detail and she likes the blanket and play food for the horse. It looks as pictured. She was happy and so was I.

title: Unique
text: I thought this was fun for the kids. They seemed to enjoy it. The wand rotates around the pole and goes down. It definitely got them to be very physically active. My kids played it for a while. I think this would be good at a party. My only complaint was that it wasn't perfect that it did get stuck once in a while and could be a little wobbly. I wish it were a little more sturdy. But they still enjoyed it. I would recommend it.

title: Amazing selection
text:
This is a great kit. It has so many different pieces. It includes paints, makers, crayons, colored pencils, water colored pencils and more. Each of them comes in a huge rainbow of colors. It can keep the kids busy for so long! With all of the electronic toys and everything, I love something that really lets them use their creativity. I have four kids and a VERY long summer ahead of us. This is very entertaining for them.

We have had many toys from Alex and have usually been happy with the quality. The box is good to have, but it will not take a lot of abuse, so they should be careful with it. This can really keep them busy for hours with entertaining things. You will want to buy a lot more paper to go with this. I also think this makes a great gift. Now I just need to be on top of the kids about putting each one back after they use it. A great set for a reasonable price, I would recommend this.

title: ... give it a 5 My six year old son liked this a lot
text: Son said to give it a 5 My six year old son liked this a lot. He loves construction vehicles and he likes remote controls so this was perfect for him. It works fine. We have a bunch of products from Kid Galaxy and have been pretty happy. It was a pain to get out of the box, but most of them are like that. We also needed to add batteries to both the vehicle and remote, but again, that'spar for the course. He spent a while playing with it. He likes that it can dump. This is also good as a gift.  I would recommend it.

title: Baby loves it
text:
This is a very nice set. My baby (who is about to turn one) has really enjoyed all of the toys. She likes the little mushroom rattle a lot. The doll is cute. She also likes looking at herself in the mirror. It comes with a teether and another shaker.

She was happy with all the toys and has played with them for a while. They are easy to bring places. This would be good if you want things to add to a gift basket or a stocking stuffer. It would also make a nice gift. You can take them out and give them individually. Everything feels well made. We liked this set and would recommend it.

title: Fun
text: My daughter is very artistic and she thought this was fun. I love that it comes with so many slides - over a hundred. It is very easy for her to use. She can mix and match the pictures to make her own creations. The flip book set up is very cute too. It worked just fine. I like giving things like these as gifts because they allow kids to be creative. I also think it could help teach her how to draw those things on her own. My daughter is 8, but I have three other kids of differing ages who like it as well. I would recommend it.

title: Great kit
text:
This is a great kit. It comes with the materials to make several different projects. My daughter who is ten loves the idea of sewing. This kit makes it pretty easy. The different projects take a little while so they can really get a lot of use out of one kit. It can familiarize kids with sewing in general.

The projects came out pretty nice. It was so nice for her to feel like she was really sewing with a real needle and everything. I like that it has a nice little case and not just a box. I think this would also make a nice gift. No, it is not perfect - we used our own scissors instead of theirs - but overall, a great fun kit.

title: Great product
text: Fun for young infants This is a great baby item for young infants. It has so much to it. It is good for a young infant who will look up and try to reach for the hanging things. It also has lights and music; there really is a lot to it. It is very easy to set up and just takes a few minutes. Another nice thing about this is that unlike other baby gear, it is very light and portable and easy to take with you. It can also be stored in a closet or under a bed. This one is very colorful. It is good for both boys and girls. Now something like this is good for a matter of months and not years; the baby does outgrow them, but I still think it is worthwhile to have because of how much it entertains the baby and for the educational qualities. I would recommend it.

title: Fun game
text: My kids liked playing this game. We just played it in the house but of course you can play it by the water as well. There were enough balls for them to share. It was easy to put together, but it was a little big and you would have to take it apart to make it smaller - it didn't fold up or anything. This would also be good for a party. It seemed well made. There is a mesh basket, so balls don't come back to you. It didn't come with any rules or instructions, but it wasn't that hard to come up with our own. It was a fun game I would recommend.

title: Son loved these
text: I couldn't believe how much my six year old son loved these. He wanted to play with it for me forever. We just played in our living room, just simple catch but he thought it was so much fun. He has trouble catching balls sometimes but I could aim it at his glove so he could catch it. They stuck pretty well. They fit both of us fine, him with his little hand and me with my bigger one. I like that they are resistant to water. I would recommend them.

title: Small and cute
text: This was small and cute. It's pretty simple. It looks just like the picture, exactly like the dog from the movie. My kids really enjoy getting toys that correspond with movies, so that made it a big hit. It was a little smaller than I pictured, but that is fine for us. We don't need more clutter. He talks, although it can be a little difficult to understand. He moves a little. The kids really liked him. I think it would make a cute little gift to tie in with the movie. He worked right out of the box with nothing more for you to do.

title: A lot to them
text: These cards have a lot to them they go over a lot of different math concepts. They are easy for my older child to use by herself or me to use with my younger kids. I think flashcards are such a great way to learn. I find it so much more effective than a plain book. These seemed well made and I like that there is a sturdy box for them. I would recommend them.

title: Excellent toy
text:
My children absolutely love this trick. It comes with many different tricks. Most of them are pretty easy to do, but are very impressive. In fact, a lot of them are things I would see performed by a children's magician. You could even save yourself some money and perform some at your own children's party.

My kids really loved them. They could spend a long time on this. They really are pretty impressive. They really enjoyed putting on shows for their friends and family.

I was pleased with the quality and all the different pieces that came with it. I thought they were well explained. Depending on the age of your child you may have to explain how to do the tricks to him or her. I looked at a lot of kits, and really liked this one for how much it came with. I also have bought it several times to give as gifts. I would recommend it.

title: Kids LOVED it
text: My kids (ages 6, 8, 10) really enjoyed this. They loved how high they could make the rocket go. They kept playing with it, and having little competitions. It was easy to set up and use. Of course you have to make sure you have a place with enough room to do it. I like that it comes with six rockets so if you lose one you're still okay. We've had similar things that just came with one, so this is much better than that. It was very easy to put together. My son was so excited when he got it - he wanted to do it all the time. One part I love - you don't need any batteries. We have so many toys with batteries and then they run out and you have to change them and the money adds up. These were great and worked very well. Highly recommended.

title: Fun kit
text:
The first thing I would say is to glue the frame together. If you do not, you might have problems with it coming apart while you are starting the project and that can be very frustrating. If you glue it together first, then you can avoid that problem. That and the fact that the strings can get tangled easily are why I took off a star.

Overall, though I think this is a nice craft. I really appreciate that it does not use pins or nails or anything else that would not be good for a child. I had once got one that looked cute but when I realized it had a bunch of pins I had to get rid of it because my daughter has young siblings. This one is completely safe.

It's a fun craft. It is fairly simple and easy although there can be some tangling an adult might have to help with. There are lots of colors so lots of ways you can do it. Of course you can also get your own colors.

I think it turned out pretty. It's something unique and nice to hang in the room. I think this would also make a nice gift. I like crafts a lot, and this one is nice.

title: Great for your little scientist
text:
I love educational kits, and this is a very good one. I have four kids, and they like science very much. This has a lot of different projects that showcase different principles of science and chemistry.

The experiments are not too hard to do. In our case, a parent did it with the kids. When chemicals are involved, I would recommend adult supervision.

The kids really enjoyed doing it. I like that after the experiments you can talk about how and why it happened. It really can foster an interest in science.

A lot came with it, but you do need some of your own supplies. Most you probably already had. While I wish everything was included, just about every similar kit on the market is like this, so I didn't take off any stars for it.

Overall, this is fun and educational. I also like giving these sorts of things as gifts because parents appreciate them.

title: Fun for science lovers
text: This kit is fun for science lovers. It really did seem like magic to the kids. It has a variety of projects in it. One thing you should know is that it does not include every ingredient for every project. I didn't take off a star because they are common household items and because every other in-depth kit I've seen has been the same way. This is a very nice kit for a parent to do with a child. I think it can also get a child excited about science. I would recommend it.

title: Fantastic toy
text: We were very happy with this. My six year old son spent a lot of time with it. He can make the designs that came with it or make up his own. He has another big ZOOB set and it goes together so that is very nice. Everything felt well made. I loved that he could use his creativity. Once he built them, he spent a while playing with them/ My older daughters liked them too. I would recommend them.

title: Fun and educational
text: I love educational toys, and so do my kids. They don't even realize they're educational toys. We are big into science/math/engineering so this circuits set was great for my ten year old daughter (my younger children enjoyed it as well). It comes with a lot of different pieces and can really teach your child about electronics. I liked that there were different projects that they could make with it, including their own custom ones. It comes with an extensive book with instructions for 50 different builds. Kids learn about light, sound and electronics. It is so much more fun than reading about these things in a book. It is also a really nice thing that my husband could do with the kids. I would recommend it.

title: Educational and fun
text:
My six year old son loved this toy. He loves LEGOS and anything like this where he can use his imagination to put things together. I am always impressed with what he can do.

This set comes with an impressive 250 pieces. That's enough to make a lot of different things. He was able to easily put them together himself. It has different pieces to make many different things. You can also use it with the other ZOOB sets, too, which is nice. It comes with a lot of people.

My daughters also enjoy playing with it. It really is good for a boy or a girl.

I like that you can make more than just sculptures with this. Because it comes with gears and spinning parts, he can then play with what he makes.

It has instructions for a lot of different things. Of course they can also use their imaginations.

I also love that it comes in a sturdy plastic bin. A lot of these types of toys come in cardboard boxes that don't stay closed and get destroyed. We have a lot of kids and a lot of toys, so I like that it has something that will really keep the pieces together.

title: Why not real gems?
text: The kids like to dig out things so this is fun for that. The problem is that it doesn't use real gems or even rocks. It's not like I expected real diamonds, but you can get real rocks for not a lot of money. For what this cost, I think it would have been worthwhile. I also wish it would have come with some more educational material to go with it. If it were real rocks they could ave had some stuff on geology. So it's a good idea and they still enjoyed it, but I wish it came with real rocks.

title: Babies love bubbles!
text: My children love bubbles. She is way too young to blow them out so this is a very fun way to have bubble come up. She really enjoyed this toy. Thomas is such a popular character. She loves things that she can push. It is very easy to use. Even without bubbles she can just push it around the house. It's a fun toy.

title: Son loves it!
text:
My six year old son loves this helicopter. It is fun because he can use it as a toy helicopter in the house and then use it to spray water outside. I do not let my son have any water guns that are shaped like guns, but of course it is fun for him to spray water so this is a great way for him to do it without me being concerned about weapons.

The helicopter looks good. It was pretty detailed. It seemed durable and held up just fine to his rough use. He thought it was so much fun that you could put water in it. He loves it.

title: Great learning tool
text: We have four kids and we love flash cards. They are such a great leaning tool. This is a very comprehensive set that includes a lot of concepts. It has over three hundred cards on all the basics such as colors, shapes, phonics, numbers and more. Flashcards are great because you can do them with your child or they can do them on their own. They also like them a lot more than just reading from a book. The quality was fine... they were thick enough. It's easy to store them in the box. I was happy with this set.

title: Very cute
text: This is a very cute toy. It is like a nicer version of a plain popper. The owl is adorable. I love how the little wings flap and so does my daughter. It is so adorable. It is easy to use and fun. I have no complains. I think it would make a nice gift too. It feels well made.

title: My boy loves it
text:
Like the typical boy, my six year old son loves monster trucks and he loves fire trucks. This truck is perfect for him. He can play with it as one of them and then as the other. It is very easy to switch around between the two. He was so excited to get it.

My son has seen the cartoon before but does not watch it too often. I think fans of the show would really go wild for it, but I don't think a child even needs to be to enjoy this toy.

I like all the sounds and phrases he makes - over two dozen. They sound like in the show.

I was pleased with the quality. Yes, it's mostly plastic, but it seems pretty durable. We didn't have any issues with it working correctly.

It is a pretty good medium size. We have a LOT of toys so I don't like things that are two big but it was way bigger than the smaller matchbox cars. It was a good size for his little hands.

Overall, I am pleased and would recommend it.

title: They love kinetic sand
text:
My kids love kinetic sand. I remember the first time they saw it in the store; they would not leave it. That was just a plain set with just the sand. This set with things to make your own little bakery is even cuter.

Kinetic sand is very cool. It is kind of like a cross between sand and clay. It holds its shape but it doesn't dry so it's not as great if your kids want to make something and keep it that way forever. It's great if they leave it out though. We've had so many other types of clay that we had to through out because my kids didn't put them away quick enough. My kids loved to make little cakes and deserts to feed to people. This is more for girls than boys but i have a young son who is six and he played along with his older sisters. It is a very cute set. It comes with different molds to make the pieces.

Of course you have to make sure your child is old enough that they will know not to eat the kinetic sand. My kids also used the kinetic sand to make other things. It's simple but it lets them use their imagination. I would recommend it.

title: Fun for fans of the movie
text: My kids love Barbie Spy Squad. They couldn't get enough of the movie. I already got my daughter the Barbie doll that goes with the movie, and this is the perfect toy to go with it. They had so much fun with it. They really enjoy playing with their dolls (my one daughter spends hours every night playing with her dolls). This went along perfectly with it. We have a lot of Barbie accessories and other things, but this is our first motorcycle. It is just like the one in the movie. They love that it has the sidecar with the techbot pet. You can take that off if you want. It is fun for them in their games. It feels well made. I wish it came with the doll, but like I said we already have her. This is a great toy and they really enjoyed it.

title: Beautiful doll
text:
My children have seen Ever After High, but I don't think you need to in order to enjoy this doll. This is a beautiful doll. My two daughters just love playing with dolls and this one was a great addition to their collection. Of course fans of Ever After High will very much appreciate the character.

It's nice that it's unique. My daughter has a lot of the pink dress princess dolls, so it's nice to get a nice strong character who has a different look. She is a strong character, and I like that.

My daughter really liked that it came with a ring for her. The doll has a lot of details and looks a lot like the character. It felt very well made... we didn't have any problems with anything quality wise. I like that more of her moves than a typical Barbie Doll. I also like the details of the clothing and accessories. This was a big hit in my house.

title: Awesome toy
text:
This is our third one of these toys, and I can say my four kids have spent hours and hours with it. They have used it in so many different games through the years. I also have a whole bunch of pop up tents for them and so they use it to connect those together. It's just a lot of fun for them.

It is pretty well made. Our older version lasted years before the kids finally were too much for it. My kids also like to partially open it and then put it on top of themselves and walk around. My daughter used to do that and call herself a "G." It was very cute. I never thought such a simple thing could get so much attention, but they really loved it. I would recommend it.

title: Son loved it
text:
I have a six year old son, and he really enjoyed this stunt kit. He liked that you could set it up in different ways. He was able to be creative to get it to do different things. Some of these just have one stunt or effect but this one had a bunch.

We have a LOT of hot wheels cars, and he spent a lot of time playing with it. My three daughters also liked playing with it too. It was easy for them to do on their own. Everything fit together well and it worked just fine. I like toys where they have to put things together... gets them away from the television and tablet screens. I would definitely recommend this.

title: Fun for my little man
text:
