My son is six and this toy is great for him. He isn't even into Dinotrux, but he thinks this toy is awesome. Of course fans of the show will love it even more. It really sounds like the show. He does like dinosaurs as most do.

I like all of the different things that it does. The sounds and phases are very cute. You can switch out the drill bits to give him a different look. But definitely what my son likes the best is the measuring tape tongue. It is so cute. I would recommend it.

title: Outstanding toy
text:
We had the older version of this for years and years with my first three kids, and now we have the newer one for my youngest child. It is outstanding. It is so cute. There are so many different sounds and songs that it makes. A lot of them are learning. There are so many things that my daughter can touch to light up or make noise. She just loves it. She loves to go in and out of the door. When she is older she can use it during pretend play.

It is very well designed. It is big but you can just put it against the wall and it doesn't come out that far at all. It was easy to put together and works great. We had no trouble with the other one for years and years... and none with this one either. There's just so much to it... a little mailbox, a light and more. I would highly recommend this.

title: Such a great product
text:
I used to have a version of this when I was a kid, so I loved to give one to my children. I have four kids, and this is something that kids can use from when they are babies to when they are way older. I think music is so important to kids, and it is fun that they can start to make their own. It has such a sweet sound to it... even with them just banging it, it can be nice. They loved it and it made them feel like they had a real instrument.

The kids really spent a lot of time with this. They like to put on their own music shows, and this is a welcome addition to that. It is cute that it is on wheels and they can also use it as a little pull toy as well. It felt very well made. My old one lasted for decades! I would recommend it.

title: Classic, great toy
text:
This is a simple toy, but a classic one. I have had four kids with very differing tastes, but one thing that has remained constant is that they all love telephones. They love pretending to dial on them and they love pretending to talk on them. This one is cute because it allows them to do that and it is so bright and colorful. It is nostalgic for me to see them with it.

In addition to being a play telephone, it is a pull toy. The eyes of the telephone move up and down, which is so cute. Also, it has the numbers on it, so you can go through that. It makes ringing sounds.

My youngest is now eight months old and she really likes this toy. She likes to putt it and she likes to play with the phone. She's too young to really pretend to talk on it, but I know she will. It can be used with older kids like this in pretend toy.

It's nice to have a classic toy. It's a great value and makes a great gift or part of a gift. I would recommend it.

title: Love the versatility
text:
This is a wonderful product. A lot of products made for this age group only last a few months, but this one lasts so much longer because of the way it is designed. Babies can use it just as a mat. Older children can use it as a stationary walker. Basically they can practice walking, but just a little. Regular walkers are not recommended anymore because of the dangers so this is a great option. I love that. Then finally, when they are a toddler, they can just use it as a piano.

My daughter is eight months old and she really enjoys this. It has so much to it. I love that it has the piano keys on the floor and on the top. It has other activities, too. It is bright and colorful.

It is nice to have somewhere to put the baby and entertain her for a few minutes. She puts everything in her mouth so I can't leave her on the floor, of course.

It is not a small toy and there is no way to make it smaller, but that is okay. It is something you can actually get a few years out of, which is unusual to say for a toy for this age group. With its bright colors, it is good for both a boy and a girl. It can replace your exersaucer.

It feels well made. We didn't have any trouble putting it together. Everything worked as it should. We've had scores of toys from Fisher Price and have been generally happy. I would recommend this one.

title: Really nice puppets
text:
This set of four puppets is great. They were a lot nicer than I thought they would be. They feel really nice. The head part of them is stuffed and looks great. They are very detailed. They feel very well made and comfortable. They are durable.

I have four kids and they love to put on shows. I love toys that let them use their creativity. This set is nice because it comes with the four characters. Once they were done putting on Little Red Riding Hood, they put on other plays with the same characters. I would recommend them.

title: Adorable
text:
This is so adorable. I thought it was so cute, and we have a LOT of Barbie sets. Gymnastics is a great set for Barbie since so many little girls love gymnastics. My daughter is not in gymnastics anymore (she used to be) but she loved it.

I love that it comes with a little girl to do the gymnastics. It's different and makes a great addition to her Barbie collection. It is different since most sets don't come with a little girl.

The bar is cute. I love that you can attach the girl to the bar and then crank the knob for her to flip over. That is so cute. The other accessories like the hula hoop are really cute.

The quality is very good as I have found other Barbies are. My daughter spent a lot of time playing with her.

title: Really pretty
text:
This doll is really pretty. I liked it, and of course so did my seven year old daughter. It looked even better than in person. It's larger than your average Barbie, but it's actually not as huge as I thought it might be (which for me is a good thing). I think because it's relatively thin. The head seems a lot wider, but it's okay.

My daughter likes Ever After High, but I don't think you need to be in order to enjoy this doll because it is so pretty. Ever After High is of course extremely popular so it is a nice trendy toy. She played with it right away. It seemed well made - no quality issues. I would recommend it.

title: Great for Barbie fans
text:
My daughter has watched all of the Barbie movies, and although she hasn't seen this one yet since it isn't out yet, she certainly will. This is a very cute toy. It looks really cool to her. She is ten and loves everything about spies. It is very cute that it can do flips and cartwheels. Even if your child does not watch the movies, it is still a nice doll.

It is well made as I find the Barbies to generally be. Some of the off brands falls apart so quickly, but this one does not. it comes with a trench coat that can come on and off. She played with it for quite a while with her other Barbie dolls. It is nice to have a Barbie doll that is good for my tomboy.

title: Very cute My daughter really liked this Barbie Farm Veterinarian Doll & Playset
text:
Very cute My daughter really liked this Barbie Farm Veterinarian Doll & Playset. She loves Barbies, and of course the quality of Barbies is always very nice. She feels well made and doesn't fall apart like many of the knockoff brands. I really like this set because it comes with so much. It comes with seven animals. She loved playing with it and having Barbie take care of all of her animals.

The little clinic is cute. It's not a big playset, but it's enough for Barbie to run her little clinic (with my daughter's help of course). My daughter can spend hours with her characters, so she liked these. Of course she can then play with the other animals at other times.

Many girls love Barbie and they also love animals. I think this would make a very nice gift, too. It has more than just a regular Barbie but isn't too big to create clutter. I would recommend it.

title: Beautiful doll
text:
My girls enjoy Ever After High, and Apple White is one of the principle characters. They liked this doll very much. She is a good likeness and is very, very pretty. The outfit is cute. She comes with her dragon, and they can make the wings flap.

My kids played with her for a while. My one daughter loves playing with characters so this fit right in. She felt well made. This doll is nice enough that I think even someone who doesn't watch Ever After High might like it.

title: Cute little figure
text: I got this figure for my six year old son. He liked playing with it. It is a good size for him - about the size of his other characters - so he can play with them together. It is good for someone who likes the mobile game, but even if you don't it's fun. It feels sturdy enough.

title: Lots of fun
text: My kids thought this game was a lot of fun. They have to put the rings on their fingers in the correct order. It is fast paced and active and my kids really think it is funny. I think it is useful in helping with dexterity. It;s good for kids of different ages, easy to learn and easy to play. I would recommend it.

title: Fun and educational
text: I really like games that are educational. This is both of them. The kids work on adding. My children enjoyed it as a game and didn't even realize they were doing something educational. I also like that up to six players can play it since many games for young kids are only made for four. I also like that it is small and portable. It is not that difficult to learn but kept their interest. I would recommend it.

title: Awesome game
text:
We have played Guesstures for years and we love it! It is great for either a family game night or for a large party. It's one of those games that kids can play, adults can play or adults and kids can play together and still enjoy. My kids love games that involve some physical activity. The only thing were that there were a couple of inappropriate words for kids, so you might want to just read through it to make sure you weed those out.

It is easy to play and simple to learn. basically you just have to act out the actions on the cards (very quickly) because they will disappear.You get points depending on how difficult they are. It is fun and had everyone laughing hysterically. Everyone loved it. I also think this is a great family gift for the holidays.

title: Son really enjoyed it
text:
My six year old son really liked this toy. He likes Rescue Bots a lot. He liked the big boat. He worked himself to put it together. It's cute that it opens. He likes things that transform. It seemed to come with a lot of different little things.

The only thing I didn't like was that it came with some cardboard cutout characters. I don't think I've ever seen that with something that is so expensive. If you're going to include characters you should do it the right way and make them wooden or plastic - cardboard lasts about a day in my house before it gets destroyed. Besides that one complaint, I liked it.

title: Fun but could be brighter
text:
My seven year old daughter considers herself a little artist. She really liked this toy. It comes with the light box, some templates and a small amount of paper. She spent a while working at it and drawing. The fun factor is very good.

What I didn't like about it was that I thought it could actually be a little brighter. I think that would have helped. Still, it works well enough for her to use it. I also like the little things it comes with like the colored pencils and pre-printed backdrops.

title: Daughter enjoyed it
text: We have a new baby in the house who is just about to start eating solid foods, so I thought this would be great for my older daughters (7 and 10). I was right. They enjoyed her a lot. They can pretend to feed the doll. It is cute that it comes with all the different feeding accessories so it really feels like she is feeding her. She was a cute doll. These dolls are a little hard. My daughter doesn't seem to mind, but if your child likes soft dolls, that could be an issue. I also do wish you could use the diapers over again. I think after we go through these we might do more pretending since I buy enough diapers for my real baby and don't want to buy more for the fake baby. We live in an area where a lot of people speak Spanish, so they liked that she spoke both languages. This set would also make a nice gift. We liked it and would recommend it.

title: Fun for my six year old son
text: My six year old son likes Blaze. He thought this toy was a lot of fun. You can turn him into a helicopter. He liked the launcher and the revving sounds you get. It is plastic, but felt durable enough. Everything worked fine, and it was easy for my son to use. He likes watching the show so it was fun to have a toy tied into it. I would recommend it.

title: Nice rock tumbler
text: This is a nice rock tumbler. It really did a good job with the rocks. It was not as loud as a lot of them are. The kids really got a kick out of it. It came with some rocks that we tried it out with and it really did well. You can buy more rocks or collect your own if you live in an area where you can find them. This would also be great for a science class. I like that it came with a variety of things to get you started, including 1 pound of the rough gemstones, polishing grits and even fastenings to make it into jewelry. I also like that it has a shutoff timer. I was very pleased and would recommend it.

title: Great for crafty kids
text: This is great for crafty kids. You can wrap thread around a wide variety of things. My child wrapped jewelry and glasses. The threading unit is motorized. It comes with a variety of different colors of thread. I love things that allow my children to use their creativity. I think it would also make a good gift for kids. It worked fine. My daughter was able to use it without a problem. I would recommend it.

title: Fun for Star Wars fans
text: If your kids like Star Wars, then this is a fun tracing pad. It lights up and lets the kids trace the different characters. It comes with pencils and skinnies to use in tracing. It did well to keep the sheets secure. My daughter thinks of herself as a little artist, so this was nice for her. The platform is great... it has LEDs that work well and are very bright. It does need batteries. It's a great gift.

title: Nice plush
text: My kids like Sesame Street and they like Abby Cadabby. She is one of the most popular characters on the show, especially for little girls. This is a very nice plush doll. It is big but not ridiculously so. It is a good size for my daughter to hug her when she sleeps with her. She is very soft. It is an attractive doll that looks just like the character in the show. She makes a little less sense to get if your child is not familiar with the show. My daughter immediately wanted to play with her. I would definitely recommend her for a little Sesame Street fan.

title: Great for Homeland fans
text:
This game is a lot of fun for Homeland fans, although you do not need to be one to enjoy it. You need to work to stop threats. There were a lot of parts to it, but as long as you read all the directions it wasn't that hard to learn how to play and enjoyable. I find many games repetitive, but this had more to it. We all had fun. Of course it is not a game for children.

I was happy with the quality of the game. Everything felt well made. This could be used for a game night or for a party.

title: Great Interactive Toy
text: My son loves Paw Patrol. This was a fun toy. He loves how you can shoot off its net to capture the bad guy. We have four kids including an infant so a real dog would be tough. Obviously this is not the same but it is still fun. It worked just fine and felt like it was well made even though it was mostly plastic. The flashlight really works and he says a lot of things. It comes with the batteries, which I like. It even sings and dances to the music, which my son thought was very funny. My daughters liked it too. It's a great gift!

title: Fun and educational
text:
I love toys that are both fun to do and educational. This is both. It has a lot of information about solar energy while building a working robot that is powered by a solar cell. It really moves.

My kids had a lot of fun making this model. They did it together with my husband. It took a little while, but that was part of the fun. When it was done, they were very excited about how it turned out. You can make five different models and ten different experiments.

It seemed very well made. It worked exactly as it should.

This would be good for a nice project at school or even a science project for a class.

title: Lots of fun
text: There is a lot to this action figure. Your child can put him together. He can mix and match parts. He comes with different ring attire and body parts. He can also mix with other 6-inch characters in the same line. We have a bunch of them, and my son likes that. My son really enjoyed that part of it. This is a good likeness of Kane Rocker. It's great for a child who likes wrestling or one who just likes action figures.

title: Great figure
text:
The Rock is one of the most popular wrestling figures out there. Even people who are not into wrestling know him because of his movies and other endeavors. This is a great action figure for his fans. My young son enjoyed it very much.

This is different than other action figures in that kids can mix and match the pieces. You can make whatever combination you like. My son really liked this element of it. You can even combine parts with other six inch figures in the same line. We have several so my son was able to do this.

MY son liked playing with it. It's mostly plastic, but it seems well made. You have to be careful to keep everything together, though. Overall I am happy, and so is my son.

title: Very cute
text: This is a very cute set. I have a four month old daughter and she enjoys this. I put them on her hands and feet and she will wiggle them and enjoy the sounds. I like that it is a toy without any batteries to run out or change. It is easy to bring with us and keeps her entertained. At her age, she is just starting to play with toys and she will constantly drop them. This is cute because she can't drop them. They feel well made. I am very happy with them and would recommend them. They also make a good shower gift.

title: Love the versatility
text:
It is frustrating when you buy children's toys and they outgrow it in a few month's time. I really like that this lasts longer because you can change it from three wheels to two. No, it's not a real bicycle, obviously, but it gives that feel.

There were a lot of features to this that I liked. It has lights, music and more. My kids really enjoyed it. I like anything that encourages physical exercise, so this was a lot of fun.

It seemed well made. Of course, it's mostly plastic, but it seemed well put together. It worked just fine.

This is a nice grow-with-me toy. I would recommend it.

title: Fun adult game
text: This is a fun game for fans of the popular Game of Thrones television show. It's a pretty involved card game that lets you get involved in the action. It is fun and comes with several directions for two player and multiplayer options. There is a lot to it, but if you spend the time, it is a lot of fun. It is nice to play at a Game of Thrones watching party.

title: Cute and fun
text:
This is a cute and fun oven. It is really not difficult to do and my kids enjoyed it a lot. They really loved the idea of having their own little oven. It was not difficult to make the cookies from the mix and put them in. They really loved having their own oven. I also liked that it was very safe, especially compared to the real oven (Of course I still always used supervision). They can see the cookies cooking in the window, which they liked. The cookies are close to, but not exactly like, the real thing.

There were a few things I didn't like. It really did take quite a while to do. Of course this can also be considered a positive, too, because the kids enjoyed doing it so it was something to do. One thing we both didn't like is after all this work, you really come away with a very small set of tiny cookies. They really don't go a long way - I wouldn't expect to have too many leftovers. Based on that, the time and the cost of the cookies, I wouldn't expect to have too many leftovers. Still, the kids enjoyed it as an activity. I would recommend it.

title: Cute toy, a little worried about how it's made
text: I like this toy. It's cute. The baby likes it.  It seems to have a spring covered by fabric. My concern is what happens when the baby starts mouthing the fabric. It hasn't happened yet so nothing has happened but I have another child who has a habit of putting his shirt in his mouth and all his shirts get shredded. If the fabric was to tear, it would be a real problem. I just plan on being careful to watch the baby while she is playing with this toy. Otherwise it is cute.

title: Classic toy
text:
I think most of the kids I knew either had or wanted one of these. I was excited to get it. I think it is a lot of fun for kids to feel like they are really cooking. It is also very safe.

There are a few flaws. It has a fake timer on it. For the price you pay, I think they should've splurged for a cheap real timer. Or they should have had none, but they shouldn't have had a fake one. Also, it can take a while and obviously, it does not cook a whole lot. Also, the mixes can add up in cost. But still, it can make kids feel like they have their own oven and is a lot of fun. My kids really enjoyed it. I would recommend it.

title: Nice doll
text:
We like this doll. I have four kids, and one of them is an infant who will soon be starting food. I was looking for a doll that they can emulate this with.This doll is cute for that. She can pretend to feed her the baby food.The doll also says things in English and Spanish.There are a lot of people who speak Spanish in my area so my kids like that.

I was happy with this doll. It's a little hard, but that's okay.My daughter enjoys her.

title: Cute doll
text:
We like this doll. I have four kids, and one of them is an infant who will soon be starting food. I was looking for a doll that they can emulate this with.This doll is cute for that. She can pretend to feed her the baby food.The doll also says things in English and Spanish.There are a lot of people who speak Spanish in my area so my kids like that.

I was happy with this doll. It's a little hard, but that's okay.My daughter enjoys her.

title: Lots to it
text:
There is a lot to this push cart. Basically it is covered with little activities that the child can play with. It has a mirror, a slider track and xylophone and more. I like that it is wood and not plastic like most of these are. It feels like it is good quality. Assembly wasn't bad at all.

My daughter really liked it. We had carts years ago with my other kids and it can help them when they are just learning to walk. Even once they are walking well, they can use it just to play with. I would recommend it.

title: Fun and educational
text:
I remember playing this game when I was a child, so I was happy to get it for my own children. It is a fun game that is very education. It is somewhat similar to scrabble where players have to form words in a crossword style on the board. It is different in that the board is not as large and players can stack letters on top of words.

This is fun and a lot less repetitive than many of the other kids' games out there. I am trying to work on spelling with my kids (ages 9, 7 and 6) so this is a great way to teach them. It is much more fun than simply going over words. They enjoyed it. It is not based on sheer luck like so many of the kids' games, but requires skill.

I was happy with the quality of the game. It does have a lot of small tiles, so you have to make sure to keep them together and not play it near a child who is still putting things in his or her mouth. Five stars for a great classic game.

title: Cute toy
text:
My six year old son loves Superheroes. This is a cute toy that lets kids put together Spider-man. They can mix and match many different body parts. Once you are done, you can them play with it. Of course he could change it around. My son really liked it.

The only thing I would say about this type of toy is you have to make sure to keep all the parts together. If you lose half of them it doesn't work so well. We have a habit of losing things in this house, so that it just a consideration. As long as you are good about keeping things together, this is a fun toy (or gift).

title: Didn't work
text: It's cute and pretty and soft, but mine does not work. I pressed the button, changed the switch, but nothing helped. I do not know if they sent it with dead batteries or what. I am very glad I did not get it as a gift.

title: Lovely doll
text:
This is a very pretty doll. With her wide smile, she is a lot more attractive than many of the other dolls out there. She is wearing a pretty outfit.

She is a hard doll, not soft, but my daughter likes her. She plays with her a lot. She felt like she was of good quality.

The doll's theme is hair styling and she comes with different things to do this with like a brush, hair dryer, hair clips, etc. My daughters have very long hair so they enjoyed having a doll that they could do their own hair styling with. They spent a while doing it. They could also put their own hair clips in her hair.

I think this is a pretty good value for a pretty doll with accessories. It would also make a nice gift. I would recommend it.

title: Nice to get away from plastic
text:
We have a LOT of toys and almost all of them are plastic. It was nice to get away from plastic with this lovely tea set. It is made of nice wood and just looks and feels better than the plastic sets. My four rambunctious kids have gone through so many plastic tea sets, breaking one after the next, but these feel so sturdy, I don't think my kids could break them if they tried.

I also really liked what came with this set. It's the only set I have ever seen that comes with tea bags (and in different flavors, too!) That is really cute. My daughter puts on these elaborate tea parties, so it'll be nice for her to have a nice bag to pretend with. It also comes with biscuits, spoons and the other basics.

The set is very cute. We've gotten many things from Melissa & Doug and have been pleased with both the company and the customer service. I would recommend this set.

title: A fun twist on Magic 8
text: Magic 8 balls are classic and fun, and this has a great twist on it. My daughters love Frozen, and they enjoyed this Magic 8 ball. It has a lot of fun phrases on it that say things like Yes is a Warm Hug. You just shake it and it will show a different phrase in the window. They took turns asking it questions. It was a lot of fun to do. I think you could also use this during a Frozen themed party. I like that it is a small toy that doesn't require batteries. They like that it has to do with Frozen. A win for all.

title: Cute idea, don't like schoolhouse though
text: This was a cute idea. A lot of kids enjoy construction and wrecking balls. I like the idea of building something. Our big problem with this was that it is a schoolhouse that they knock down. Yeah, it's an abandoned schoolhouse, but still, we felt it would have been better with something else. It does have some educational value in that kids get to see how to make something stand and then fall down. My son enjoyed it.

title: Cute bath toy
text: My children like to play with these little foam bath toys in the tub. It has a bunch of different faces and bodies and extras that can be mixed and matched. When I go in there after they shower, I will always find them arranged in different ways. I think it's a really cute set. They attach just fine to the bathroom wall, and we haven't had any problems with them. It distracts them from splashing water out of the tub, which unfortunately, is their other favorite pastime. The shapes and designs are cute. I just wish it came with something sturdy to keep them in. Still, I was happy and I would recommend this.

title: Sweet doll
text: I have three daughters, and they love dolls. This is a very sweet doll. She is soft and comes in a pretty pink dress (which seems to be most girls' favorite color). She is a good size, not too huge but also not tiny - just right for the age range. I LOVE that you can machine wash her because things get dirty in this house and it really helps to have something machine washable. She can suck her thumb, which my kids like. A very nice doll I would recommend.

title: Creative!
text: My nine year old daughter and I enjoy doing crafts together. This was a very cute set. It has a bunch of soap molds like flowers and allows them to make nice smelling soaps and an oatmeal soap. There are a lot of options to make it your own. It was easy to do and fun. It even came with (some) gift boxes to put them in. She really enjoyed it. I also like giving these sorts of things away as gifts. I would recommend it.

title: So cute
text:
I have always liked decorating my nails, and now I can do it with my daughters. These pens make it easy to do. It comes with little stickers that you can "color in" with the pens. It comes with the stickers as well as a file and 135 nail gems. There are five colors.

You do need a steady hand to do it, and it can be a little frustrating, especially for a young child. Still it is very neat to be able to create your own designs. My daughter really liked it. She could decorate it for a holiday, a sports team or whatever she wants. There are any simple designs that are easy.

The nail polish was fine. I think this would also make a great gift, and I would recommend it.

title: Fun game
text:
My children enjoyed this game very much. It's relatively easy and very fast-paced. It's also quick so it's good if you don't have a lot of time. I like that it can be played by up to nine people because it is good as a party game.

This game is pretty small so it is good to take with you. It's not too difficult as well. The kids played it for a while. I would recommend it.

title: Unique and fun game
text:
My kids love spy things. They watch spy movies (kids' versions), want to dress up as spies and play spy games. Thus this game is really cute for them. It comes with clamps and string to make it seem like they are dodging through a laser field. You can set it up as complicated or as simple as you like depending on your child. When your child touches the strong, the timer goes faster.

This is a really cute game. My children really liked it. I like that it has some physical aspect instead of just something where the kids sit. They had fun and I had fun watching them. I would recommend it.

title: Fun trivia game with a twist
text: This is a fun trivia game with a twist to make it unique. It has a bunch of questions (1600 to last a while) but it's not just a straightforward trivia game like Trivial Pursuit. It has the added element of people deciding how any clues they need to get it right and also betting whether the others will get it right. It makes for a lot of fun. We did it for family game night and had a really nice time. There are a variety of subjects covered. It would also be great for a party or nice as a gift. I would recommend it.

title: and the Fluxx card game turns out to be a lot of fun for someone who hasn't played it before
text: We're big Batman fans, and the Fluxx card game turns out to be a lot of fun for someone who hasn't played it before.  Based on other reviews, I assume it is similar to other Fluxx games.  The cards seem high quality and the printing is vivid.

title: Cute but not perfect
text: This was a fun set but there were some issues. They had fun with putting together the beads, although it could be a little difficult to do. There are a lot of pieces to that so you have to be careful that they don't get everywhere. It worked but not perfectly. They can come apart if treated roughly and my daughter found that very frustrating. Overall, it is fun, but for older kids.

title: Cute shape sorter
text: This is a cute shape sorter that my children enjoyed playing with. It is made of mostly plastic, but it feels sturdy. I think shape sorters are great toys because they keep the kids busy and also teach them about colors, shapes, hand/eye coordination and more. I love how it collapses. With four kids, we have amassed a fair amount of toys and anything that gets smaller is very much appreciated. It is also very cute with the animal face compared to others - my child really enjoys that. I would recommend it.

title: Cute little building set
text: This is a cute little building set, which my four children enjoyed. It is colorful and good for both boys and girls. The little school bus idea makes it more than just an ordinary building set. The stickers are cute, and I like that it goes over letters to be educational. We have so many electronic toys, but it is unbelievable how much the kids love the simple building sets. These felt well made. I also like that it is compatible with other sets by the same company because we have some of those, too. My kids enjoyed it.

title: Nice puzzle
text: My six year old son loves puzzles and he loves dinosaurs so this was a good fit for him. 100 pieces is a good number - not so few that he's done in a minute, challenging, and not too much that it's just impossible. He did it with his big sisters. It has a nice dinosaur print on it, and it is fun that it glows in the dark. The pieces feel nice and thick. He had fun making it, then we can put it back and make it again. I like that the box has a handle. So many boxes that puzzles come in get ruined so easily, so it was nice that this one was a little nicer. He had fun with the puzzle. Of course puzzles in general are a great activity. It's not the cheapest price for a puzzle, but a lot of these floor puzzles can be expensive. I would recommend this.

title: Fun game
text: I grew up playing Scrabble and love it so I was excited to get this game. I enjoyed this game a lot, too. There are some advantages and disadvantages. First, it requires 3 batteries and they do not come with it. I always find it a little annoying when something like this doesn't come with batteries because so many things do. I like how small and portable it is. It's not so easy to take a Scrabble game anywhere, but this can easily travel anywhere. I thought the game was fun. I like games that challenge you and require you to use your mind. They say it is good for you and this definitely requires more brain power than your average game. I also like it for the kids for the same reason. it worked okay and felt strong. I like that it has different versions of the game - turn it to Solo for a game by yourself or you can do Turbo or Party for more people. Overall, I thought it was fun, educational and portable, and I would recommend it.

title: Cute and creative
text:
We made something like this many years ago, and it is still on my sliding glass door, so I was glad to get something like this. This is a really cute craft project that allows the children to make their own colorful window clings. It worked well and let them make about twenty clings. There were many different options, which I liked - they could make stars, hearts, snakes, spiders and more. I have girls and a boy so I liked that it was good for both genders since so many craft projects seem to be geared towards one or the other.

This is an easy and quick craft. They can use different colors. I think the product turned out nice and it's something we can display for a long time. It's also a little different than many of the other crafts. My children enjoyed it.

title: Great toy with a dash of science
text:
I loved science as a kid (and my mom is a science teacher) so I really try to get my four kids excited about science. This is a great toy that combines the fun of a doll with a fun science experiment.

I am happy with all aspects of this toy. I very much like the doll. It is pretty and attractive and my daughter loves it. I think it's cute that it comes with glasses, especially for kids who need glasses. She is similar in size to a Barbie doll, with a slightly larger head. My seven year old daughter loves playing with dolls, so this fit in nicely with her Barbies. It feels like a high quality doll.

I was very happy with the experiment part, too. Of course the volcano experiment is a classic one, and I very much like that you can do the experiment over and over again. You do have to supply some of your own materials, but they are very upfront about that so it's okay. It's not expensive or anything to buy the few things. The experiment worked well.

It's important to teach girls that they can enjoy science too. I would recommend this.

title: Lots of fun
text: It's unbelievable how much fun it is for kids to push a car down a ramp, but it is. They really enjoy this toy. It's fun and simple and they can do it for a while. I LOVE how it folds up - we have a lot of clutter in the house and that is really very nice. You don't usually have a toy that is over a foot tall be able to fold down so it's only three feet tall. It comes with two cars. It is colorful and good for both boys and girls. My daughter plays with lots of characters so it goes along nicely with her set. It is made for ages 12 months and up but it can be fun for older kids. It's nice to have a car set for younger kids since most of the matchbox cars are made for older children. I would recommend this.

title: Fun toy
text:
I got this for my baby daughter thinking she would like it, and not realizing that my older daughter who is seven would like it so much. it's a cute, but simple toy. You pull it back and it moves forward like a pull back race car. Only it's Pinkie Pie from the popular My Little Pony series.

This is a great toy. It's really cute, and My Little Pony is very popular with girls of different ages. It's not too big though. My daughter can use use it while playing with her other My Little Pony and various characters. It works fine. I really like that it has no batteries to worry about. I am very happy with this product.

title: Fun for your little pilot
text: I have four young kids, and they enjoy the Fisher-Price Little People Spinnin' Sounds Airport. They really enjoy planes as many kids do. They (and I) like the way the plane goes down the pool. It also has different sounds. It comes with various pieces - some characters, a baggage cart, baggage and a table and chairs. My kids have a ton of characters (including a lot of the Little People we've gotten throughout the years). and this makes a nice set to play with. It's so cute how they can pretend to check in luggage, eat, get gas and get ready to take off. I would recommend this toy.

title: fun and creative
text:
This is both fun and creative. My older daughters like being creative and they also like playing with characters so this is great because it combines both. Because of all the different papers there are so many different ways this can be designed. It is fun for the child and takes a while. Once they were done decorating, they played with the figure.

Everything felt well made. It is paper, of course, so the child has to be somewhat careful with it. it wasn't too hard to do. It is fun that it's both a craft and a fun toy to play with.

I like toys that require my children to use their creativity. I would recommend this.

title: Cute and fun game
text: My daughters enjoy My Little Pony. This is a simple yet fun game for them. It has a very simple concept - the kids take turns with each balloon and one of them will cause Pinkie Pie to pop up. They like when she pops. It's simple enough for everyone to understand and because there is no skill involved, kids of different ages can play and each will have turns to win. Only two people can play, which was a little disappointing in our family of four kids. They did like playing it and did so over and over again, but it obviously is still a simple concept and won't last forever or be great for older kids. It felt well made, and everything worked fine without a problem. Overall, I would recommend it.

title: Classic game with a TMNT twist
text: My kids love UNO and they love Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles so this is a fun combination. I remember playing UNO as a kid, and it is a great kid. It seems so simple and yet it is so much fun, especially for kids. It's a great game to take on the go. All of my kids like TMNT, but especially my six year old son. This game is a lot of fun for him and has some nice extras. They can spend hours playing it. It's great for family game night or as a gift. I would recommend it.

title: So much more than your average magnetic drawing board
text:
First, let me start off by saying that magnetic drawing boards are awesome to begin with. I have four young kids and we have spent many hours with magnetic drawing boards. It is great for them to be able to draw again and again without needing to have a million papers get all over the place. It's also great to take on trips or in the car.

This is so much more than just a magnetic drawing board. It helps the children learn to write the right way. It also has stamps.

My six year old son (and his older sisters) really enjoyed this. He can always use more work on handwriting, so this was great to use to practice with. I love that it shows them the right way. It worked perfectly and was easy for him to use. This would also make a great gift. I would recommend it.

title: Educational
text:
My kids (ages 6, 7 and 9) really liked this. They love spy games so this was right up their alley. It comes with lots of parts to do different forensic analyses. It included a little microscope, evidence vials, a UV scanner and more.

This kept my kids busy for hours. They really liked it. And the best part is that it is educational.Everything worked as it was supposed to. It is great for kids who love police or spy things. It came with a large manual. I would recommend it.

title: Great product
text:
The first thing you notice about this great product is that it comes in a sturdy plastic bin. So many of these types of toys come in paper boxes that just fall apart and then everything gets everywhere. I really like that.

I think this is a great set for kids. It is educational, teaching them about engineering. The kids can spend a while doing it building the different pieces outlined in the manual (there are twenty, which is a good number). When they are done with those, they can use their imagination to build whatever they want.

The pieces feel very sturdy. I love that it makes so many pieces.

Of course the most important thing is how much the kids liked it. My six year old son immediately opened it up and started playing with it. He can play with it for hours. What is nice is that he can put it away and come back to it again and again.

I would highly recommend this toy for both home and classroom use. It's also great as a gift.

title: Great for my girls
text:
I have two girls who really enjoy this project. It comes with two kits and plenty of stuff for both of them. That is great because it is so much easier than them trying to share it.

I like that this is educational. They have so many toys that don't have an educational value, so it is nice to have one that does. They are always playing spy games so this goes along really well with that. There are different activities in this. It comes with invisble ink pens, message masks, cipher wheels and more. It is enough to keep a child busy for quite a while. You don't need batteries, which is also really good. It has a book to explain it all.

This is both fun and educational. It would also make a good gift. I would recommend it.

My kids really enjoyed it. I would recommend this.

title: Cute for Monster High fans
text:
My eldest daughters (ages 9 and 7) really like Monster High. The popular movies are very cute and this is a great toy for fans of the movies. It comes with a Clawdeen Wolf figure. She is one of the more popular characters from the show. The "Moviemobile" opens up.

My kids enjoyed playing with this toy. They spend a lot of time playing with their characters (Especially the younger one) and this fit in great. It's probably best for fans of the show, since it might look funny to a child who isn't familiar with the characters. But so any kids like these characters now.

It seemed well made. It is mostly plastic, but it was fine. It was fun for the to put together. It takes a little while, but that was part of the fun. Overall, I would recommend it.

title: Main characters of film
text:
Mal and Ben are the main characters in Disney Descendants so this is a nice two pack of dolls. They are wearing the outfits they wear at the very end - during the party after the coronation. My daughters love both Disney Descendants and dolls so this was the perfect set for them.

The dolls are about the size of Barbie dolls and can be played with the dolls. Disney Descendants is huge right now, so this is a great set for kids who like the movie. Even if someone doesn't like the movie, they are attractive dolls.

The dolls feel well made. They've played with them a lot and we haven't had any quality issues. My daughter can spend hours playing with them. This is a good deal for a two pack of the dolls. I would recommend this as a gift, as well.

title: Fun for kids
text:
My four kids enjoyed this Yo-ller coaster. It's really neat how the little pieces go down and spin and flip and so forth. It looks like they are defying gravity and the kids really like it. It also makes music and other sounds, which they really like. I wish it came with a few more, but you can buy more.

It wasn't too hard to put it together but it did take a little while. It required screws. It's not a small toy, but not as big as I worried it would be, which is good because it's not coming apart easily. It feels nice and sturdy.

It's a fun and unique toy. I would recommend it.

title: Beautiful doll
text: This doll is really beautiful It's so pretty that someone who is or is not a fan of Descendants would enjoy it. Of course someone who does like the movie would enjoy it for play time. It comes with a beautiful dress that mimics what Lonnie wears at the coronation. Lonnie is the daughter of Mulan and is one of the supporting characters in the movie. The doll is about the size of a Barbie doll so can be played with them. She feels like she is a good quality doll. My daughter loves to play with dolls and can do it for hours. She has most of the Descendants dolls so she likes this. I would recommend it.

title: Great for Sophia fans
text: My daughters (and young son) watch Sophia the First on Disney Jr. all the time. This is a great set for fans of the show. It comes with Sophia and Minimus, her horse. The two characters can sing and talk to each other. This was a nice sized set - larger than I thought it would be. My daughter can spend hours playing with her characters and she really liked adding this to the mix. It feels well made, even though its mostly plastic (as most of these types of things are). It worked fine with no problems. It has a nice look - it looks very much like the characters in the show. One thing is - at first I thought the toy actually flew when I first saw the description, but it does not. Your child makes them "fly." but still, my daughter spent hours with it and really enjoyed it.

title: Great Christmas gift
text: This would make a great Christmas gift, although I might consider giving it a tad early if your child would want to put it around his tree. It is such a great train to put around the tree or to just have out all year wrong. Thomas the Train is one of the most beloved characters for little boys - my six year old son was very excited to get this. It is one circle, but has a bunch of little places around that. Thomas talks as he goes along the track. It also has other little goodies, like having Sir Topham Hatt come out dressed like Santa. It wasn't hard to put together and felt well made. Everything worked perfectly. This would be a great thing to have as a tradition.

title: Great Descendants toy
text:
My daughters love Descendants. This character is Mal, the main character in the movie, wearing the first outfit in the movie. They really liked the doll and played with it a lot.

This doll is about the size of a Barbie doll. It feels like it is made well. We have not had any problems with this doll or those in the same line. She is attractive and looks like the character in the movie. Now the doll has a bit of a unique look (because the character has a unique look) so it is probably best for fans of the movie. This is such a popular movie right now - this would make a great gift for a girl who likes it. My daughters (and I) would recommend it.

title: Cute game!
text:
My children enjoy the Cat in the Hat and this is a fun game that is related to it. I like that it gets them moving. They may have to crawl or hop or do other things. It's nice to have them moving. So many of the board games for little kids are very repetitive so it is nice to have a game with some imagination.

The kids really enjoyed this game. They thought it was a lot of fun. It was easy to play. It's good to keep them busy on a rainy day. The only thing is it would be nice to have a few more cards. One fun thing you can do is have your kids make their own to add a little more fun. Still, they and I liked it.

title: So pretty
text:
This is a really pretty baby doll. She really is so cute, and y daughter loves her. The dress is sweet too as is the magnetic pacifier.

She is very soft. She is a good size, not so small that she won't grow with the baby but not too big that she takes up too much room.

She feels very well made and durable. I like that she is machine washable. In my house with four kids, we need that.

I'm happy with everything with this doll and would recommend it.

title: Sweet baby doll This is a sweet looking baby doll
text:
Sweet baby doll This is a sweet looking baby doll. It is larger than many of the dolls made for this age group, so it will grow nicely with my young daughter. It is very soft and very cute. It comes with a pacifier that attaches with magnets and can come on and off. The cloth diaper and outfit can also come off so your daughter can put her in something else.

It feels very sturdy and well made. I feel comfortable letting my young daughter play with it. She really enjoys it. It is much softer than the dolls that have the hard heads. It would also make a nice gift.

One reason I took off a stay is that it is recommended to just surface wash it. For me this is a big deal. With four young kids, our dolls and toys just get dirty... things get spilled on them, accidents happen, etc. I really prefer things that can be washed in the machine, and nowadays many can. I usually end up washing them in the machine anyways. Overall, though, it is a cute doll.

title: Another favorite
text:
My daughters like the movie Descendants. Jane, the daughter of the Fairy Godmother, is one of the supporting characters, but my seven year old daughter actually likes her the best of all the characters. She was very excited to get this doll to add to her collection of Descendants dolls.

This doll is very well put together. It is very pretty. It feels durable. She is about the size of a Barbie doll. She is wearing the party dress from the climax scene of the movie, the coronation ball. In the movie, she is a relatively dowdy character, but this makes her look very nice. She comes with some accessories like a purse and a crown. She also comes with a ring that my daughter can wear. My daughter enjoyed playing with her very much.

title: Great for Descendants fans
text:
When my seven and nine year old daughters saw Descendants they were hooked. Right away they started dressing like the (they already have two outfits from the movie collection). They were looking for some things they could use to to go along with it. For instance, my daughter was trying to find a mirror she could use to replicate Evie's mirror from the movie. This set of accessories is a really great accompaniment. It has the mirror, which they love, and it has a secret compartment in it. In addition, it has other different accessories like a bracelet and tiara. It also comes with charms that you can put on the tiaras and bracelet to decorate it as you like.

My children really enjoyed these accessories. They used them right away in their pretend play. This would also go along well for someone who wants to be one of these characters for Halloween. It's mostly plastic, but it feels durable enough. A lot of fun in a little package.

title: Super cute
text: My daughter has the name of Supergirl, and she really likes this little superhero doll. It's not a huge doll, but she is seven and it is an okay size for her. The one thing is the mask doesn't come off - I think it would've bren cute if the mask had been removable. She is very soft and cute, though. The cape is a nice touch. She feels nice and durable. u daughter likes the little pig tails and bows. I would recommend this toy for your little superhero.

title: Great doll for Descendants fans
text:
My children really enjoy Descendants, and so do many others (It's one of the most popular movies out there right now). They also like playing with Barbie and similar dolls, so this is a great toy for them. They have a whole bunch of the Descendants dolls.

This doll is of Audrey, the daughter of Princess Aurora and Prince Philip. In the movie she is a little bit of an antagonist, so they did not like her as much as the main protagonist (Mal, and secondarily Evie) but they could still play with her with the others. The doll itself is well made and comes with a pretty dress. I think it resembles the character in the movie. It can also be used as a general doll for children who are not as familiar with the movie. The accessories are nice.

title: Daughter loves them
text:
My daughter is enjoying this two pack of Descendants characters. She really enjoyed the popular Disney Channel movie, and has a variety of the dolls. She really wanted this one because she needed more male characters. This has two of the main characters from the movie.

They are about the size of Barbie dolls and she plays with them with her Barbie dolls. They are well made. The outfits are cute, and they look like the characters in the movie. They have held up well to her playing with them. She can spend hours playing with these and her other dolls.

This would also make a great gift for fans of the movie. I would recommend it.

title: My daughters love Descendants, one of the most popular movies out ...
text: My daughters love Descendants, one of the most popular movies out there, and they love this doll. It is of Mal, the main protagonist in the movie, wearing the ballgown she wears at the end of the movie for the coronation scene. It is very pretty as is the doll.  The doll is approximately the size of a Barbie doll, and my daughter plays with her in conjunction with the other Barbie dolls. She loves to play out the scenes from the movie with the similar dolls. It feels well made. She comes with a few accessories. I would recommend her.

title: Unique craft
text: This was a unique craft that is different from many of the other things we've done. My daughter who is almost ten really enjoyed it. They can use the templates to make three patterns or make their own designs. Different colored strings make it colorful and pretty. My daughter enjoyed making it. She spent hours on it. They have to learn how to do it but once you have the hang of it, it's not hard. There are sharp pins, though so you have to be very careful, especially if your child has younger siblings. The only thing I didn't like and the reason I took off a star was because it is really hard to hang. Because it is delicate and has all those pins, I really would've liked if I could've hung it easily. Still it is a fun craft and good for your own child or as a gift.

title: Cute doll that helps with coordination
text: This is a very cute doll. She is adorable and my daughters liked her very much. She has a very cute outfit on. I like that she has different types of fasteners like a button so that children can practice fastening things. It is a fun way to practice and can also keep a very young one busy. I also like that she came with a clip so I can attach her to my stroller. She is also washable in the machine, which for us is very good because undoubtedly someone will spill something on her. She felt soft and durable and of good quality. Most importantly, my kids enjoyed her. I would recommend her.

title: Very cute bath set
text: This set of four bath toys is really cute. It comes with four cute animals - a puppy, monkey, bee and owl. They can be used to squirt each other and also just as toys in the bath. They are a good shape for little hands. They each have their own life preserver, which is not attached, which is really xute because you can put other toys and stuff on it too. They do not have phthalates. These were great for bath and shower time. My kids enjoyed them.

title: Great kit
text:
This is a great kit for little detectives. It's not just a toy but has a lot of scientific information on how detectives use forensic science to solve crimes. There was a lot to it. It came with ways to look for fingerprints footprints and tire tracks. They have a book that has a pretend crime. There were many experiments but the book explained how they were done. My husband did it with all my kids (they are 9,7 and 6 years old). There was a lot to this - they can really spend hours on it and learn both about police work and science.

My daughter was so excited to get it. She loves pretend play so this one was great. It is good for someone who is interested in police work or likes science. I like that it has them use their mind.

Everything seemed well made and it came in a nice case. I am very happy with it.

title: Beautiful doll
text:
This really is a very pretty doll. The face is lovely and my daughter liked her right away. This doll is great for fans of Descendants or even just little girls who like dolls. It is about the size of a Barbie doll. She has a cute outfit on and comes with a purse and shoes.

The doll felt well made, which is good because my daughter's dolls can take some abuse. My daughter played with her for a while and really enjoyed her. She will make a nice addition to her collection.

title: Great train toy
text:
I have a six year old son, and he very much enjoyed this toy. First, Thomas the Train is a very popular character. He has watched the show and played with other related toys before. This one is very cute. It shows the erupting volcano. There are lights and sounds, which he really liked. He like the zip line, too.

One thing I really like about this set is that it can connect to other sets. It is great as a stand alone, but you can use other sets and trains with it, which is nice.

We didn't have a problem setting it up. It was easy. It felt nice and sturdy. No problems with with quality. He played with it for a while and enjoyed it. My daughters liked it, too. I would recommend it.

title: Sweet doll
text:
My older girls have lots of dolls so I was looking for something for my younger one. This is a very sweet doll. First, at 15 inches, it is a nice sized dolls. Many of the dolls for the youngest kids are only half this size. It might be okay when they are young, but it doesn't grow with them. This one is nice because it grows with them. It is very cute. It looks like a little baby and has a pacifier. It says My 1st doll, which I think will be nice for my daughter as she grows because she will recognize it as one of her first toys.

The doll felt very well made. It was soft. My daughter likes it a lot. I am very happy with this product.

title: Cute toy
text:
I have a newborn and my two older girls love to be little mommies. My girls love to carry their dolls with them. This is a very cute toy that allows them to carry their doll. They can wear their doll in the front or the back. We have had several of these, but this is a very nice one. It is thicker than the others. It is very well made, and feels nice and thick. It is very cute with the pink flowers and hearts. It is also adjustable, which is nice. It can be worn by a slightly older child, too. It is soft.

There was only one drawback that I saw and which was the reason I took off the star. I felt that the place where you put the doll was a little shallow. Some of the bigger dolls bent down or wouldn't stay because of that. I wish it had a little bit of a deeper opening in which to put the doll. It did get my daughter a little frustrated. Overall, it is a very nice toy, however, and i would recommend it.

title: Nice to get something that is good for the environment
text:
With four kids, I have a lot of plastic toys. I just can't afford to only get the natural wooden toys. It is really nice to see a plastic that is "greener" and better for the environment. I love being able to say that this is made from 100% recycled plastic and explain all about that to the kids and talk about recycling. I also like that it is free of chemicals such as BPA, phthalates, or PVC. It is easy to clean in the dishwasher.

My kids really enjoyed these blocks. It's amazing how they love the simple things as much or more than all their electronic toys. They built different things with them. The colors worked for both my son and my daughters. They spent a while playing with them, put them away and played with them later. I love toys like these where the kids have to use their imaginations. I would recommend these "green" blocks.

title: It's a nice addition to the basic castle
text:
This is the gift set version of this toy. Not only does it include the palace but it also comes with two princesses, two princes and a little carriage to put them in. It's a nice addition to the basic castle.

This is a great product for your little princess. First, it is suitable for children who are 18 months or older. Most of the dollhouses that are similar are not good until the child is three years old, so it is nice to have something that is safe for younger children, especially since there are so many two year old girls who love the princesses. It is a nice sized dollhouse, large enough for them to play with but not so large that it clutters up your home. It comes with Belle and Cinderella. Of course you can use other little people characters in it (or just similar sized characters).

My daughter likes all of the interactive parts. It plays music and talks. My daughter really likes it. It plays "Bibbidi-Bobbidi-Boo" and "Beauty and the Beast." The dolls can dance on the spinning dance floor.

Everything worked just fine. It is made of plastic, but feels nice and sturdy. My daughter can spend forever playing with her characters, so this is great for that. I was very happy with it.

title: Great for your little princess
text:
This is a great product for your little princess. First, it is suitable for children who are 18 months or older. Most of the dollhouses that are similar are not good until the child is three years old, so it is nice to have something that is safe for younger children, especially since there are so many two year old girls who love the princesses. It is a nice sized dollhouse, large enough for them to play with but not so large that it clutters up your home. It comes with Belle and Cinderella. Of course you can use other little people characters in it (or just similar sized characters).

My daughter likes all of the interactive parts. It plays music and talks. My daughter really likes it. It plays "Bibbidi-Bobbidi-Boo" and "Beauty and the Beast." The dolls can dance on the spinning dance floor.

Everything worked just fine. It is made of plastic, but feels nice and sturdy. My daughter can spend forever playing with her characters, so this is great for that. I was very happy with it.

title: Daughter loves it
text:
This is a truly magical gift for a little girl. I have three daughter, two of whom are seven and nine. I am letting the share this doll. It is so pretty. It was a little larger than I thought at first, but this makes it all the better. It looks so beautiful and sweet. My daughter loves unicorns.

The unicorn does so much. It's horn lights up. It responds to her touching it or making noise. It moves and makes noise. She can also lie down, sit or stand. We do not have any pets, and my daughters really enjoy playing pretend with stuffed animals. This is so lifelike that it is great for that purpose.

We had no problems with any of the features of the doll. Everything worked perfectly. She is very soft. It is not inexpensive, but it can make a really special one of a kind friend for your little girl.

title: My son loves it
text: My six year old son loves the Octonauts and really enjoyed this toy. It is a nice size and he can use it with the character it comes with and other characters. He likes that it breaks apart and can be a sled or a shuttle. It also lights up, and looks really neat. This is great for pretend play and compliments their other Octonauts toys well. He likes the rescue tank. It worked fine and felt nice and sturdy. I would recommend this toy.

title: Kids enjoyed it
text: My son and daughters enjoyed this Play-doh set. First, let me say that I just love Play-doh in general. It's so great to have anon-toxic, easy to clean up toy that they can use for hours and be creative with. That being said, this is a nice set. My son is too young to watch the actual Star Wars but that doesn't mean he doesn't know about it through books and other ways. He enjoyed that this was related to it. It was cute that the tubs had the pictures of the Star Wars characters on them. You can use the molds to make different things like X-wing Starfighters. You can then launch them. My son spent quite a while making different things. He did them in several colors, which he liked. When he was done, everything went away and we'll make it again. I would recommend this.

title: Fun for my nine year old
text:
This is a cute product that lets you make friendship bracelets far quicker than by traditional means. It is not too hard to read if you take the time to read the instructions and watch the videos. You can make bracelets quickly. It comes with a variety of thread to use with it.

There are several things I really liked about this product. First I really like that it doesn't require electricity or batteries of any type. We seem to go through so many batteries and it is such a hassle to replace them, so it is nice to find a kid product that doesn't require it. Next I liked how many different types of bracelets they could make, especially with the different colors. Not only that but they can also make headbands, necklaces, belts and zipper pulls.

It is nice for kids to make something, especially something they can use or make as gifts. And they can keep using it. You can get more thread to use it more. This is nice, both for your child or for a gift.

title: Sweet doll
text: This is a very sweet doll. She is very pretty and smiles widely, which I really like. The accessories she comes with are cute. My daughter spent a while styling her hair. She liked her pink hair. The doll was a tiny bit hard, which was the reason I took off one star, but my daughter didn't seem to notice. My daughter really enjoyed her and played with her a while. I would recommend her.

title: Nice set with great case
text:
First I want to say how nice it is to have a toy like this come in such a nice case. When we get these sort of things in boxes, which we usually do, they just seem to fall apart right away. Once they do, the pieces get everywhere and it's hard to keep track of them. So that is really nice.

I liked this kit. My son is six and enjoyed planes. It was a fun idea to have a storybook that shows them what they should make. It was unique and set it apart from similar products. The pieces felt sturdy and well made. The children did it with my husband and had no problems putting everything together.

I really like toys that are educational, and this provides some educational value. What's also nice is that it can go a long way - after they'e done with the book, they can then just use the pieces to make their own creations. They can spend hours with it. I also feel that something like this would be a good gift. I would recommend this product.

title: Cute and fun set
text:
My six year old son did this set with his father, and it is really cute. They can go through and build all of the different vehicles. It's cute that it's more than just a building set. Once they were gone, he could build the vehicles again or go through and use his imagination.He can build the different things and then play with them. The pieces seemed nice and sturdy. I really like that it has a nice sturdy case to carry it in - most of these sorts of sets come in a box that gets destroyed and then the pieces are everywhere.

I like that the toy is educational. It is also good for boys and girls, which is good for us since I have both. I think it would also work well as a gift. I was very happy with it.

title: Kids loved this set
text:
My children (ages 6, 7 and 9) really enjoyed this Play-doh set. Even I thought it was adorable. You put the person in the chair and you can crank it to make Play-doh hair grow out of the head. It is so adorable. They experimented with the different colors. Once the hair grew, they took the character down and then they could use the scissors to cut the hair. My kids even styles the hair in pony-tails and other designs. Once they are done with that they can play with the characters. Then they put it away and play with it again later.

I was happy with the quality of this toy. It came with a lot of different colors of Play-doh. Of course you can mix and match it with your other Play-doh sets. I love that Play-doh is non-toxic, easy to use, and let's kids explore their creativity. This is a great toy for your own kids or as a gift.

title: Fun binoculars
text: My son liked these binoculars. They are an attractive green (his favorite color!) You can adjust them so it was no problem for him to use them and then my daughters, who are older. You can adjust the focus, which is nice. They have a strap for him to carry it. He used it while "exploring." It is easy and fun to use. I like toys that promote exploring. They felt hardy and durable to me. I do consider them a toy, though, and not really the best pair if you want one that works really well as binoculars. They do work to an extent, but there are better ones you can get for a child who is doing real exploring.

title: Sweet, attractive doll
text: This was a sweet and attractive doll. She is very pretty, and my daughter liked her right away. I really like that she has a nice wide smile. It's cute that she has pink in her hair. The hair is very soft, and the outfit is cute. The accessories that she came with were fun. My daughter styled her hair. She felt like a quality doll, but the only thing I didn't like and the reason I took off a star is that she felt a little hard to me, even for dolls that are in this style and are generally hard. Still, my daughter didn't seem to notice and I would recommend her.

title: Kids really enjoyed this
text:
The kids actually enjoyed this far more than I thought they would. We had some daddy long legs around the house. I hate to kill them but it's annoying taking them out every time I see one. This was really cool... the kids would use this and then take it outside. The spiders were fine. It worked really well. Obviously this can be used to explore many other insects too. It's nice that it comes with both pieces - the vacuum to get the bugs and then a place to put them.

The case is neat. It's a good size for a little kid. It doesn't just have to be for bugs I was going to let my kids use it to collect seashells at the beach or flowers or leaves or rocks. It has a little magnifying glass and a light at the top. They spent quite a while using these to explore. It felt like it was good quality. I liked this set much more than I thought and would recommend it.

title: Cute game
text:
My daughters and son enjoyed this game. It is easy to set up - just insert the batteries and pop in the four discs. It worked fine with no problems. The children didn't even need me to tell them how to play - they just step on the disc that has the coordinating light light up. It gets harder because the lights come faster as you advance. My kids liked it and spent a while playing with it. They had fun.

There are a few things I didn't like about this game. First, I wish it let more than two people play at once. It would be nice if it had a mode for a four person play instead of just a two person play. Also, I felt like it was a little loud. Some kids might like that it is loud though. Also, once when my son stepped on it, one of the round things came out. In general it worked fine.

Overall this is a cute game, and it's nice that it has some physical activity in it. They aren't just sitting down for it. One kid who does it continuously can get quite a workout. My kids enjoyed it. I think it would also be nice for a party.

title: Educational and fun
text:
My daughter enjoyed this kit. She is nine years old and we had her do it with her father. I love how many different principles of physics it teaches in one kit. They do activities such as building a crane, pulley, wheelbarrow and a balance scale. Each principle is demonstrated with a fun experiment. You can explain the different principles of physics as you go through it. This provides such a nice basis for learning about science.

The projects were fun for my daughter to do. She enjoyed putting them together. For some young kids at the younger part of the age range it might be hard - before we started we figured my husband would do it with her. With an adult, it's no problem. Everything is easily spelled out and worked as it should. There really is a lot to this kit. They spent hours working on it together. It's much nicer than just a plain toy with no educational value. It also makes a nice gift.

title: Great doll tied into movie
text: My daughters enjoy the Barbie movies very much. They very much like getting dolls tied into the movie. What better toy for a Barbie doll than a Barbie toy? This one is very nice. My daughters like the rock star look and the guitar. She fits in well with my daughters' collection. Like other Barbie dolls, the quality is very good. My daughters can spend hours playing with this and their other dolls. I would recommend this, especially for fans of the movies.

title: Nice for newborns
text: My newborn daughter enjoys this crib toy. It was easy to attach and worked fine. It lights up and plays sweet music for the baby in two modes. It can stay on for thirty minutes, which is longer than my other crib toy. I like that because I have to get up less to turn it on. When she is older, she will be able to turn it on herself when it is in interactive mode. The lights are very pretty - more than just a plain nightlight. It plays nature sounds too. It sounded very nice, and the baby liked it.

title: Kids spent hours with it
text:
This is the second similar toy we have had from this company, and I can say our kids spend hours with them. My six-year old son loves dinosaurs (and the color green so it's perfect) and he loves making these dinosaurs. You can use the instructions to make the dinosaurs that they specify (a t-rex, triceratops, etc) and my kids did that first. They could make two dinosaurs at once, although not necessarily all the dinosaurs) Afterwards, though, they spent forever making their own creations. With over two hundred pieces, there were plenty of pieces for three of my kids to all make creatures simultaneously. They really enjoyed it, and I like that they used their creativity.

The pieces are made of foam, and at first I know I was hesitant about this, but I've found that they were remarkably strong. We never had a problem with one breaking and my kids can be rough. These were easy enough for my kids to do on their own. Once they made the creatures they played with them. For the size creatures they make, the box isn't too big, so they just put everything back when they were done and could make more the next time. Overall, it is a great product that I would recommend.

title: Wonderful version of the classic game
text: My kids love Candy Land, just like when I did when I was a kid. This classic game is fun, colorful and easy to play. It is great for the whole family. I love this princess version of it. I have three daughters and they love princesses. It is so cute to have little characters. The game is great for your little princess. Everything is well made and fun to play. This also makes a great gift for a birthday party. Its a great value for so many hours of play. I would recommend it.

title: Cute doll
text: This is a cute doll. My girls like My Little Pony but are getting a little old for the traditional dolls. This is nice for girls who are slightly older. The doll is adorable, and my daughter loves her. She likes that she is pink. She makes a nice addition to her collection of Barbie dolls and other characters. It feels well made and durable. We are happy with it.

title: Great set
text: Play-doh gives hours of fun. My kids can literally spend hours with this set. It is so cute. We love Play-doh because it is safe, nontoxic and lets them be creative. This carnival toy cones with a lot. The kids make pretend cupcakes and put it on the Ferris wheel. It comes with a variety of colors and different tools. Everything was well made and it entertained both my son and daughters. These also make great gifts. It goes well with the other sets we have. I would recommend it.

title: Really cute set
text:
This is a really cute stage set. My seven year old daughter loves playing with little characters. This is the perfect set not just for the littlest pet shop characters, but for other little characters as well. I like that it comes with so many pieces (over 100) so that your child can custom make it for her. It has different backdrops, stickers and other accessories. She can also switch it around. It is expandable and has a lot of accessories.

My daughter really enjoyed it. She spent hours with it. It comes with two of the pets. You can also use an app to play more. It took a while for her to put it together, but that is part of the fun. I would definitely recommend this.

title: Kids love it
text:
I remember wanting a ride on car as a kid, and my children love this one. It looks so cool. My boy is excited, but my girls love it too. It looks real rough and tough. It looks so realistic, even though it's the kid version. Because it's not related to a character for young kids, we'll get more mileage out of it. It goes at two speeds, and both are pretty good for my young kids. They're not so slow that the kids know they are moving but not too fast that I worry about them. It also goes in reverse, which is nice.

It worked very well. We had no problems with it. The battery was decent and gave us a few hours. Assembly wasn't too bad (for my husband). It seemed really sturdy.
