This is something my kids can spend hours with. I like that it fits two kids well... I have four so we'll still have to share, but at least it's better than one.

title: Cute Play-Doh set
text:
This is a very sweet Play-Doh set. My seven year old daughter is really enjoying making the princess dresses. It's easy to make the dresses and then decorate them. My daughters love the princesses so this is a great toy for them. The princesses are popular for a lot of kids.

Once the dresses are on, they are then playing with the characters. Even without the dresses, they can use the characters. It comes with just a few Play-D tubs, including some with glitter, which is fun. Of course you can then use other Play-Doh with it. The castle is cute. Everything came already put together. Everything feels well made and durable. This is a great set to add to your Play-Doh or just general character collection. I would recommend it.

title: Fun Ever After set
text:
My daughters (ages 5 and 7) enjoy Ever After High. This is a nice set to go along with it. They like that it has multiple scenes, and I really like that it folds up a lot so that it doesn't take so much room. It has the dorm room, Wonderland High and the birthday party.

Overall I was happy with the quality. Most of it seemed sturdy. The part I didn't like was that there were some parts that were cardboard. Cardboard just doesn't last a whole long time in my house of four kids. I do like that they could use the cards to make their own tables and creations, but wish there were a few more accessories. Still, this is good for ours of creative play in my house, and I would recommend it.

title: Great dinosaur toy
text: This is a really cute dinosaur toy. It ties in with the movie so if your child is old enough to watch Jurassic World, he will enjoy that. My five year old son is too young for the movie, but he really likes the toys. He likes that the dinosaur can ride along on the back. The toy feels durable and well-made, which is important for us. It comes with a character, too. I like that it is not that big because we have a lot of stuff in the house. It is the perfect size for him. I am happy with it.

title: Nice doll with tie in to the movies
text:
My daughters love all the Barbie movies and enjoy having dolls that tie in with them. This toy is a lot of fun even though they haven't yet seen the movie because it's not out yet. There's a lot to the doll. It changes from a princess to a rock star. This is easy and fun. They like having her go back and forth. She also sings to some movies that are going to appear in the movie.

Princess and rock star are a good combination - my girls like both. Like the other Barbies we have, the doll feels well made and durable. The costume is very colorful and bright. They like her fun blue hair and guitar. She makes a great addition to our doll collection, and I'm sure they will enjoy her even more when they see the movie.

title: Fun Jurassic World Toy
text: I liked this toy from Jurassic world. It is not too big, which is great for us. It is easy for my son to hold... just the right size for him. When you push the button, the blades move and there is a light. It can pick up the dinosaur. It's great for pretend play. It comes with a character. Everything worked fine, and it seemed durable. My son is too young for the movie, but he still enjoys dinosaurs so it is great. Kids who are old enough to enjoy the movie will like the tie-in. I would recommend this toy.

title: Great for Frozen fans
text: My 7 and 9 year old daughters really like Frozen so this was a great product for them. The doll is cute and well made and really seems like Anna from the movie. My daughters enjoy singing along to the song they know so well. This feature makes the doll more special than similar onea.. It is well made and great for pretend play. They can use it alongside all their other Frozen toys. I would recommend this doll.

title: Nice little set
text: This is is a nice little set similar to Play-doh. The pieces do feel very well made. It comes with some different colors of the clay, some colds for them to make shapes, different types of scissors and some rollers. Of course you can use the rollers, scissors and molds over again. It is not a huge set, especially when compared to some of the Play-doh sets you can get out there, but the quality is good. My kids did play with it, but it didn't keep their attention for too long just because there wasn't so much to it. It might be better as a supplement or if purchased with a larger set of clay. Overall, though, it is a nice little set.

title: Kids are having so much fun
text: The kids are really enjoying this toy. They are pretending they are spies and doing all the different activities. My kids are different ages - 5, 7 and 9 - and they are all having fun with it. It comes with three activity books. It is keeping them occupied on our first day or spring break, which is great. I like that it is keeping them occupied without television. It is a lot of fun for pretend play. It is a good value for the amount of time they are spending on it. They have already been at it for hours, and I can see there is plenty left. A great fun toy for both girls and boys.

title: Cute game
text:
This is a simple but cute game from Melissa &Doug. The kids take turns feeding bait to the plush shark. It is a lot of fun for both my girls and boys. One thing that's neat is that the kids can also just play with the shark on its own.It is an easy game to learn and play. The kids (mine are ages 5, 7 and 9) were able to play on their own easily.

One thing I like is that there is an educational game. The children can learn about counting and colors. They also use their tactile senses.

Everything was very well made, which we have found to be the case for most of the M&D products we have. Everything felt durable and long lasting. We had no quality problems.

Overall, a very cute game, especially for little boys who love sharks!

title: Cute game with more to it than most kids games
text:
I find a lot of the games for little kids are just so simplistic that they don't keep the kids' attention or just seem repetitive. That is not the case with this game. We found it a lot of fun. You have to collect stars by doing different things. There's just a lot to it compared to many games. It kept the kids' attention and they enjoyed it. It is quite different than traditional Life, but it is still very fun and simpler for the younger kids.

The only reason i took off a star was for slight quality issues such as with the spinner. Still, we were overall very happy with this game.

title: awesome toy
text:
This is such an awesome toy for the kids (and adults). The dinosaur responds to the trackball. It has a lot of modes and does a lot of different things. It's programmed to seem like it is actually alive and learning. This is so much fun for the kids. It kept my three kids entertained for a while. I am sure it would be a lot of fun for a pet too although I would make sure the pet didn't actually touch it.

Everything worked perfectly. We had no problems out of the box. The dinosaur makes quick and crisp mm movements. We were very happy with it.

title: Nice plane
text:
This is a nice toy plane for the kids. My son is into superheros and the Avengers, and this makes a nice addition to his collection. He liked playing with it. It's cute that it opens up in front so you can put the characters (or other characters) into it.

I know some people have complained that it should be Black Widow on the motorcycle, and while I appreciate that, I didn't take off stars for it because the toy description very clearly states what it comes with. In this version it has Captain America, so it's not like anyone should've been surprised that it was Captain America. Yes, it would have been nice if they'd kept it the right way, but I'm not going to deduct when they gave you what was promised. My son is enjoying this toy and it seems well made, so to me it is a good toy I would recommend.

title: Nice doll with a few drawbacks
text:
Overall my daughter liked this doll. It is pretty and cute and she likes playing with it. The crown is a nice touch. The drink and go potty feature worked.

There were a few drawbacks:

The cups didn't change color for me. I'm not sure why but that was a little disappointing since I told my daughter it would.
It only comes with one diaper and it says to change the diaper as soon as she goes. So you will right away have no diaper. I really wish it came with some sort of cloth diaper you could let dry and use again. Instead you need to buy extra diapers, which is annoying an expensive.
It is a little hard, although my daughter didn't seem to mind.

Overall it's a really cute doll. AS long as you know the drawbacks, it's a decent potion.

title: Great Octonauts toy
text:
The Octonauts are extremely popular for both boys and girls, and this is a great toy to go along with them. It is a nice size toy that can be used in so many ways. It looks kind of like a sub and has room for the little gups (little boats) inside or on top of it. It rolls along nicely. It comes with two little gups, but you can buy more that will go along with it. It can launch them through it's front.

My kids very much enjoyed playing with this toy. They have a variety of the Octonauts toys and this went along very well. It seemed to be good quality, and everything worked as it should. My kids enjoyed it for pretend play.

title: Sweet doll
text: My daughters (7 and 9) love the Barbie in Princess Power movie, and they really enjoy playing with Barbie dolls. This is a very cute doll that goes along with the movie. It is of Corinne. As most Barbie dolls, it is of good quality. It is the standard Barbie doll shape and size. When you push the button on the chest, the chest lights up and she makes a kissing sound. It is very cute. My daughters enjoy playing with it. It is cute whether or not they have seen the movie, I think. She is wearing the same dress as in the movie.

title: Great toy for Captain America
text: fans My son really enjoyed this Captain America shield. It is very bright and a good size for little kids. It seemed very sturdy. The disc launching feature was very cute and really made it special. It worked with no problem - just pull the cord and launch the disc. My son had no trouble with this. It was easy to use and can be great with a Halloween costume or just on its own. We were very pleased with this shield.

title: Cute doll
text: This is a very cute doll. These are good for My Little Pony Fans. It is good for both younger kids and the kids who have maybe gotten a little old for the traditional My Little Pony Dolls. She is similar in size to a Barbie Doll. She feels very durable and is of good quality. The little pet is a cute addition. My daughter enjoys playing with her.

title: REally cute
text: Very cute pony This is so cute. When you press the button it glows this beautiful blue. It looks really pretty. My daughter loves it. Is it larger than most of the ponies. It also has some nice extras. It comes with the comb, stickers and some extra accessories. It feels nice and well made. I would recommend this pony for all the little girls that love characters.

title: Coloring book with extras
text: Cute idea My son really enjoyed this coloring book. He likes the Skylanders a lot. It has some nice pictures and the crayons to go with it. We were then able to use the app to make it "come alive." He thought it was cool. It's not a huge book so won't take hours and hours, but still a nice little present and set for your little boy. It's a nice little twist on a coloring book.

title: Nice idea
text: This is a nice twist on a coloring book. Of course it provides the fun and enjoyment of a coloring book. Barbie is a popular character, especially in my household. Most of the crayons are normal but one can help it work on the app. The app was cute and gave it special effects. My daughters enjoyed it.

title: Cute idea
text: My kids enjoyed this castle. It's really fun that they can decorate it as they like.They spent a lot of time decorating it. Because it is so big, it is fine for a bunch of kids to decorate together - there is plenty of room. It is nice that it can be stored flat, compared to regular playhouses that take up a ton of room and there is no way to disassemble . The quality is fine. It is what it is - cardboard - so it is not going to be as strong as plastic of course. If you have kids who play very roughly, then it could be a problem for this castle. This was the only reason I took off a star. Still it is a great option for someone who wants a fun playhouse and doesn't want to spend $300.

title: Cute product
text: This is a cute craft for little girls. The girls can make sparkly pictures and you don't have to worry about cleaning up a whole mess of glitter that gets everywhere. I liked that it was mess free and easy to do. The pictures aren't too big, but this may be good or bad depending on how you look at it. It doesn't take too long. They will then have the pictures as an end result of a craft. They are pretty and sparkly and my girls enjoyed making them.

title: Great way to have glitter without all the mess
text: My children (ages 5, 7 and 9) love to play with glitter, but I don't love it because it gets everywhere and makes a mess. This product is wonderful for getting the best of both worlds - kids can make a craft with glitter without making a huge mess. The treasure box and mirror are very cute with a pretty pink and purple girly design. My girls enjoyed making it and now enjoy using it. It wasn't too hard to do and looked really nice with all the glitter. It was definitely way easier and cleaner than traditional glitter. I would recommend this craft.

title: Cute little craft
text: This is a cute little craft, especially for kids who like to play with glitter. Even though a small amount of glitter comes off here and there, it is nothing like using loose glitter that gets everywhere. My kids love sparkly things but I just can't take the mess of using loose glitter, so this is a pretty good compromise. It was a cute craft that let them make the beads and then use those to make necklaces. It wasn't huge, probably a one time thing, but then they have the necklaces so it leaves them with something nice. A decent value, too. I'd recommend this product.

title: So much better than a plain matching game
text: This pizza game beats regular matching games hands down! The kids build a pizza by spinning and adding to it (or taking away or flipping their pizza, etc). Most kids like mine love pizza and it's cute to have them build a pizza. I was impressed by the quality of this game. It was very sturdy compared with a lot of other games. It was educational with the matching but definitely kept their interest longer than just a simple matching game. It was easy to play, but also interesting. They enjoyed it and wanted to keep playing. I would recommend this game.

title: Such a cute game
text: This is such a cute game! I love that it comes with all these little animal characters instead of paper characters. It is a version of uno (which the kids love) but has real characters and a real barn. It feels so much more substantial than many games. The kids have also just spent some time playing with the pieces and barn like they are characters. It is educational for the very young kids because of the matching. The kids have fun playing it. It is a fairly simple game but not boring like some of the extremely simplistic preschool games.My kids are a little older than preschool (5, 7 and 9) and still enjoy it1 I would recommend this.

title: Cute kit but with some flaws
text:
I have mixed feels about this kit. First, I think it does make a pretty product. It comes with four bracelets, but you can also make them into necklaces because they are long enough. The bracelets are pretty ribbons that are different colors. It comes with a variety of charms to put on them.

Here are my issues with this product: First, it is VERY hard to get the ribbon through the charms. It was too hard for my nine year old to do so I had to do it for her, which kind of ruined the point of it being a craft. Even if she had been able to do it, she could have made them all in about five minutes. So it's not something anyone will spend a lot of time on. There is another issue, which was why I bumped it down to three stars. The only closure is to tie it... it's not like it has a clasp or anything. So because of that, a lot of girls might put it on too tightly... I really had to keep an eye on her to make sure she didn't accidentally do it. You can make a bow but then it might come out and a knot is hard to take in and out.

Overall, cute idea and cute look, but there are flaws.

title: Creative Game
text:
I like this game because it is very creative. So many of the kids games seem very simplistic and repetitive, but this one was definitely different, and because of that it has kept my children's attention span longer. The kids have to balance these little pirate characters on a board and when they do they earn "gold coins."

Pirates are very popular with kids, and this is a nice game that does not involve any fighting of any sort. Having nice coins that are not paper is nice. Everything seemed pretty well made except one of the boards did bend a little but it still works okay. Could get a teeny bit frustrating for kids that are easily frustrated when they are unable to do something. It's a really cute idea and all of my children (ages 5, 7, and 9) are enjoying it. Not too much educational value - the kids who can play this will probably already be able to count, but there is some use in learning to move slowly to avoid things from falling. I would recommend this game.

title: Nice toy boat
text:
This is a nice toy boat, whether or not someone is a fan of SpongeBob. It is not too large, but to be honest I think that is a benefit when so many of these things are gigantic and lead to clutter. It's big enough to play with. It has some cute features to it. I like that it has wheels so the children can push it along. The bottom of the boat opens, which is a nice feature that kids enjoy. When you turn the character on a little platform, it puts out cannons that shoot. Also, when you push a secret lever, it makes the crow's nest fall down. The crow's nest in itself is cute.

It feels like it is high quality and is pretty durable. Many kids love SpongeBob and it ties in with the movie. It has a few cute accessories to go with it. A nice fun toy for pretend play.

title: Nice set
text: This was a decent set. It wasn't too difficult to put together - took me a little while but I'm not really used to putting these together. My son was very excited about it because he likes Cars a lot. It worked mostly okay. I think it might be a little difficult for him to get used to pushing the button the right way to make it do exactly what he wanted. It is a little repetitive...not sure how long he will play with this, but now he wants all the other sets to connect it to. It is a little large put together so I'll probably take it apart somewhat to store. Durability was okay... won't take a ton of abuse but seemed okay. Not bad for a Cars fan, especially if you are willing to get the others to put it together into a set.

title: Very cute set for little teachers
text:
I have three kids (9,7,5) and the older ones love to play teacher to the younger ones. This set is great for allowing them to do that, or of course you could use it to do a little teaching of your own to your little one. It comes with many different items. It has a white board with letters, a white board they do themselves, over a hundred stickers they can take on and off, a book, a bell, a planner and a lot of other things. There are really a lot of different things for the kids to teach others. I also like it's set up... the main part folds out into four different panels and you can keep everything neat in the middle.

I think the educational value is great and so is the fun. There is only one thing I would change and it is the reason I took off a star. The main part is cardboard. Although it is heavy, it is still cardboard and definitely not as durable as plastic or another material. If the kids are rough with it, it can tear, break or fold, so that might impact how much use a child gets out of it, especially if they are very young and still a little rough with their toys.Still, it is a great toy, and I would recommend it.

title: So cute
text: This lion is adorable! He looks really cute and is a nice size. It worked well. It makes sounds, but it's not too loud. You can either push its belly or the child can shake the rattle to make it go. It teaches cause and effect. It felt like a very durable toy. It came with something to attach it to the window. We're going to use it for our baby, but even our young kids liked it! I'd recommend this.

title: Beautiful wooden barn
text: The first thing you notice when you open this barn is the lovely smell of real wood. It seems so much nicer than the cheap plastic ones you can get. I really liked that. It also has so many nice touches - the barn doors slide open and shut, the door opens, there's a pen that opens. The one thing I don't like is that the two halves come apart... they should have made it so that it stays hinged on one side. It needed very minimal assembly - just putting a few panels on. One other thing I didn't like is that I think if it is handled roughly, the parts will come apart and then there are some small parts that can get lost. It came with some nice animals, which felt heavy and of much better quality than the cheap characters you normally see. It is a heavy set, which shows the real wood and good quality, but if your child drops it on his foot, it will hurt. Still, I was very happy with this set, and would recommend it.

title: Fun game
text: This is a really fun game. It is great to use for your family, or even better, for parties. You can come up with your own rules if you want. You have to use the clues to try to guess the things. You can play in teams or just all play together. We used it for family game night. They range in how easy or difficult they are, but they are all fun. I'd recommend it.

title: So adorable
text: This is such a cute toy! My kids love it. When you press the button, it lights up, plays songs and the gears turn. the kids can change out the gears for their own combination. it is a nice size - not too big and not too small. it is bright, colorful and cute. The kids love watching the gears turn. i also feel like it is educational because they can see cause and effect. Highly recommended.

title: Cute toy
text: This is a very cute toy. It is bright and colorful and shaped like a frog, which my (and many little boys) love. The kids just love to roll the balls down the ramp. It lights up and plays music, which is cute. Take a moment to put together and seems very durable. It's a good size - not too small and not too big - just the right size for the kids it's aimed at. It comes with three balls and although it may seem repetitive, the kids really enjoy it. The frog ribbits, which is cute. It helps with cause and effect and hand/eye coordination. I'd recommend this toy.

title: Nice kit but doesn't contain everything
text:
This is a great kit. It has a lot more to it than many of the crystal growing kits. It really sets it up like a chemistry experiment more than just combining two things. I thought it was both educational and fun, and contained a variety of experiments for little ones. My daughter is almost nine, but she would need adult help to do this. It's not really that difficult, but you need to follow the directions.

The reason I took off a star is that is does not contain everything that is necessary to run the experiments. The first time we went to start it, we couldn't because we didn't have everything. I would've preferred a kit that had everything you needed. Besides that it is fun to conduct the experiments and watch the crystals grow. I would recommend the product.

title: Sweet doll
text:
This is a very cute doll that goes along with the movie Barbie and the Secret Door. It is the fairy (not the main character), who loses her wings in the movie. You can have the wings down and when you push the button on her dress, it pops up.

The doll is very pretty and colorful. My daughter liked it right away and started playing with it. It feels really well made. The dress is very pretty. I was happy with this product.

title: Great toy
text: I love this toy and so do my kids. It is so cute. I love that it is a vacuum because little kids love to emulate what their parents are doing so instead of them grabbing the big, heavy real one they can grab their own little one (hopefully it'll make them want to vacuum in the future!) It has more than 30 different phrases, songs and tunes and will come to life when you push it. I love that it is also educational, teaching things like colors and letters. It lights up too. Of course it is run on batteries and doesn't have any cords. It is colorful and cute. I'd recommend it.

title: Great toy for when you are on the go
text:
This is a very cute toy. My daughter loves to play pretend with little dolls wherever she goes. This toy makes it easy to carry her little characters around and gives a colorful place to play with them. It was very bright and colorful and well designed. It has 4 rooms with the children can play pretend. It comes with 1 doll.

The outside is made of plastic. The only reason I took off a point was because the inside rooms were made out of card board and I felt like it would've been a lot nicer if that had been plastic instead.

This toy is going to get a lot of use. My girls love barbie and the secret door but any barbie fan would enjoy it. It is very convenient for when you are on the go.

title: Great car
text: I got this car for my young son and he just loved it. First, it's a good size, not that big, and easy for him to handle, but not small. We have lots of big toys so I was glad this wasn't gigantic. It looks really nice - half car, half green, scary looking lizard/monster/dinosaur/dragon - whatever your child wants to make it. It worked well. it's definitely different than other remote control vehicles with how many different terrains it'll go on. I was very impressed by that. It's great for kids wanting to put it through small, shallow puddles. The range was fine for what we wanted to use it for... I was happy and would recommend it.

title: Really cute doll
text:
I think this doll is just adorable. She is very very cute. Her voice sounds really sweet and she says a lot of different phrases, which is nice. It is a really good volume. It comes with fun instruments, which are for your kids to play (my daughter is currently enjoying one of them).

The reason I knocked off a star is because the recording function doesn't really work very well. It took a while for me to even get it to light up and then it comes out distorted and kind of funny. You can still here your voice, but it kin of repeats it in a funny way. Now my kids thought it was hysterical and probably liked it better for this, but I didn't quite feel like it did exactly what you would think it should from the box, which is why I lowered the score. For my kids it was fine. It says almost a hundred different phrases. I was very happy with this doll.

title: Great Thomas toy
text:
My five year old son is very happy with this toy. Thomas the Train is so popular for the young kids... we've known so many people whose kids are into this character and my son is no different. This is a great toy to go with this character.

It is so much fun for kids to be able to control this remote control train with either the train signal wand or just by their hands. They can make him go forward and backward and he also revs up. My son had a blast making him go in the different directions.

I was pleased with the quality of the toy. Everything worked as it should, and it seemed durable. Of course, it's an adorable looking character. One thing that's nice about this toy is that many of the remote control cars/trains are for older kids so this one is nice in that it is for younger kids. I was pleased with this toy and would recommend it to others.

title: Great set
text:
This set was really really cool. It looked so authentic. It was easy to put together and very durable. It seemed very sturdy. The kids loved playing with it and having the characters go into each other. It has a collapsing scaffold, which is a neat bonus. The only thing is that for the price, I wish it would've come with a couple of characters so you can play with it right away because obviously there isn't much to do without them.

The kids can spend a long time with this. It is a great gift for someone who is a wrestling fan. I would highly recommend it.

title: So cute
text:
I think this is an adorable toy. Unfortunately we cannot have a real dog because of allergies and commitment required but my daughters love dogs. Obviously this is not the real thing, but it is so much fun to play with and give them a little bit of an idea of it. With the leash the children can control the dog's movement, plus it barks, wags her tail, sits up, walks and more. My daughters love it. They think it is so much fun and love to pretend that they have a real dog. They can go on walks with her.

I was happy with the toy's quality. It's really cute and adorable. Everything worked fine with no problems. The fur is soft. It also reacts to your child, which is great. It does use C batteries. I would recommend it as a fun toy for kids who love dogs, whether or not they have their own.

title: Really cute doll
text:
This is a fun doll and my daughters love it. They thought it was cute (although I think its a little funny looking but its the kids who matter). She says so many different things. Its fun for them to have a doll that is interactive.

The eating and wetting worked fine. The one thing I didn't like is that you can't reuse the diapers because of the food. They sell more but those get expensive real quick. Of course you don't have to do that.

The doll is chatty. Some kids will like that while others will think it is too much. You can turn it off though. Overall a real fun product or kids and one I would recommend.

title: just okay
text: These scissors were okay. They seemed a lot smaller and thinner than most of the kids scissors I have. They were lighter too. I guess this would make them better for very young kids by they weren't as rounded or safe as some of the others are. They just didn't seem very substantial. Thy did cut okay.

title: Great toy for your little dinosaur lover
text:
My 5 year old son loves this dinosaur. Many boys like dinosaurs and It is a good size for him, not big and not too small. I love it it is a firefighting dinosaur as many children also like firefighters. The end of the tail has a place where a character can sit.

This is like a robot dinosaur which is great for kids who like robots. It says a bunch of phrases and lights up. The quality was very good. It kept my son's attention. For kids who like dinosaurs, fireigthters, robot s or better yet all three I would recommend this toy.

title: so awesome
text:
I love this product. First Monopoly is a wonderful game to begin with. Adults and children alike can spend hours with this fun game. In addition it can teach about money and math. It is a great game for family night.

This is a wonderful version of Monopoly. You can print out pictures on the stickers to personalize it. There are so many with you can customize this. It is so much fun to have a game that is unique to you. This also could make a great gift.

The quality of the game was very good. This can be something you can keep forever. It took a little time but it wasn't too bad. You also do not need to customize it in order to play.I would recommend this game.

title: Cute bath toy!
text: I was very happy with the set, and so were the children. They loved stacking the pieces in the bathtub to make the waterfall come down. The characters are so cute for little kids. It's amazing how long they can play with it. I love that it is compatible with other pieces by Mega Blocks. It does not take up too much room, which is nice, and it comes with its own case. I like that it has a suction cup for the bottom of the tub. It is made of hard plastic and felt very durable - not too worried about breakage. It is a great size for little hands. I highly recommend this set.

title: Wonderful, classic game
text: I loved this card game as a child and now I am loving playing it with my own children. It is a pretty simple and straightforward game that kids can play and yet it can keep everybody entertained. My kids love the subject of cars and speeding down the highway. We've spent hours with it. A great portable game that you can take on the go and just about anywhere. The set is a nice quality set and it comes in a nice tin instead of the paper containers that most card games come in (which seem to rip right away). For many happy memories, I recommend this great game.

title: Children LOVE this mirror
text:
This is a wonderful toy for kids. All of my children love mirrors. They love looking at themselves. Obviously most portable mirrors are not safe for little kids. If it was just a mirror, I think my kids would be interested in this but it is so much more...

The Disney princesses are a wonderful subject for a toy. Both my girls love the princess and have been familiar with them from a young age. This toy has little characters that say things. It also has lights. It is motion activated, teaching even young children about cause and effect. It has a magic wand.

I was pleased with the size of this product. It was a good size, but doesn't take too much room if it's against a wall. The quality was good, too. We haven't had any technical issues or anything.

I definitely recommend this product.

title: Great set for kids who love the Octonauts
text:
The Octonauts is a wonderful educational show, and this is a great set to go with it. It's a good size set and is made for ages 3+. It has a playset and over ten play pieces. It lets the children blast from a volcano, fire a rescue flare and launch a kelp cake. It's cute, and my kids like to launch and blast things but we won't let them play with toy weapons so this is a way to get that without it being based on something violent.

My kids can spend hours playing with the Octonauts toys. This comes with a character an an octopus, so you would need to buy more Octonauts if you want more. One thing I really like is that it folds up together and everything fits inside, which has definitely helped with things getting lost. I am happy with the quality of the product; of course its mostly plastic but it doesn't seem flimsy. It is made by Fisher-Price.

For kids who love the Octonauts, this is a great set.

title: Awesome boat
text:
I couldn't even get this out of the packaging before my son was at it, telling me how much he liked it. Since then, he has enjoyed playing with it quite a bit. It's really great and has so many parts to it.

One thing that's nice is that it can be used as a dry toy, in the bathtub/pool or both. The boat floats in the water. It's nice that it's so versatile.

My son loves things that go (as do many kids) so it is great to have a toy that combines so many of these. Of course you have the big ship, but it also comes with two cars and a helicopter (although the helicopter looked a little cheap compared to the rest of it, but it does squirt which is a nice little extra). There is a track for the cars to go on, which you can use with other cars to. It has a crane/capture cage that goes into the water to save a big shark that comes with it. Of course sharks are another things boys love.

It comes with a few extras. There's a squirting water canon on it. The ship can roll which is great for those using it as a dry toy. There's a small rescue boat that can deploy with a car on it.

I was very happy with the quality of this toy. With so much to it and its versatility, it's something my son can spend hours with. I would definitely recommend it to others.

title: Excellent set for your little princess
text:
This is a great Play-doh product that can keep the kids busy for hours. First let me say what a fan I am of Play-doh in general. This has been one of the greatest toys in my house of all. The kids can spend hours on it and use their imagination to create whatever they want. It's safe, creative and fun.

This set in particular is great. It is good for little princesses who want to design, decorate and create Princess Aurora's (Sleeping Beauty) dress. It comes with a little doll that is set up for gowns to press out out of. It comes with many different molds for things like the good fairies, flowers, a bow, a mirror and more. It has a little castle and also a pretend cake where your child can make little Play-doh candles.

I was happy with the quality of this product. It was colorful (full of pink) and very sweet. It also lets you make it sparkly. I would recommend it.

title: The kids love it
text:
This is a cute set with so many adorable extras! I have two young daughters who love playing with this set. It's a little bakery stand, and my favorite part is how the display container has a crank on it to let the kids rotate the 'items for sale.' It is so adorable! Also, they thought of so many things like having the little pieces fit into grooves so that they stay.

The quality was very good. It comes with a pretty Barbie doll. It is small, but for me with lots of clutter that is good. There is virtually nothing to put together. This fits in well with the other parts in the series as well as Barbie toys as a whole. Despite its size, it can give the kids hours of pretend play. It also comes with a little tables and chairs set for Barbie.

If you don't have room for a full size dollhouse, or even if you do, consider this great product.

title: Adorable set
text:
This set is so adorable. My kids just love it, and it is good for hours of pretend play! It comes with a nice barbie doll, a shopping cart, and a little store. It has a little checkout area with a conveyor belt that actually moves and the grocery items fall into the shopping bag, which is just really cute. It comes with a shelving set with different grocery products that the dolls can shelve.

This set is great quality. They really thought of some great details. For instance, we always have a problem with the small items in Barbie sets getting misplaced. In this set, the small items actually fit into little grooves int he shelving system so they stay there. That is really cute. It is also relatively small, which is actually good for us since we are fighting clutter, however you get a lot in that small set.

This set goes along with other sets (such as a bakery) which is nice because you can get one or all of them. It is also fully put together, which I like. We had some sets that took a while to put together and then things kept popping off, so it is nice that this comes as a unit. I would recommend this item for little Barbie-loving kids.

title: Great set for little girls
text: This is such a cute set. My daughter just loves to play with characters of this size, and this is a nice comprehensive set for fans of the popular Sophia the First series. It comes with a variety of dolls, including Sophia, James, the three good fairies and more. I was definitely impressed by how much that came with it, which is more than you would find with most set. Also, I found that the quality was very good. I really like the size of these dolls because they don't take up too much room, but my daughter loves playing with them.

title: Adorable play-doh set
text:
Play-doh itself is such a great toy for kids. My kids of different ages (8, 6 and 4) can play with it for hours. This set is great. They are really enjoying it (they're actually playing with it right now as I right this review). This set comes with several small containers of play-doh and a variety of molds where the kids can make different "desserts" like cupcakes and ice cream. It's small but it has so much to it. They can put a variety of molds in the oven and when they push it down it makes a ding to show that it's done.The molds are in the shape of cakes, candy and so many other things. It seems like every inch of it is covered in molds, which is great for the kids. It has so many little extras like a little rolling pin and an icing syringe.

There is a lot to this set but it is still very little. Some of the play-doh sets are big and take up so much room but this is small and has so much packed into it. It even has a place to store several of the containers of play-doh.

I would definitely recommend this product. One of the more cute ones we have (and we have a lot).

title: Cute alternative to messy foam/water
text:
We had the foam/water sprayer but it was hard to find a time to use it since it was messy and needed to be an outdoor toy. This toy is cute because it doesn't have that drawback. It requires batteries (not included) and shoots the discs pretty far. Advantages are that it isn't messy and can be used over and over again. for a child who is into Spiderman it can be really cute.
There are some drawbacks to the toy. The shooter doesn't hold that many discs. Also, one big issue is how big and heavy it is. I feel like it was actually a little big for my son's arm - a lot of kids who would enjoy this would have trouble holding it on their arm for a long time because it is so heavy and big. Also, some kids may find it too repetitive/boring. It does have sounds, which can be a plus or a minus - it enhances the toy and makes it more fun for the kids but may bother some adults. Overall, I would recommend it.

title: Great Barbie, poorly executed tattoos
text:
So if this was just sold as a Barbie, I'd say it was great. Very cute, as Barbie's generally are, comes with a nice chair so the little girl can style the hair. The problem comes with the tattoos.

Right away one issue is that even if all the tattoos worked perfectly you're still talking about only a limited number so that right there is limited. But the real problem is that it was difficult to get them on so that it looks like it's supposed to do. My kids get very upset when something does not come out like it's supposed to and you hate to disappoint your kids of course. It can run, and that can be very frustrating for the kids. If you do get this, make sure to express to your kids that it might not turn out exactly right. Still it's a cute doll and if you're looking for a Barbie that can get some colors in her hair, this can be a good toy.

title: Adorable set
text: This is an adorable set. For a very reasonable price, you really get a lot of features. There are a lot of details to this small playset. Many people do not have room for a full size dollhouse, and in some little set, you get two stories, a bed, a dining set and even a working Elevator! Because of its compact size, it is also great to take on the go. It comes with Chelsea and her little bunny. It was really easy to put together, and my girls enjoy playing with it. It makes a great companion to other sets or a something great for Grandma's house. There aren't too many Barbie playsets you can get at this price, and this is a great one. I would recommend it.

title: Okay playset
text: This is an okay playset. It's nice that it's Sophia, a very popular character. It has her as a mermaid, which is cute, and features both the castle and the underwater part. The thing is my kids just haven't played with it that much, and they love Sophia. There just isn't really that much to it. It's very small... can only really be used with the small characters, and even with them there's not a lot of room to do anything. The other thing is that it seems to be very cheaply made. It is pretty thin plastic, and I honestly do not see this lasting long. Sophia is a character that appeals to very young kids, and I think something for that would have to be sturdier to really last. With all the playsets that are larger, have more to them and are better put together I might consider something else.

title: Wonderful for 8 year old
text: I have an eight year old daughter, and I think this is a wonderful program. Your daughter can design and color her own products and then see a "model" wear them on the runway. Many girls are interested in fashion, and this can help them with their artistry and creativity. Basically, it's just a lot of fun. It is neat for them to draw something and then see it come to life on the computer. It is really easy to use. You can go through the original templates quickly but then you can make more to use. A little pricey, but really cute. I would recommend it.

title: Very cute
text: This is a fun and enjoyable game. The kids and adults can act out things in a very silly way. There were a lot of laughs with this game, and it's something you can play again and again. I think it would be very good for parties. The scoring can be a little complicated but you can always adjust it to work more for you. I would recommend this game.

title: Cute game and great value for little ones
text: When you consider the price for this entire system is less than many of the accessories for other controllers, you realize what a great value this is. Kids who love these characters will enjoy the video games in the extremely simple to use system. No, the graphics aren't quite what you get in the $400 systems, but they are fine, especially for the little ones who will be playing them. Can give the kids hours of entertainment. Also, quite portable compared to the other systems, which makes it great for when you are traveling. A good start to video games for a little kid. would recommend.

title: Fine but without many of the bells and whistles of a lot of the others
text: This is a nice dollhouse.  Pros are that it is more wood and less flimsy plastic than a lot of the modern dollhouses.  Many of the modern dollhouses seem ready to break within minutes but this one seems more substantial and sturdier.  Because of this is also looks nicer, especially if it will be out in a main area of the house and not in a child's room.  It is not as fancy as some of the other dollhouses, however.  For instance, we also have the Barbie Dreamhouse, which has tons of sounds, lights and other extras, which the kids enjoy.  It is a decent option, but I would consider all of your choices when making your decision.

title: fantastic game
text: This is an adorable game. My kids love the ringers that make animal noises. Also, what's great about them is you can use them for other games and purposes too. I like the variety of questions, especially the difference in difficulty. Its very important to spend quality time with the kids and playing with this game can accomplish that.

title: highly recommended
text: I am extremely happy with this game. It is very cute, entertaining and engaging for my three small children. It also has some educational value, teaching kids about colors and do forth. I would recommend it.

title: Broke in half then terrible customer service
text: I would not recommend this castle or the company in general. The castle broke right in half. It is unusable now. I saw others complained about the same thing. Customer service is dismal. They waste your time. I used to buy from this company even though their items are a little pricey because I thought it was higher quality and customer service. Boy was I wrong. Apparently even though they have a customer service email they don't appear to use it for customer service, I was told they are "old fashioned" that way. Well, email might be new, but it is really convenient and annoying that you have to waste your time on the phone for nothing. So unless you want something that is low quality, poor customer service and have a lot of time to spare I would recommend something else.

title: Love this toy
text: I think this toy is so adorable and the kids love it. It's a bear that moves and wiggles and brushes it's teeth for the two minutes that is recommended. It sings while it does it. It's really so cute and the kids love listening to it. I think it will make brushing teeth time more fun and easier and make it more likely that they will brush for longer. IT also has cute little reminders such as don't forget to brush the inside of the teeth and the tongue. I think it can really help. I like it a lot and would highly recommend it.

title: Disappointed
text: We were disappointed in this. The main problem is that it is way to low. It is hard to see that it is lit at all. It would even work as a nightlight. In addition, it just has a few tiny pinpricks of light to denote the random landing sites that someone in this age group probably wouldn't care about anyways. It is hard to see them unless you are looking really up close. Maybe the other styles are better but this definitely didn't meet our expectations.

title: Very adorable
text: This is a great toy for all of your little princesses out there. The girls love Ariel so a product that makes her boat is great. I like that it can be used in several ways - as a boat or as her room. It's a good size.... not too large but significant enough for them to play with. I would recommend it.

title: nice game
text: My son loves anything that "goes" and this is a great game for a child with such an interest in transportation. It covers many different forms, and can hold the children's interest by that alone. It kept the kids entertained and also helps teach them. I would recommend it.

title: very cute
text: MY children love to watch things grow. This is a very cute toy that gives them pretty quick results. I don't know that it's really something to do over and over again, but it is very cute.

title: okay
text: This toy is okay. It has a lot of little parts. The basic gist is that you try to catapult the little heads through things and over things. I'm not sure how long this is really gong to keep people's attention and a lot of little things to fly away and get lost.

title: very cute
text: This is enjoyable for artists. The kids can trace out the designs on the mandela. The only thing is that there is not that much to do with this one set so didn't hold their attention for too long. It was cute though.

title: so cute
text: This is such a cute idea. A doll with a camera. The children have no problem using it and it is a great idea. Really innovative and great for girls who love Barbie.

title: Very cute toy
text: The kids like this Cinderella carriage. It is sweet and the way it can become a pumpkin is very cute. It is thin so it doesn't fit too many dolls but doesn't take up as much room. The horse is simple. Overall very cute toy that the kids like.

title: Fun But Flimsy
text:
This is not my first Barbie Dream House. In fact, I own this exact same one from about 3 years ago. The design is the same, but the colors are brighter and the pictures have changed a bit to reflect the movies.

The unit shipped with two parts broken that will require them to replace the entire unit. We'll see how they handle that and I'll update my review. It is also missing two pieces. And when I looked back at my old dreamhouse I found that two things that were broken on this one were broken on that one two and I just never noticed that they were supposed to light up (the fridge light and the fireplace light).

The elevator still doesn't work right. The cords on both elevators are an inch too short to actually go through the guides, and the clip holding it on at the top comes off every time it is used. I assume this is a problem with every unit since two units 3 years apart had the problem.

The new hottub doesn't light up like the old one did. But this isn't a big deal.

The assembly takes about 20 minutes if you are adept at putting things together and reading VERY POOR instructions. I have assembled thousands of things from toys to furniture to things at work and these are sub-par. The only real complaint is the sheet of stickers which you have to put on in a very exacting way and which should have been factory applied. There is no excuse for not simply having the machines that built the house do this step and it means that most of us will have imperfect looking finished products.

For fun I would give this product many stars. The kids enjoy playing with it. It is big, pink, has Barbie and fits Barbie sized dolls. I would recommend this overall but know that it is not quite as sturdy as it can be.

title: comes apart
text: These cars have you twist the entire car to wind it. Cute idea and fun. The big problem that ruined it for me is that the two parts of the car come apart. In other words it breaks apart. You can put it back together but it is very easy for one part to get lost and then the other is useless. Would not recommend.

title: A New Twist On The Tricycle, Great If Your Child Is 8-12
text:
I couldn't tell from the description who this was for. I am a parent of 3 kids (ages 4, 2 and 1) and I myself am 30 years old. I saw this product as a free sample and decided to get it hoping that it would be for me to use and the kids to use when they got older.

I was wrong on the first part. Although I do fit on the bike with some difficulty, I am too big to use it effectively and I can't get up enough speed to do any tricks. My 4 year old daughter, on the other hand, is too small to ride it. It looks like an 8-12 year old would fit perfectly. Speaking as someone who was an 8-12 year old boy (22-18 years ago respectively), I can say that any 8-12 year old boy should enjoy this toy. However, I believe it is the type of thing that will get old pretty fast. It has basically one trick (spinning out to turn like drifting in a car) and once you master that you're out of things to do.

Okay, just for the coolness factor I am keeping it for when the kids are older...And I can't say that there's no chance I won't try to use it again because it was kind of neat. But I wouldn't buy it unless my kid really wanted it and the price tag didn't make me blink twice.

title: This is a great value for a building block set.
text:
[[VIDEOID:ac8522f0dd58dfe112674aa2c980ec48]] I grew up admiring the Space Shuttle and the NASA space program. It caught my imagination and it always evoked a sense of awe. I took my son to the Shuttle exhibit after it arrived in Los Angeles and he loved seeing the enormous size of the thing.

This DADMCFD 25-in-1 Space Shuttle Toy Building Kit also captures the imagination with its tiny models of satellites, rovers and other space vehicles. This set is super affordable when compared to the... other brand and the quality of the bricks are very good. I've tried other off-brand bricks before and those didn't fit very well, these blocks do.

This set comes with 12 bags of bricks that build 12 little models as you see in my pictures. Each of these bags also have a second model that they can build. Just follow the "A" model instructions to build the first model and the "B" model instructions to build the alternat vehicle. The last model combines all of the sets to build the large Space Shuttle.

What a fun set of bricks with good rebuild value because of all the different configurations. Great product.

title: This was FUN!  Well...  if you don't mind doing the same thing 32 times.
text:
I loved my experience building this 3D Metal Model of the London Eye. I visited this attraction years ago and it was definitely nice to revisit it in this manner.

Firstly, my main advice to anyone interested in building these models is: BUY A TOOL KIT! I purchased this [[ASIN: B096DT59T7 17 Pieces Metal Puzzle Tool Set]] for this build.

Previously, I build a very simple Eifel Tower model and a San Francisco Trolley metal model without a toolkit and while they were fun to build, they also weren't easy because I didn't have the right tools.

It seems that metal models have come a long way, I found this model to be well laid out and clearly labeled. I was also impressed with the paint that they were able to put on some of the parts, giving some nice accents to the piece. The directions were clear enough, but you do need to read all of the prerequisite parts at the beginning. I didn't know that they labeled in their diagrams exactly which side should be up when building until maybe the third step.

With a snipper, removing the parts were fairly simple -- although my snipper was a little too big for some of the tabs. using the folding tool included with my toolkit, I was able to fold straight lines cleanly. I also used the metal rods included in my kit to roll the curves that the directions called for.

What may be frustrating for some people are the 32 gondolas that need to be built. I didn't mind it at all because this is what model building is about, right? Patience and persistence. The other difficult part was rolling the legs of the wheel. There just isn't a clean way of putting that together and I scratched some of the paint off with my pliers.

In the end, I was quite satisfied with the model and had a great time with the build. This has reignited my passion for small, detailed work that I might just continue to build more models.

title: Make sure to use sand and wax the parts!
text:
I've always been fascinated by these wooden puzzles. I have an interest in getting into laser engraving and cutting. These puzzles are a great example of what one can achieve with a laser.

The Wood Trick Electric Space Junk Robot was my first wooden puzzle and I had a great time putting it together with my son. The instructions were clear and easy to follow and the assembly requires no glue but make sure that you pay attention to the symbols that signify where some sanding is needed and where to use the included wax to ensure smooth motion between the moving parts.

Some parts might be tricky to remove. I use the rounded end of a Bic pen to push the parts out and generally, I just try not to splinter any of the parts. While putting this together, I appreciated how well the parts were designed. The tolerances between the parts were perfect and each fastener fit well for most of the model. The biggest difficulties we had was trying to fit the top of the body to the bottom wheel platform. There were a lot of pegs to match up and due to that, the final fastener pieces didn't fit perfectly due to the tabs not being pushed through completely.

I will definitely be getting more of these puzzles.

title: Good solution for power adapter hell
text:
Power adapter manufacturers and power strip adapter manufacturers have both tried to address problems with power adapters taking up too much space by either making the power adapter slimmer or rotating the plug/socket in different ways but with the kind of luck that I have, I will inevitably end up with a combination where the power adapter is turned in just the wrong way to require it to take up more than one socket's space.

With the HLS Surge Protector, I don't have this issue. Each of the sockets are far enough apart where even the larger power adapters from my cable modem and router fit easily and with the ability to turn in in different ways, I can save space by folding the strip in half. My only problem was that there were only four sockets but that was fine. I put all of the devices that have big power adapters on the HLS and a second, smaller, power strip took care of my PC.

In my case, I also have a small travel router that I hacked with Openwrt to provide media sharing capabilities and that router ran on USB power. The USB port on the HLS Surge Protector came in handy for it.

So two things you need to be aware of when considering this power strip: There are only 4 sockets and two USB sockets and this power strip is pretty big. When I received it, I was surprised at how long it is. Each socket is far enough apart to where adapters would fit nicely even if this power strip wasn't flexible. The flexibility gives you the ability to fit this strip around the wiring or fit into the space you have available.

title: Fun and easy to fly toy
text:
I bought this RC plane to enjoy with my seven year old; he loves remote control toys, and is still developing the skills to control them. I have dabbled in RC models myself with some hours of intermediate level RC helicopter and fixed wing experience; I figured a durable, simple, slow model was a good place to start for a beginner. Bonus points for not having to build it. This model fits the bill!

First off, the airplane is foam, simple to assemble, and durable. The instructions caution the pilot to cut the motors as soon as it collides with something; my son hasn't done that all the time, and it is still going strong. The props are pushers, so are actually pretty hard to ram into hard objects as they are behind the nose and wings. The rest of the plane is soft foam, and seems to be unaffected by crashing.

Second, the controls are simple. All you have are throttle (which isn't very sensitive) and yaw which is controlled by the motors and not the rudder. The floaty biplane design and lack of elevator controls means a beginner can just jam on the throttle and the plane will begin a series of porpoising climbs and stalls to a net altitude gain without drama. With a little practice and a gentle throttle thumb, you can nicely control this plane. My son and I fly it off our deck, and I can fly it out and back to my hand easily. It is slow and easy to track, and we've even flown it with a light breeze (with best results mostly pointing it windward). My son has no problem circling it around and getting used to the controls. Which brings me to my third point.

This plane is tough. It has been crashed what seems like a couple of times a minute, and seems no worse for wear. Its light weight, simple and flexible construction, and the aforementioned pusher prop layout make it pretty bombproof. It's been on and off our roof. It's hit bird feeders, walls, trees, and bushes. It's landed on its nose, tail, and wings, sometimes all in the same landing. And it still flies fine, with no downtime yet.

For the downsides, you need some space to fly it. The "indoor" rating on the package probably means a gym or another large space with high ceilings. The plane just doesn't have the nuanced controls to effectively steer it inside the average house. The soft and floppy construction and nose-high design that make it so good for inexperienced flyers also limit its capacity for aerobatics and such, but that is pretty much an expected trade-off. So know what you are getting, and you will be pleased.

In summary, this is a fun toy for kids of all ages with a shallow learning curve to get proficient. This would be a good initial purchase to court the flying bug, and a fun, downtime-free RC experience for all pilots.

title: Look no further! BEST toy makeup kit we have found.
text: We purchased this a few days before Christmas as a last minute gift for my 1.5 y/o, it arrived Christmas Eve. All items are toys but the makeup feels so real that even my 4 year old son loves to play with it with my daughter. The lip stick rolls up, just like a real tube and the rubberized stick feels soft to the touch. The cap however did crack from it being pushed on too hard but I believe it was my son who has the tendency to be rough. I love that this kit is updated with times and includes brushes instead of the old school applicators. They are full length brushes. The make up back is thick with a nice zipper track. I love that it has 2 zipper pulls! It's very easy to open and close. It's also a deep bag so it holds the pieces easily with room to dig in to find what you need. The way she adores it brings happiness to my heart. She loves to sit and watch me do my make up and now she can enjoy applying it too. The eyeshadow and blush are foam pads but feel so real. She wipes the brush over and instantly takes it to her eye kids or cheeks. Her favorite of all, is the nail polish. It is oddly satisfying to run the brush over your fingernails without polish even for adults. Something about it is so satisfying  I love playing with her and her makeup. She feels so big and proud to use it. Will be using this with her new vanity she's getting for her 2nd birthday. Wonderful set  Only recommendation is a lip stick cap that doesn't crack as easy. I still rate

text:

The challenge cards get the player so involved either by thinking of real life solutions (Q cards), exploring their own thought process (You cards) or getting up and active (Do cards).

The board game is so simple and easy to play even my 5 year old was able to follow along.

I love that this game has such a positive message behind it. So much fun for the whole family!!

I was selected to review this item for free. My reviews are based on personal use.

title: All of the cool stops are gone and you're left with a few ...
text:
I remember playing this game growing up. I definitely wanted to share that with my kids.

This game has changed. It's more simplified.

No more stops at the gumdrops or even Nanny nutter. All of the cool stops are gone and you're left with a few draw cards for icecream, peppermint or some other confectionery.

Kinda bummed out with the changes. But it's simple enough to play with young children and my kids love it. So I guess that's a win.

title: This is awesome! I love the fact it looks like a ...
text:
I totally bought this for myself....don't judge me!

This is awesome! I love the fact it looks like a treasure chest!

Am I a pirate? Is that filled with treasure? I'll never tell!

The sound quality is great and its definitely an attention getter. I am always asked what is that? I put on my best Jack Sparrow impersonation and calmly play them the songs of my people. ;)

In all seriousness I can't find a negative about this other than the fact no handsome pirate is included, however he is on the box ;)

I received this product to test out at a discount. My assement is my own after personal use.

title: These are great stocking stuffers or party supplies
text:
These are great stocking stuffers or party supplies.

*The rings are soft and stretchy.
*I like the fact they have on off buttons so the batteries last longer
*Kids love them at any age

These were a hot with my boys, I stashed some in their stockings and gave them a few to try out. Instant hit.

Fun Idea: Add a bunch to the bathtub at night, turn out the lights and have a glow party! (They continued to work after being submerged)

These are so much fun ibeven kept one for myself :)

title: What can be more fun then building your own floating fortress
text: Everyone loves to play in the pool on hot and humid days...and chances are you had a noodle with you. If you didn't you're missing out! What can be more fun then building your own floating fortress? These are so simple to use and so much fun! I discovered these when a neighbor had some an when I got the chance to review them at a discount in exchange for an honest and unbiased testimony....of course I said yes! These are awesome! This is a must have for summer break! They are so simple to use and very durable. My kids love them!

text: My daughter spent her own money only to be ripped off and disappointed.  There was no HANDBOOK as described, only a single piece of paper. After perfectly following the instructions, nothing happened.  When you look at the paper that came with it, they say that they will replace them if they don't hatch for $5 more!  This is a SCAM and they STEAL FROM CHILDREN.

title: Great first handbag for my 1-year old
text: My 1-year old daughter enjoys this bag as a first birthday present.  All of the plastic toys inside are age appropriate and seem safe for a baby - nothing she can eat.  She looks cute with it.  The purse can play a few different tunes and sound effects when you press the heart button or slide the toy zipper at the bottom.  The top of the bag close magnetically.  My only complaint is the massive plastic brick at the bottom that contains the batteries and speaker.  It's about the size of a smartphone but much much thicker (maybe 3X?) and adds a lot of weight to the bag.  This could have EASILY been designed to be MUCH smaller and it seems lazy and stupid that it's so massive.  Also it makes this toy unwashable.  The plastic phone in this set is not interactive and does not do anything.  Aside from this, it's a nice little toy and for this price (around $15) I think it still deserves 5 stars.

title: Great doll and price, but disheveled package
text: My daughter loves this doll and really wanted this one which is from an episode of Barbie TV show.  The doll looks just like the display image, except the package arrived battered and broken.  The shipper was too lazy to use any bubble wrap or padding, and simply dumped this in a mail envelope for international mail.  She probably thought I dug this out of a discount bargain bin from a 3rd world shopping mall from how damaged the packaging was.  I attached a photo.  Would have given this 5 stars otherwise, but when the package looks this bad it kind of takes something away from its gift-ability.

title: Great price & doll, battered packaging
